analyzed: khyad par du ni nges pa can no //
translated: In particular, it is ascertained.

original: thams cad 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs nyid du zhes bya ba ni chos can la tha dad pa yin na rgyu nyid kyis nges par byed pa'i phyir chos can la nges pa nyid ces bya ba ni thun mong ba nyid kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to🔽// nges pa can gyi chos ma nges par gzung ba dang bcas pa'i ngag yin pa'i phyir de'i rjes su 'gro ba kho nas nges par byed pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa'i don nyid bsal ba'i ched du yin pa de lta na yang nges par gzung ba rjes
analyzed: thams cad 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs nyid du zhes bya ba ni chos can la tha dad pa yin na rgyu nyid kyis nges par byed pa'i phyir chos can la nges pa nyid ces bya ba ni thun mong ba nyid kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // nges pa can gyi chos ma nges par gzung ba dang bcas pa'i ngag yin pa'i phyir de'i rjes su 'gro ba kho nas nges par byed pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa'i don nyid bsal ba'i ched du yin pa de lta na yang nges par gzung ba rjes
translated: “All are reasons of effect” means that if there is a difference in the subject, it is ascertained by the cause. The meaning of “ascertainment of the subject” is that it is only common.

original: su mi 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: su mi 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: Because it is a statement that includes the uncertain apprehension of a certain property, its ascertainment by mere concomitance is for the purpose of eliminating the meaning of non-possession. Even so, it is not that the ascertainment does not follow,

original: snga ma dang phyi ma nyid kyis tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni @272a * //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma nyid kyis tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni @272a * //
translated: because it is different by being prior and posterior. This is shown by

original: nges ldan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges ldan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “having ascertainment.”

original: tha dad byed pa ni thams cad la yod pa'i don bstan pa na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad byed pa ni thams cad la yod pa'i don bstan pa na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The differentiation is that when the meaning that exists for all is taught, it is “if.”

original: nges par gzung ba sna tshogs pa nyid du bstan pa ni khyad par can dag dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba sna tshogs pa nyid du bstan pa ni khyad par can dag dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The various kinds of ascertainment are shown by the words “the specific properties.

original: nges par gzung ba yod na de ltar 'gyur te ba lang nyid ces bya ba lta bu'o //🔽med na ni phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la de sbyar med kyang zhes bya ba ste phyogs la yod dam med ces bya ba'i gnas skabs la phyogs kyi chos zhes brjod pas nges par gzung ba'i don mi ldan pa rnam par
analyzed: nges par gzung ba yod na de ltar 'gyur te ba lang nyid ces bya ba lta bu'o // med na ni phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la de sbyar med kyang zhes bya ba ste phyogs la yod dam med ces bya ba'i gnas skabs la phyogs kyi chos zhes brjod pas nges par gzung ba'i don mi ldan pa rnam par
translated: ” If there were ascertainment, it would be like the word “cow-ness.”🔽But if there were not, how could there be such things as the property of the subject?🔽The response to this is that even though there is no such connection,

original: gcod par rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcod par rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: in the context of the question “Is it present in the subject or not?,” the property of the subject is mentioned. Thus, the meaning of the term “ascertainment” is to be understood as the exclusion of what is not connected.

original: phyogs nyid kyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs nyid kyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The property itself is the specific property.

original: chos nyid nges par gzung ba yin te /🔽gang la nyid kyi sgra yod pa //
analyzed: chos nyid nges par gzung ba yin te / gang la nyid kyi sgra yod pa //
translated: The property itself is ascertained.🔽The word “itself” is used when there is something else to be ascertained.

original: de las gzhan pa nges par gzung bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so zhes bstan pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa nges par gzung bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so zhes bstan pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement “in the same order.”

original: rjod byed yin par smra ba ni //
analyzed: rjod byed yin par smra ba ni //
translated: The statement that it is the means of expression is

original: gal te de dag tha dad pas //
analyzed: gal te de dag tha dad pas //
translated: If they are different,

original: zhes bya ba ste don tha dad pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste don tha dad pas so //
translated: That is, by the difference in meaning.

original: ngag gi don gyi rjes su 'gro ba bsal bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ngag gi don gyi rjes su 'gro ba bsal bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the meaning of speech is eliminated by the presence of the object,

original: de zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That is,

original: tha dad pa med par ji ltar 'gyur //🔽zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med par ji ltar 'gyur // zhes sbyar ro //
translated: How could there be no difference?

original: rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pas 'dod pa la sogs pa med pa ste rjes su 'gro ba med pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pas 'dod pa la sogs pa med pa ste rjes su 'gro ba med pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The exclusion is the non-existence of the thing, such as the non-existence of desire, because there is no presence. This is the meaning.

original: kho bos mthong ba sbyor ba med na de'i don brjod par 'dod pa ji ltar yin pa de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: kho bos mthong ba sbyor ba med na de'i don brjod par 'dod pa ji ltar yin pa de bstan pa ni /
translated: When the application of I see is not present, how can the object of desire be expressed? To show that,

original: gang gi ngag 'bras zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi ngag 'bras zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said, Whose speech is the result...

original: gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i 'jug pa'i yul des nas tshad ma gang yin pa des rtogs pa ni sbyor ba ma byas kyang don de rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i 'jug pa'i yul des nas tshad ma gang yin pa des rtogs pa ni sbyor ba ma byas kyang don de rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o//
translated: The object of engagement that is the exclusion of other, by that valid cognition, the understanding is the understanding of that object even without the application.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i bdag nyid kyis dngos por nges pa na rang gi ngo bo la nus pa med pa'i phyir mi 'dod pa la sogs pa skyon yang med do //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i bdag nyid kyis dngos por nges pa na rang gi ngo bo la nus pa med pa'i phyir mi 'dod pa la sogs pa skyon yang med do //
translated: When it is ascertained as an entity by the nature of exclusion, there is also no fault such as non-assertion due to the absence of capacity in its own nature.

original: dag ces bya ba tshig gi bdag nyid kho na yin gyi gsal ba la sogs pa gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni ngag rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dag ces bya ba tshig gi bdag nyid kho na yin gyi gsal ba la sogs pa gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni ngag rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word only indicates that it is the nature of speech itself, not something else like manifestation, and completing speech is the statement.

original: de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is different from that is manifestation, etc.

original: de dang tha dad pa med pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcad par bya ba tha dad pa las so //
analyzed: de dang tha dad pa med pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcad par bya ba tha dad pa las so //
translated: Because it is not different from that means from the difference of what is to be excluded.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i bdag nyid kyis dngos po nyid du nges pa yin gyi bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i bdag nyid kyis dngos po nyid du nges pa yin gyi bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: It is ascertained as an entity by the nature of exclusion, but not as a self,

original: bdag nyid la nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid la nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no capacity in a self.

original: ji ste dngos po yin la @272b zhes bya ba ni spyi'am nges 'phangs ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: ji ste dngos po yin la @272b zhes bya ba ni spyi'am nges 'phangs ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: If it is an entity, it is either a general or a specific implication.

original: 'brel pa ni rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: Connection is the universal.

original: tha dad kyang ni dbye ba yod kyang ngo //
analyzed: tha dad kyang ni dbye ba yod kyang ngo //
translated: although different, there is a difference.

original: 'brel pa'i phyir ni nges pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i phyir ni nges pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of the connection, because of the determination,

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the non-difference.

original: rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa dngos po'i dbye ba yin na / mngon sum ni tha mi dad par 'dzin pa yin te / gzhan 'di rang gi ngo bo la mi 'jug pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni tha dad ni dngos po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa dngos po'i dbye ba yin na / mngon sum ni tha mi dad par 'dzin pa yin te / gzhan 'di rang gi ngo bo la mi 'jug pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni tha dad ni dngos po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the difference of the thing is not the own nature, then perception is the apprehension of the non-different, because the other does not enter into the own nature. This is shown by the words: “The difference is the thing.”

original: rang nyid rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rang nyid rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of the self-concomitance.

original: zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because of the non-difference.

original: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos dag go //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos dag go //
translated: Both, i.e., the probandum and the other.

original: gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba ni / snang ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba ni / snang ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: That which is of what, i.e., of light, etc.

original: de zhes bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i gzhi'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i gzhi'o //
translated: That, i.e., the basis of light, etc.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni brten pa bum pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni brten pa bum pa'i'o //
translated: Of that, i.e., of the supported pot.

original: snam bu'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni rten la'o //
analyzed: snam bu'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni rten la'o //
translated: In the middle of the cloth, i.e., in the support.

original: bum pa'i zhes bya ba ni brten pa'i'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i zhes bya ba ni brten pa'i'o //
translated: Of the pot, i.e., of the supported.

original: snam bu'i zhes bya ba ni tha snyad byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: snam bu'i zhes bya ba ni tha snyad byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Cloth” is not to be applied as a conventional expression.

original: dngos po med pa'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
translated: The opponent’s position is stated in the line “In the middle of nonentity.”

original: dngos po la bzhin du dngos po med pa la yang gnas pa ni med pa gzhan nyid dang khyad par med pa yin la de ltar na yang khyab pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po la bzhin du dngos po med pa la yang gnas pa ni med pa gzhan nyid dang khyad par med pa yin la de ltar na yang khyab pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Just as with an entity, there is no abiding in a nonentity, which would be no different from another nonentity. To demonstrate that this is not a universal, it says:

original: don de rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: don de rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “That object by its very essence.”

original: rang gi ngo bos gnas pas khyab pa can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos gnas pas khyab pa can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not pervaded by abiding by its very essence.

original: khyad par med pa nyid du bstan pa ni gang zhig gang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par med pa nyid du bstan pa ni gang zhig gang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To demonstrate that it is not a universal, it says: “That which is in this.”

original: khyab pa can dbus su byed par ni mi nus te /
analyzed: khyab pa can dbus su byed par ni mi nus te /
translated: It is not possible to make a universal in the middle,

original: dum bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dum bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because it is not a part. To demonstrate this, it says:

original: dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis ni //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis ni // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Nonentity by its very essence.”

original: khyab pa can gyi dngos po rnams med pas sdud par mi byed par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyab pa can gyi dngos po rnams med pas sdud par mi byed par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since there are no entities that are universals, it is demonstrated that they do not include anything.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “By its own nature” means:

original: yod pa tsam gyi bar du gnas par byed pa ma yin pa ni sdud par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa tsam gyi bar du gnas par byed pa ma yin pa ni sdud par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It does not exist as a mere existent, and it does not endure.

original: dngos po ma 'dres par grub pa de'i phyir dngos med tshad ma nyid ces zer ba la /
analyzed: dngos po ma 'dres par grub pa de'i phyir dngos med tshad ma nyid ces zer ba la /
translated: Since it is established as a distinct entity, it is a valid cognition of non-existence.

original: dngos po med pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Non-existence” means:

original: 'on te khyab pa nyid med na 'on te sngar ni med pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te khyab pa nyid med na 'on te sngar ni med pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid do //
translated: If there is no pervasion, then there is no pervasion.

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid do //
translated: “Other” means:

original: ji skad du smras pas zhes bya ba ni bram ze spun zlas rgyus pas so //
analyzed: ji skad du smras pas zhes bya ba ni bram ze spun zlas rgyus pas so //
translated: As it is said, the two brothers, the Brahmins, are not distinct.

original: de las gzhan pa gnyis ni tha dad pa ma yin pa dag go //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa gnyis ni tha dad pa ma yin pa dag go //
translated: The other two are not distinct.

original: 'khrul par 'gyur ba ni ma 'dres pa rnams bsres pa'i phyir @273a * //
analyzed: 'khrul par 'gyur ba ni ma 'dres pa rnams bsres pa'i phyir @273a * //
translated: “Error” means mixing the distinct.

original: ro; ; ltos pa re re zhing ste sa mtshams re rer zhes bya bar ni rgol ba'o //
analyzed: ro; ; ltos pa re re zhing ste sa mtshams re rer zhes bya bar ni rgol ba'o //
translated: “Each dependence” means each boundary.

original: slar log pas 'gro ba ni dngos po'i dbye ba byed bas ma yin la /
analyzed: slar log pas 'gro ba ni dngos po'i dbye ba byed bas ma yin la /
translated: The return is not a division of the entity.

original: nye bar 'gro ba ni dbye bar byed par 'dod pa la rang dbang yin pas rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa dang / med pa yang rab tu dpog pa yin par bstan pa ni tshad mas grub pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'gro ba ni dbye bar byed par 'dod pa la rang dbang yin pas rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa dang / med pa yang rab tu dpog pa yin par bstan pa ni tshad mas grub pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The approach is the desire to divide, and the independence is the own nature. The demonstration of the non-difference is “established by valid cognition.”

original: rang nyid las tha dad pa yin na thams cad zil gyis non pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa ma yin par bstan pa ni ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid las tha dad pa yin na thams cad zil gyis non pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa ma yin par bstan pa ni ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were different from itself, it would be overwhelmed by everything, so the demonstration of its non-difference from itself is “by nature.”

original: tha dad ni tha dad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad ni tha dad par byed pa'o //
translated: The difference is the differentiation.

original: dngos po brjod pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i ngo bo brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po brjod pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i ngo bo brjod pa'o //
translated: The expression of the entity is the expression of the nature of the entity.

original: 'chol ba ni zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: 'chol ba ni zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: The confusion is the non-difference.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo zhen par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa ma brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni bum pa de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo zhen par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa ma brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni bum pa de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that the non-established own nature is not expressed is “that very pot.”

original: dngos po nyid rnam par gcod pa rnams kyi zhen par bya ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po nyid rnam par gcod pa rnams kyi zhen par bya ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The object itself is the object of determination, not anything else, because that is not understood.

original: ldog pa ni de las gzhan pa spyir gyur pa brjod bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ldog pa ni de las gzhan pa spyir gyur pa brjod bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The absence of exclusion is taught to be the general, which is not the object of expression.

original: ldog med pa nyid spyi dang ni //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog med pa nyid spyi dang ni // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The absence of exclusion is the general.

original: spyi'i rtog pa zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i spyi'i rtog pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i rtog pa zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i spyi'i rtog pa'o //
translated: The conception of the general is the conception of the general absence of exclusion.

original: dang po'i tha dad par rtogs ba gnyis pa mthong ba la tha mi dad par de nyid 'di'o zhes rtogs pa las de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: dang po'i tha dad par rtogs ba gnyis pa mthong ba la tha mi dad par de nyid 'di'o zhes rtogs pa las de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The first is the realization of difference. The second is the realization of nondifference. The realization that this is just that is from the realization that this is just that. Therefore, difference and nondifference are said to be the same.

original: 'on te tha dad par yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te tha dad par yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, if the first is seen as different, the second is seen as nondifferent.

original: dang po'i tha dad par mthong ba ni rang gi yul de ma yin pa las log par ston par byed cing de las bzlog pa rnam par gcod par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dang po'i tha dad par mthong ba ni rang gi yul de ma yin pa las log par ston par byed cing de las bzlog pa rnam par gcod par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The first is taught to show the difference of its object from that which is not its object and to demonstrate the exclusion of that.

original: gal te tha dad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te tha dad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is different, then it is not included.

original: gnyis pa yang de ltar yin par bstan pa ni / tha dad med par zhes sdud pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa yang de ltar yin par bstan pa ni / tha dad med par zhes sdud pa'o //
translated: The second is also shown to be the same: “If it is not different, then it is included.”🔽“Like the cognition of silver in a shell” is the example.

original: nyi phyis la dngul gyi shes pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni don yin no zhes bstan pa ni / gcig la ni zhes bya ba ste / dngul la sogs pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: nyi phyis la dngul gyi shes pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni don yin no zhes bstan pa ni / gcig la ni zhes bya ba ste / dngul la sogs pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: “In one” is the cognition of silver, etc.

original: 'di ma yin no zhes sgrub bar byed pas bsdus pa 'di ni de lta ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ma yin no zhes sgrub bar byed pas bsdus pa 'di ni de lta ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: “This is not so” is the refutation.

original: gal te spyi de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te spyi de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If that universal” is the summary.

original: 'di la yang bsdu ba gcig nyid la gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni phan tshun tha dad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang bsdu ba gcig nyid la gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni phan tshun tha dad ces bya ba'o //
translated: Here also, the inclusion is shown to be contradictory in one: “If they are mutually different, then they are not included.”

original: snga na tha dad pa phyis tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: snga na tha dad pa phyis tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If they are different before, then they are not included later.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no snyam du sems pa la rang bzhin tha dad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no snyam du sems pa la rang bzhin tha dad ces bya ba ste /
translated: If they are included by their very nature, then they are not different.

original: dngos po tha mi dad pa'i @273b ngo bor mthong ba las tha mi dad pa yin na phyin ci log nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po tha mi dad pa'i @273b ngo bor mthong ba las tha mi dad pa yin na phyin ci log nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it is seen as having the same nature as the thing, then it is understood as being non-different from it.

original: de spyi ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa'i shes pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de spyi ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa'i shes pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is not a universal, then it is refuted by the cognition that contradicts it.

original: 'on te spyi dang ldan pas phyi yin na ste / gsal ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba de dag tsam mi rgol ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te spyi dang ldan pas phyi yin na ste / gsal ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba de dag tsam mi rgol ba'o //
translated: But if it is external because it possesses a universal, then that is just the nature of the manifestation.

original: de la spyi gzhan zhes bya ba ni lan yin te ;
analyzed: de la spyi gzhan zhes bya ba ni lan yin te ;
translated: There, the other universal is the answer.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par grags pa'i ngo bo gnyis la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par grags pa'i ngo bo gnyis la'o //
translated: There means in the two natures that are known as different and non-different.

original: de gnyis zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'i dngos po gnyis so //
analyzed: de gnyis zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'i dngos po gnyis so //
translated: Those two means the two things that have the natures of being different and non-different.

original: spyi'i rang bzhin gnyis la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo la yin na'o //
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin gnyis la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo la yin na'o //
translated: In the two natures of the universal means in the natures of being different and non-different.

original: mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba ni de dang ldan pa'i spyi la yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba ni de dang ldan pa'i spyi la yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the same because it is in the universal that possesses it.

original: gsal ba la ma yin zhes bya ba ni spyi'i rang bzhin gnyis nyid kyis bar du chod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar sbyar te de la spyi gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dis bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba la ma yin zhes bya ba ni spyi'i rang bzhin gnyis nyid kyis bar du chod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar sbyar te de la spyi gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dis bshad pa yin no //
translated: “Not in the manifestation” means that the manifestation is obstructed by the two natures of the universal.🔽The universal is different, etc.

original: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gi tha dad pa la yang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo yod pa de'i phyir gsal ba la mtshungs so zhes bya ba de'i khyad par las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gi tha dad pa la yang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo yod pa de'i phyir gsal ba la mtshungs so zhes bya ba de'i khyad par las byung ba yin te /
translated: The difference and non-difference of the difference also have the nature of non-difference. Therefore, it is the same in the case of the manifestation. This is the distinction.

original: bar du gcod par 'gyur ba med pra 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni 'on te khyad pra dang spyi dag ces bya ba te /
analyzed: bar du gcod par 'gyur ba med pra 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni 'on te khyad pra dang spyi dag ces bya ba te /
translated: If it is said that there is no obstruction, then it is said that the distinction and the universal, etc.

original: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag go //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag go //
translated: Are different and non-different.

original: de dag gi zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gi yin pa dag go //
analyzed: de dag gi zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gi yin pa dag go //
translated: “Of those” means of the different and non-different.

original: spyi gzhan zhes bya ba ni spyi de de'i ngo bo de dag gi yang spyi ni gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi gzhan zhes bya ba ni spyi de de'i ngo bo de dag gi yang spyi ni gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “The universal is different” means that the universal of those natures is different. This is the meaning.

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni phyi ma'i spyi la ltos nas snga ma'i spyi'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni phyi ma'i spyi la ltos nas snga ma'i spyi'o //
translated: “If that were so” refers to the universal of the latter in relation to the universal of the former.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo yin na gsal ba rnams yin te tha dad par snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo yin na gsal ba rnams yin te tha dad par snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: “If it were such a nature” refers to the particulars, because they appear as different.

original: spyi dang spyi'i rang bzhin dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi dang spyi'i rang bzhin dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: “The universal and the nature of the universal” are explained.

original: mtshungs pa nyid ni mtshungs pa'i blo'i yul nyid snga ma'i spyi yod na gsal ba la mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid ni mtshungs pa'i blo'i yul nyid snga ma'i spyi yod na gsal ba la mi 'gyur ro //
translated: “Sameness” is the object of the same cognition. If the universal of the former exists, it would not be the particulars.

original: ci las she na / snga ma'i spyi dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci las she na / snga ma'i spyi dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why? Because it would not be related to the universal of the former.

original: mtha'i zhes bya ba ni da lta bu'i spyi'i phyis brtags pas so //
analyzed: mtha'i zhes bya ba ni da lta bu'i spyi'i phyis brtags pas so //
translated: “The end” is the universal of the present, which is imagined later.

original: des na gcig kyang zhes bya ba ni spyi'i ma yin pa dang / de'i ngo bo dag gi ma yin pa dang / de'i spyi'i ma yin pa dang gsal ba'i ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: des na gcig kyang zhes bya ba ni spyi'i ma yin pa dang / de'i ngo bo dag gi ma yin pa dang / de'i spyi'i ma yin pa dang gsal ba'i ma yin pa ste /
translated: “Therefore, even one” is not the universal, not of that nature, not of that universal, and not of the particulars.

original: khyad par med pas khyad par can nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pas khyad par can nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is unreasonable for a qualifier to be without a difference.

original: dngos po can ma yin pa'i yul rnams yin no //
analyzed: dngos po can ma yin pa'i yul rnams yin no //
translated: The objects are not possessed of entities.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa med pa ni rang gi ngo bo'i mthar thug pa nyid kyis tha dad @274a * //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa med pa ni rang gi ngo bo'i mthar thug pa nyid kyis tha dad @274a * //
translated: The non-existence of the complete is due to the fact that the ultimate nature of a thing is not different from the thing itself.

original: phyir ro // spyi'i ngo bo dag tha dad pas gsal ba nyid la yang gzhan med pa na gsal ba la yang de ltar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phyir ro // spyi'i ngo bo dag tha dad pas gsal ba nyid la yang gzhan med pa na gsal ba la yang de ltar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: Since the natures of universals are different, there is no other manifestation.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa yod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa yod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The existence of the complete is also like that.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni spyi'i ngo bo dag la'o //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni spyi'i ngo bo dag la'o //
translated: From that means from the natures of universals.

original: de dag gi tha dad pa nyid kyis gsal bar 'gyur ba dag gi spyi'i ngo bo ma yin na /
analyzed: de dag gi tha dad pa nyid kyis gsal bar 'gyur ba dag gi spyi'i ngo bo ma yin na /
translated: If those were not the universal natures of the manifestations that are different from them,

original: de las tha mi dad pa snga ma la spyi ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de las tha mi dad pa snga ma la spyi ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: then the former would not be the universal of that which is not different from it.

original: mtha'i mtshungs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mtha'i mtshungs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The similarity of the end is stated.

original: de las tha mi dad pas snga ma yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba yang ngo //
analyzed: de las tha mi dad pas snga ma yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba yang ngo //
translated: Since it is not different from that, the former is also like that, i.e., the manifestation is also like that.

original: spyi ji lta ba bzhin du tha dad pa rnams kyang tha dad pa yang zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: spyi ji lta ba bzhin du tha dad pa rnams kyang tha dad pa yang zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Just as the universal is, so are the different things.

original: de bzhin du gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated in the words, “In the same way, if…”

original: gsal ba tha dad pa spyis gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba tha dad pa spyis gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is that the difference of the manifestation does not make the universal different.

original: gal te tha dad pa ma yin na spyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni gsal ba tha dad pa med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa ma yin na spyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni gsal ba tha dad pa med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not different, the teaching that the universal is not different is stated in the words “if the manifestation is not different.”

original: dngos po'i ngo bo 'dzin pa la cha shas dang cha shas can nyid ma yin la /
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo 'dzin pa la cha shas dang cha shas can nyid ma yin la /
translated: The apprehension of the nature of an entity is not a part and a whole.

original: gzhan la ni der 'gyur ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni gal te rtogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan la ni der 'gyur ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni gal te rtogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The teaching that it is just so in the case of others is stated in the words “if the cognition.”

original: gang gi phyir ba lang ngo zhes bya bas ba lang ma yin pa las log pa nyid dmigs kyis bsal ba nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ba lang ngo zhes bya bas ba lang ma yin pa las log pa nyid dmigs kyis bsal ba nyid du nges pa yin no //
translated: Because the statement “it is a cow” determines the exclusion of what is not a cow, the exclusion of what is not a cow is ascertained.

original: tha dad med pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: tha dad med pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: “Nondifference” is the nature of the manifestation.

original: tha dad 'dre ba zhes bya ba ni rigs mi mthun pa dang 'dres pa de la srid pa'o //🔽de la rtog pa gzhag pa yin gyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin bu ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha dad 'dre ba zhes bya ba ni rigs mi mthun pa dang 'dres pa de la srid pa'o // de la rtog pa gzhag pa yin gyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin bu ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: “Mixing with difference” is the mixing with what is of a different type.

original: yul thag ring po na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul thag ring po na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The positing of the conception in that is taught, not as it is in reality, in the words “when one sees from a distance.”

original: de nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal ba las so //
analyzed: de nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal ba las so //
translated: Because it is not different from that, i.e., from the manifestation.

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa ni log pa dang log pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa ni log pa dang log pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Difference and non-difference are the opposite of non-difference.

original: yul thag ring po dang lhan cig byed pa'i mig ni tha dad pa'i spyi 'dzin pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: yul thag ring po dang lhan cig byed pa'i mig ni tha dad pa'i spyi 'dzin pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The eye, along with the distant object, is the apprehender of the different universal.

original: de lta yin du zin kyang tha dad pa yin te zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'o //🔽spyi min zhes bya ba ni / mtshungs pa rnams kyi ngo bo yin //
analyzed: de lta yin du zin kyang tha dad pa yin te zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'o // spyi min zhes bya ba ni / mtshungs pa rnams kyi ngo bo yin //
translated: Even if that were so, it is different, i.e., the opposite.

original: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: It is not a universal, i.e., by the reasoning that a universal is the nature of similar things.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa nyid las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa nyid las so //
translated: From that, i.e., from similarity.

original: gzhan pa ni spyir 'dod pa gsal bar 'gyur te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan pa ni spyir 'dod pa gsal bar 'gyur te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The other, i.e., the universal, is accepted as a manifestation, because it is different.

original: 'o na gsal ba la zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: 'o na gsal ba la zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: Well then, the manifestation, etc.

original: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa la yang ngo //
translated: Even then, i.e., even in error.

original: be'u ma tshol ba na ma he la sogs pa'i tshogs mang po bor nas rang gi spyi'i dbang gis ba lang @274b tshogs su nye bar 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i rigs pas kha cig la 'jug par mthon ba'i phyir de lta bu rtogs pa yin no zhes zer ba
analyzed: be'u ma tshol ba na ma he la sogs pa'i tshogs mang po bor nas rang gi spyi'i dbang gis ba lang @274b tshogs su nye bar 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i rigs pas kha cig la 'jug par mthon ba'i phyir de lta bu rtogs pa yin no zhes zer ba
translated: It is understood that way because of the reasoning that says, “It is seen to engage some by that.”

original: la / de las gzhan dag las ldog pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: la / de las gzhan dag las ldog pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “By the exclusion of other than that.”

original: rnam par rtog pas kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul nye bar ston par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul nye bar ston par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Also by conception” means that it is accepted as just the revealer of the object of engagement.

original: dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa nyid do zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa nyid do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that it is not the object of an entity.

original: sgrub pa'i bdag nyid kyis ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i bdag nyid kyis ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis yin no //
translated: It is not by the nature of affirmation, but rather by the characteristic of exclusion.

original: dum bu ma yin par rtog pa yod pa de dag tsam gyis skyes bu rnams 'jug pa yin gyi bden pa dang cig shos nyid kyi dbye ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dum bu ma yin par rtog pa yod pa de dag tsam gyis skyes bu rnams 'jug pa yin gyi bden pa dang cig shos nyid kyi dbye ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that people engage by just those conceptions of non-part, not by the division of truth and otherwise.

original: ldog pa'i 'brel yul zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i 'brel yul zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The object of the relation of exclusion is called the universal.

original: dbye ba byed pa po'i ngo bo rnam par rtog pas dmigs kyis bsal ba ma lus pa'i thun mong ni spyi yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbye ba byed pa po'i ngo bo rnam par rtog pas dmigs kyis bsal ba ma lus pa'i thun mong ni spyi yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The author of the divisions, the nature of which is conceptual, is the universal, not the particular, since it is the common object of the exclusion of all the rest.🔽This is taught by “to whatever extent.

original: ci tsam gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci tsam gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “How much?”

original: tha dad ces bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa ste mi slu ba can no //🔽dong bu'i 'o ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tha dad ces bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa ste mi slu ba can no // dong bu'i 'o ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Different” means exclusion, which is non-deceptive.

original: blang bya ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: blang bya ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “It would be like the milk of a barren woman” means it is not to be accepted.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni snyad la yang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni snyad la yang ngo //
translated: “In that case” means in the case of the conventional.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni lan yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni lan yin te /
translated: “Therefore” is the answer.

original: tha snyad ni mthong ba la brten nas tshad ma yin gyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to; ;
analyzed: tha snyad ni mthong ba la brten nas tshad ma yin gyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to; ;
translated: The conventional is valid cognition based on seeing, not by itself alone.

original: don dam pa la skyon bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don dam pa la skyon bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the error in the ultimate is:

original: 'di chu klung 'di na rtag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di chu klung 'di na rtag ces bya ba'o //
translated: “This river is permanent.”

original: 'on te tha snyad 'di gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te tha snyad 'di gang yin zhe na /
translated: “But what is this conventional?”

original: cha shas pas rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: cha shas pas rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that the part-possessor is the object of knowledge is:

original: rnam gcod 'bras can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam gcod 'bras can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The result of exclusion.

original: yod pa ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: Existence is exclusion.

original: ci las she na rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci las she na rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: From what? From the object of knowledge.

original: yon tan ma lus phun tshogs pa //
analyzed: yon tan ma lus phun tshogs pa //
translated: The one who is endowed with all good qualities

original: 'byung 'gyur myu gu 'thon gyur la //
analyzed: 'byung 'gyur myu gu 'thon gyur la //
translated: will come forth from the sprout that has come forth.

original: phrag dog mes gdungs de las gang //
analyzed: phrag dog mes gdungs de las gang //
translated: The one who protects that from the fire of jealousy

original: srung nus rgyal ba can du 'gyur //
analyzed: srung nus rgyal ba can du 'gyur //
translated: will become the Victorious One.

original: des par gzung ba ni rnam par gcod par byed pa yang thams cad du ma yin zhing /
analyzed: des par gzung ba ni rnam par gcod par byed pa yang thams cad du ma yin zhing /
translated: The exclusion is not always the object of the exclusion,

original: gnas skabs su brjod par 'dod pa la yin te /
analyzed: gnas skabs su brjod par 'dod pa la yin te /
translated: but is in the context of what is intended to be expressed.🔽The demonstration that it is not the opponent is:

original: zla bo nyid min pas zhes bstan pa ni der yang zla bo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zla bo nyid min pas zhes bstan pa ni der yang zla bo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent is not the same.

original: phyogs la yod dam med pa zhes bya ba'i rim pa la /
analyzed: phyogs la yod dam med pa zhes bya ba'i rim pa la /
translated: The sequence of “existing or not existing in the subject” is:

original: phyogs kyi chos zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: The expression “property of the subject”🔽is for the purpose of excluding non-existence in the subject.

original: phyogs la med pa nyid sel bar byed pa'o zhes nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu la der tha snyad 'dogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs la med pa nyid sel bar byed pa'o zhes nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu la der tha snyad 'dogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that the result of the ascertainment is conventionally designated as that is:

original: des na mi ldan rnam @275a * //
analyzed: des na mi ldan rnam @275a * //
translated: Therefore, it is not possessed.🔽

original: gcod pas // zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcod pas // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “by the exclusion of non-possession.🔽”

original: khyad par dang 'brel pa yin yang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i nges par gzung ba yin pas 'dres pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par dang 'brel pa yin yang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i nges par gzung ba yin pas 'dres pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Even though there is a connection with a distinction, it is a distinction because of the exclusion of possession by another.

original: gal te 'phong skyen pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te 'phong skyen pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that it is a mixture,🔽it is like saying “a skilled archer.”

original: sgra las khyad par gyi don yang khyad par can nyid yin pa de'i phyir de nyid kyi des par gzung ba dang sbyor ba dang sbyor ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgra las khyad par gyi don yang khyad par can nyid yin pa de'i phyir de nyid kyi des par gzung ba dang sbyor ba dang sbyor ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since the meaning of a distinction is a distinguisher from sound, therefore, it is taught that it is a distinguisher and a connection with that.

original: khyad par du ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyad par du ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “ In particular” means

original: sgra'i tshul du gnas skabs las mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin la gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i tshul du gnas skabs las mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin la gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: that in the mode of sound, it is the exclusion of non-possession from the context, and it is not otherwise. This is the analysis.

original: de bstan pa ni 'dir ni skabs kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni 'dir ni skabs kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of that is “here, in the context.”

original: dngos po'i chos ni don to //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos ni don to //
translated: The meaning is the quality of an entity.

original: de 'di'i rnam par dbye ba chod mas grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de 'di'i rnam par dbye ba chod mas grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The proof of the analysis of that is taught.

original: 'dir nges par gzung ba'i don zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir nges par gzung ba'i don zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, it is called the “intended meaning.”🔽In this way, the opponent’s argument is shown to be a non sequitur and to contradict valid cognition.🔽The phrase “by the exclusion of what is other” is used.🔽The phrase “in the case of inference itself” is used.🔽The phrase “difference and connection” is used.

original: de lta na ni rnam par dbye ba med par rgol ba tshad ma dang 'gal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni rnam par dbye ba med par rgol ba tshad ma dang 'gal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The phrase “difference and connection” is used.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas zhes bya ba'o //🔽rjes su dpag pa nyid la rtogs par zhes bya ba ni khyad par la sogs pa zhes bya ba nas rtogs pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

translated: The phrase “difference and connection” is

original: spyi brjod pa la yang dgos pa gzhan yin te /
analyzed: spyi brjod pa la yang dgos pa gzhan yin te /
translated: The general statement has another purpose.🔽The common and uncommon are taught in order to show that the reason is a property of the subject and that the reason is not contradictory.🔽The remaining are taught in order to show that the proof is the opposite of the discordant side, because the remaining are not unestablished.🔽The remaining three are taught in order to show that the object of inference is the exclusion of the discordant side, because the remaining are the principal.

original: ldog pa can tha dad rjes su 'gro ba can yang gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i rgol ba bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dag go //
analyzed: ldog pa can tha dad rjes su 'gro ba can yang gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i rgol ba bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dag go //

original: dgos pa gzhan lhag ma ma log pa nyid kyi phyir sgrub byed ma yin pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs las log ba sgrub byed yin te de bstan pa ni lhag ma zhes bya ba'o //🔽mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la 'jug go //🔽nges par zhes bya ba ni ldog pa can dang rjes su 'gro ba can no //

original: lhag ma zhes bya bas ldog pa gtso bo nyid kyis rnam par gcod pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i yul nyid gsal bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni lhag ma gsum zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes bya bas ldog pa gtso bo nyid kyis rnam par gcod pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i yul nyid gsal bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni lhag ma gsum zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The remaining three are taught in order to show that the object of inference is the exclusion of the discordant side, because the remaining are the principal.🔽The remaining three are taught in order to show that the object of

original: rtag sogs la zhes bya bar brjod pa nyid @275b kyis rnam par dbye ba ni rtag pa dang mi rtag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag sogs la zhes bya bar brjod pa nyid @275b kyis rnam par dbye ba ni rtag pa dang mi rtag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The analysis by the words “permanent, etc.” is “permanent, impermanent, etc.”

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyis nyid kyis gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag pa rnams ni rtag dang mi rtag rtsol byung rnams la'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyis nyid kyis gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag pa rnams ni rtag dang mi rtag rtsol byung rnams la'o //
translated: The two types of objects of comprehension, permanent and impermanent, are established by the existence and nonexistence of the similar class.

original: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi gnyid kyis byas dang mnyan bya rtsol byung rnams ni bar du gsum dag la'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi gnyid kyis byas dang mnyan bya rtsol byung rnams ni bar du gsum dag la'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The three types of objects of comprehension, produced, audible, and arisen from effort, are established by the nonexistence of the similar class, the existence of the dissimilar class, and both the existence and nonexistence of the dissimilar class.

original: rtag pa ni ther zug pa yin la mi rtag pa ni 'di la mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ni ther zug pa yin la mi rtag pa ni 'di la mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
translated: Permanence is eternal and impermanence is its opposite.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyis nyid kyis mi rtag pa rtsol byung reg min te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyis nyid kyis mi rtag pa rtsol byung reg min te /
translated: The two types of objects of comprehension, impermanent and arisen from effort, are established by the existence and nonexistence of the similar class and the existence and nonexistence of the dissimilar class.

original: gsum po rnams ni rtsol byung min dang mi rtag ces bya ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: gsum po rnams ni rtsol byung min dang mi rtag ces bya ba rnams la'o //
translated: The three are not arisen from effort and impermanent.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni go byed kyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni go byed kyis so //
translated: “By another” means by an intimation.

original: rgyu go bya la go byed 'khrul pa srid par bstan pa ni rgyu ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu go bya la go byed 'khrul pa srid par bstan pa ni rgyu ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is possible for the cause to be mistaken with regard to the intimated is “The cause . . .”

original: 'bras bu rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba yang ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba yang ngo //
translated: “The two kinds of effect” means the effect that has arisen and the effect that has not arisen.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'i 'bras bu bzhin du rgyu'i de ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'i 'bras bu byas pa yin la /🔽'bras bu nyid ni mtshan nyid kyis yin no snyam du sems pa la khas len pa ni rgyu'i de ma thag tu zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'i 'bras bu bzhin du rgyu'i de ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'i 'bras bu byas pa yin la / 'bras bu nyid ni mtshan nyid kyis yin no snyam du sems pa la khas len pa ni rgyu'i de ma thag tu zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Just as the effect of a cognition that arises immediately after the effort is made is made by the cause, so the effect of a cognition that arises immediately after the cause is made.🔽The effect itself is by nature. The statement that this is accepted is “The effect that arises immediately after the cause . . .”

original: 'bras bu yang khyab byed yin pas rang bzhin kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang khyab byed yin pas rang bzhin kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The effect is also a pervader. Therefore it is only natural.

original: shes pa ni dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la ji ltar dmigs pa med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la ji ltar dmigs pa med ces bya ba'o //
translated: But isn’t consciousness the nature of things?

original: yod na kha cig tu 'byung la kha gcig tu mi 'byung ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag go //
analyzed: yod na kha cig tu 'byung la kha gcig tu mi 'byung ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag go //
translated: If it exists, then it is either present everywhere or not present everywhere.

original: de ltar yang zer ba ni rkang mig pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zer ba ni rkang mig pa'o //
translated: The one who says this is Akṣapāda.

original: bshad pa byed pa ni mu stegs sha ba ra'o //
analyzed: bshad pa byed pa ni mu stegs sha ba ra'o //
translated: The author is Śabarasvāmin.

original: gsal ba dmigs pa nyid yin par ci las shes zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: gsal ba dmigs pa nyid yin par ci las shes zhes zer ba la /
translated: How do you know that the manifestation is the object?

original: gsal ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The manifestation is the object.

original: sngar yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe rig pas 'bras bu nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: sngar yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe rig pas 'bras bu nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
translated: The existence of the manifestation is the effect of the existence of the object.

original: thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the invariable concomitance, because it is present in all cases.🔽The manifestation also exists.

original: gsal ba yang yod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ba la / thams cad thams cad la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba yang yod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ba la / thams cad thams cad la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the pervasion.

original: nges par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu la bum pa kho na yin gyi snam bu ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: nges par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu la bum pa kho na yin gyi snam bu ma yin pa'am /
translated: The ascertainment is this: in a lump of clay, only a pot exists, not a cloth.

original: yang na byed pa kho nas rgyu las byung ba yin gyi snga na ni ma yin no //🔽bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'i bya ba las @276a * //
analyzed: yang na byed pa kho nas rgyu las byung ba yin gyi snga na ni ma yin no // bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'i bya ba las @276a * //
translated: Or else, it is only by the action that it arises from the cause, not prior to that.

original: snga rol du'o //
analyzed: snga rol du'o //
translated: The opposite is prior to the action of the agent.

original: phyis zhes bya ba ni dus phyis so //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba ni dus phyis so //
translated: Later is after the time.

original: dmigs pa ni rtogs pa ni ste yod pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni rtogs pa ni ste yod pa'o //
translated: The object is the existent that is realized.

original: rtogs pa ste dmigs pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ste dmigs pa yod pa'o //
translated: The object, that is, the existent, is realized.

original: de yang ni nges pa'i yang byed pa ste byed pa po rnams kyis bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ni nges pa'i yang byed pa ste byed pa po rnams kyis bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: And that is the definite, the action, not the action of the agents.

original: gsal ba'i dngos po byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni yod na 'ang zhes bya ba ste nye bar bsdu ba yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dngos po byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni yod na 'ang zhes bya ba ste nye bar bsdu ba yin te /
translated: The teaching that the manifest thing is not the action is “even if it exists” and so on, which is a summary.

original: de ni 'di ltar rdza mkhan gyis 'bad pa'i de ma thag nyid du shes bzhin pa'i bum pa bzhin du sgra yang yin gyi mar me'i 'bad pa'i de ma thag tu shes bzhin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rdza mkhan gyis 'bad pa'i de ma thag nyid du shes bzhin pa'i bum pa bzhin du sgra yang yin gyi mar me'i 'bad pa'i de ma thag tu shes bzhin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is like this: sound is like a pot that is known immediately after the effort of the potter, but it is not like the light that is known immediately after the effort of the lamp.

original: yod pa'i shes pa ni 'bad pa dang 'bad pa med kyang 'byung ba yin gyi sgra ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
analyzed: yod pa'i shes pa ni 'bad pa dang 'bad pa med kyang 'byung ba yin gyi sgra ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the verse is that consciousness exists both with and without effort, but sound does not.

original: de ni 'di ltar shes pa ji snyed pa yang sgra med pa nyid la yin pa'i phyir shes pa la sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni de dang don gcig par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi yod pa nyid la tshad ma ma yin par bstan pa ni
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes pa ji snyed pa yang sgra med pa nyid la yin pa'i phyir shes pa la sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni de dang don gcig par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi yod pa nyid la tshad ma ma yin par bstan pa ni
translated: Since consciousness is not without sound, recognition of what was previously seen in consciousness is the reason for the identity of meaning, but it is not a valid cognition for existence.

original: / 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas slar 'tsho ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: / 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas slar 'tsho ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The explanation that it is not a valid cognition for existence is from “But how?” up to “it is not a living being.”

original: de ni 'di'o zhes bya bar gzhi mthun pa nyid ni dbang po'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di'o zhes bya bar gzhi mthun pa nyid ni dbang po'i yul ma yin te /
translated: “This is it” is not a common locus, because it is not the object of the sense faculties.

original: dran pas phan btags pa'i mig ro'i yul can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dran pas phan btags pa'i mig ro'i yul can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation that it is not the object of the eye faculty assisted by memory is

original: dran pa'i don la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i don la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The object of memory.”

original: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni don la mi slu ba can no //
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni don la mi slu ba can no //
translated: “Realization” means non-deceptive with respect to the object.

original: rang gi rnam pa la don du zhen pas dran pa la gzhal bya med pa'i phyir snang bzhin pa'i de dang gcig nyid med pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa la don du zhen pas dran pa la gzhal bya med pa'i phyir snang bzhin pa'i de dang gcig nyid med pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since memory is attached to its own aspect as an object, the object of evaluation does not exist. Therefore, it is taught that it is not the same as the present appearance:

original: dran pa tshad ma ma yin phyir //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa tshad ma ma yin phyir // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because memory is not a valid cognition.

original: chos ni ngo bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni ngo bor gyur pa'o //
translated: The word “dharma” means “nature.”

original: sngar mthong bas 'dus byas pa'i mthong ba gnyis pa snang bzhin pa la sngar mthong ba nyid rig pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: sngar mthong bas 'dus byas pa'i mthong ba gnyis pa snang bzhin pa la sngar mthong ba nyid rig pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: When the second seeing is produced by the previous seeing, one thinks, “I am aware of the previous seeing in the present appearance.”🔽In response, it is said:

original: snga ma'i dus dang 'brel pa ni //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: snga ma'i dus dang 'brel pa ni // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The connection with the previous time

original: sngar mthong ba nyid 'dzin pa kho na la 'jig rten pa dran pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngar mthong ba nyid 'dzin pa kho na la 'jig rten pa dran pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the world calls the mere apprehension of the previous seeing “memory.”

original: de'i don med pa mthong ba las //
analyzed: de'i don med pa mthong ba las //
translated: When the object does not exist,

original: de'i tshe tha snyad snga ma bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe tha snyad snga ma bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the convention is the same as before is:

original: dngos po tsam zhig snang ba ni ;🔽; zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po tsam zhig snang ba ni ;🔽; zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The mere appearance of an entity

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni mthong ba la yul dang dus la sogs pa'i nges pa med pa 'dzin pa ni rtag pa nyid du snang ba yin te /
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ni mthong ba la yul dang dus la sogs pa'i nges pa med pa 'dzin pa ni rtag pa nyid du snang ba yin te /
translated: First, the non-apprehension of a restriction of place, time, etc. in perception is the appearance of permanence.

original: de de'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / med pa'i yul nyid ma yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: de de'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / med pa'i yul nyid ma yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: Because that is its characteristic, and because it is not a non-existent object.

original: rnam bcad yod pa'i med pa can //
analyzed: rnam bcad yod pa'i med pa can //
translated: The exclusion of existence is non-existence.

original: yul dus dag la @276b dngos po gang //
analyzed: yul dus dag la @276b dngos po gang //
translated: Whatever thing there is in a place and time,🔽it is not permanent.

original: de ni rtag pa'i min zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de ni rtag pa'i min zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: That is the reasoning.

original: zhes zer ba de ni de nyid du mi 'dzin pa kho na de dgag pa yin par bstan pa ni dus kyi cha kun zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes zer ba de ni de nyid du mi 'dzin pa kho na de dgag pa yin par bstan pa ni dus kyi cha kun zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is not apprehended as just that, and the negation of that is taught in “all parts of time.”

original: chos can zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'i dngos po de'o //
analyzed: chos can zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'i dngos po de'o //
translated: The subject is the thing to be understood.

original: ji ltar gcig nyid 'jug bzhin pa la gcig nyid bden pa de bzhin du gzhan yang 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni gcig cig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gcig nyid 'jug bzhin pa la gcig nyid bden pa de bzhin du gzhan yang 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni gcig cig ces bya ba'o //
translated: Just as one instance of oneness is engaged, so too would another be.

original: lan ni cis ma rtogs zhes bya ba ste cis tshad ma ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: lan ni cis ma rtogs zhes bya ba ste cis tshad ma ma yin pa'o //
translated: The question is, “Why is it not understood?” That is, why is it not a valid cognition?

original: bden pa dang mi bden pa dag las yang de ci'i phyir ma yin zhes bstan pa ni bdag dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bden pa dang mi bden pa dag las yang de ci'i phyir ma yin zhes bstan pa ni bdag dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Why is it not so? He answers: “because of the self.”

original: bden pa nyid mi bden pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bden pa nyid mi bden pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is contradictory to say that what is true is not true.

original: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni tha dad pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa la ldog pa can gyi gtan tshigs yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni tha dad pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa la ldog pa can gyi gtan tshigs yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Since recognition of what was previously seen does not exist in a different, heterogeneous, thing, it is a reason that excludes what is not the same.

original: 'on te gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “But if it is different” means:

original: khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba'i 'dra ba nyid sngar mthong bas 'dus byas pa'i 'dra ba mthong ba na /
analyzed: khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba'i 'dra ba nyid sngar mthong bas 'dus byas pa'i 'dra ba mthong ba na /
translated: If the similarity called “otherness” is not the same as the similarity seen previously,

original: bregs nas skyes pa'i skra la sogs pa tha dad pa yang sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yin par bstan pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bregs nas skyes pa'i skra la sogs pa tha dad pa yang sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yin par bstan pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the recognition of what was previously seen would not exist in a different thing. He demonstrates this: “This is not so.”

original: skra lo ni bregs nas skyes pa'i skra'o //
analyzed: skra lo ni bregs nas skyes pa'i skra'o //
translated: “Hair and nails” are the hair and nails that grow after they have been cut.

original: zhig pa dang ma zhig pa dag gcig pa nyid gzhal bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhig pa dang ma zhig pa dag gcig pa nyid gzhal bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The refutation of the thesis that the destroyed and the nondestroyed are the same object of knowledge is:

original: snga ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The nature of the former . . .”🔽The refutation of the thesis that there is a valid cognition of that is:

original: 'di la tshad ma yang med par bstan pa ni zhig pa gang du yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la tshad ma yang med par bstan pa ni zhig pa gang du yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The destroyed is not perceived anywhere . . .”

original: sngar mthong ba'i 'du byed pa nyid las nags de'o zhes 'dra bar yang rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba'i 'du byed pa nyid las nags de'o zhes 'dra bar yang rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: “But isn’t it understood that the forest is the same as the previously seen conditioned factors?”

original: de'i phyir de gcig pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de gcig pa nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is the same.🔽Because it is in accordance with the experience.

original: nyams su myong ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni de dag dang lhan cig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni de dag dang lhan cig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is: “If it were the same . . .”

original: snga ma nyid dang 'dra ba ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: snga ma nyid dang 'dra ba ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ma yin te /
translated: The response to the objection that it is not dissimilar to the former is: “It is not dissimilar . . .”

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa bzhin du dbang po'i yul yin gyi gcig nyid ni ma yin te nye ba ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa bzhin du dbang po'i yul yin gyi gcig nyid ni ma yin te nye ba ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not dissimilar because it is the object of the sense faculties, but it is not the same because it is not present.

original: sngar nyams su myong ba ma dran na rtogs pa ma yin te de'i rtogs pa nyid dran pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar nyams su myong ba ma dran na rtogs pa ma yin te de'i rtogs pa nyid dran pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the former experience is not remembered, it is not understood, because the understanding of that is memory.

original: mi dran nam mtshan nyid mi mthun pa la sogs pa'i shes pa ma yin pas da ltar ba'i bsgrub bya ma nges par rig pa las de dran par rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi dran nam mtshan nyid mi mthun pa la sogs pa'i shes pa ma yin pas da ltar ba'i bsgrub bya ma nges par rig pa las de dran par rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not reasonable that it be remembered, because it is not a cognition of a present object, since it is not a cognition of a dissimilar characteristic, etc.

original: myong min don gyi yul can na'ang //
analyzed: myong min don gyi yul can na'ang //
translated: Even if it has an experienced object,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: how can it be remembered?

original: nyams su myong ba'i don gyi yul can zhig pa la ji ltar 'gyur zhes @277a * //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i don gyi yul can zhig pa la ji ltar 'gyur zhes @277a * //
translated: How can it be remembered if it has an experienced object that has ceased?

original: bya ba ni nye ba nyid nyams su myong ba yin gyi sngar nyams su myong ba de nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba ni nye ba nyid nyams su myong ba yin gyi sngar nyams su myong ba de nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: It is experienced as present, not by the experience of it in the past.

original: de lta bu kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so,

original: myong min don gyi yul can na'ang //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: myong min don gyi yul can na'ang // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: even if it has an experienced object,

original: de ni ji ltar dran pa yin //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar dran pa yin //
translated: how can it be remembered?

original: zhes bya ba ni dran bzhin pa dang lhan cig gcig nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dran bzhin pa dang lhan cig gcig nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning is: It does not become identical with the present memory.

original: 'dra ba kho na mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dra ba kho na mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: Only a similar object is seen.

original: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma ma yin pa'i yul nyid kyis nye ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma ma yin pa'i yul nyid kyis nye ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even so means that it is a proximate object because it is an object that is not prior.

original: nye ba la nye ba ma yin pa'i shes pa ni sngar mthong ba'i ngo shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nye ba la nye ba ma yin pa'i shes pa ni sngar mthong ba'i ngo shes pa ma yin no //
translated: A cognition that is proximate to a non-proximate object is not a recognition of what was previously seen.

original: dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin du zin kyang mi slu ba med na tshad ma nyid ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la /🔽mi slu ba dang ldan pa las //
analyzed: dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin du zin kyang mi slu ba med na tshad ma nyid ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la / mi slu ba dang ldan pa las //
translated: Even if it is not connected to a sense faculty, if it is non-deceptive, how can it be valid cognition?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said:🔽From that which possesses non-deceptiveness.

original: don byed de min nam ci zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'am gzhan pa ste dang po'i mthong ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: don byed de min nam ci zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'am gzhan pa ste dang po'i mthong ba lta bu'o //
translated: Is it not the performance of a function? It is non-apprehension or something else, like the initial seeing.

original: don bya ba de byed pas zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba nyid las yin gyi spyi gcig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don bya ba de byed pas zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba nyid las yin gyi spyi gcig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: From the performance of that function means it is from similarity, not from a single universal.

original: bregs nas skyes pa'i skra la sogs pa la yang sngar mthong ba ngo shes par bya ba gsal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni don bya ba dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bregs nas skyes pa'i skra la sogs pa la yang sngar mthong ba ngo shes par bya ba gsal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni don bya ba dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even in shaved hair and so on, the manifestation of what was previously seen is not recognized. The statement devoid of the performance of a function teaches this.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni don bya ba de byed pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i rtags gang gi yin pa de'i'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni don bya ba de byed pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i rtags gang gi yin pa de'i'o //
translated: Its nature is that of the sign of the very essence of the performance of the function.

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan rnams la'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan rnams la'o //
translated: With regard to pots, etc., means with regard to other and other.

original: dran min mngon par shes pa ni //
analyzed: dran min mngon par shes pa ni //
translated: Non-memory is superknowledge.

original: dran yang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran yang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Memory is also different.

original: zhes bya ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught.

original: rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The capacity to understand is called the capacity to understand.

original: gal te gzhan na med pa zhes bya ba'i ma dang pha la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhan na med pa zhes bya ba'i ma dang pha la sogs pa'o //
translated: If it is different, it is called non-existent. Mother, father, etc.

original: 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni slu ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni slu ba'o //
translated: Error is called deception.

original: de dang mtshungs pa ni mi slu ba can gyi bu dang mtshungs pa la'o //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa ni mi slu ba can gyi bu dang mtshungs pa la'o //
translated: Similar to that is the one with non-deception, similar to the son.

original: dper na de'i bu la sogs pa phyi ma la'o //
analyzed: dper na de'i bu la sogs pa phyi ma la'o //
translated: For example, it is like his son, etc., in the future.

original: de nye bar len pa rgyun gang gi yin pa de yang de yin la rgyun yang yin pa de la'o //
analyzed: de nye bar len pa rgyun gang gi yin pa de yang de yin la rgyun yang yin pa de la'o //
translated: That which is the appropriator of that continuum is also that, and it is the continuum. It is in that.

original: de dang nye ba ni 'jigs pa dang ngo tsha ba dang nye bas so //
analyzed: de dang nye ba ni 'jigs pa dang ngo tsha ba dang nye bas so //
translated: Near to that is through fear and shame.

original: ming yang de zin par zhes bya ba ni bsgyur bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ming yang de zin par zhes bya ba ni bsgyur bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The name is not to be changed, because it is not to be changed.

original: rtag pa'am mi rtag pa yang rung de 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i blo'i yul nyid kyis 'jigs pa dang ngo tsha ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yin gyi yod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no zhes mtshungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa'am mi rtag pa yang rung de 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i blo'i yul nyid kyis 'jigs pa dang ngo tsha ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yin gyi yod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no zhes mtshungs pa yin te /
translated: Whether it is permanent or impermanent, it is the object of the cognition that says, “This is it.” It is the cause of the conventions of fear, shame, and so on, but not merely of existence.

original: de bstan pa ni 'khrul pa de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni 'khrul pa de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of that is “that error itself.”

original: de'i ni tha snyad byed pa po'i ci ste ma yin /
analyzed: de'i ni tha snyad byed pa po'i ci ste ma yin /
translated: Why is it not the maker of that convention?

original: de lta'i @277b tha snyad ces bya ba ni 'jigs pa dang ngo tsha ba'i tha snyad do //
analyzed: de lta'i @277b tha snyad ces bya ba ni 'jigs pa dang ngo tsha ba'i tha snyad do //
translated: “That convention” is the convention of fear and shame.

original: rtag pa yang rgyu las de ltar skyes pa nyid 'jigs pa yod pa dang ngo tsha ba yod pa zhes zer ba la gzhan gyi rtag la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa yang rgyu las de ltar skyes pa nyid 'jigs pa yod pa dang ngo tsha ba yod pa zhes zer ba la gzhan gyi rtag la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “That permanent thing” is the cause of that arising. It is said to be the cause of fear and shame.

original: de ni 'di ltar 'bad pa ma yin te mar me bzhin du snga na ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'bad pa ma yin te mar me bzhin du snga na ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not like that, because it is not established before, like a lamp.

original: sgra'i gsal byed ni de tha dad pas tha dad pa'i phyir yang ma yin par bstan pa ni rkyen gyi dbye bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i gsal byed ni de tha dad pas tha dad pa'i phyir yang ma yin par bstan pa ni rkyen gyi dbye bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation that the phonemes are not different because of the difference of the different is “by the difference of conditions.”

original: gsal bar byed pa yang de'i dbye bas dbye ba can mthong ngo zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa yang de'i dbye bas dbye ba can mthong ngo zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If it is said that the manifest is seen to be different by the difference of that,

original: ci ste sgron mas gsal na zhes bya ba ste rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa can nyid ni 'bras bu nyid la ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: ci ste sgron mas gsal na zhes bya ba ste rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa can nyid ni 'bras bu nyid la ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: then the meaning of “if the lamp manifests” is that the difference by the difference of the conditions is not ascertained in the effect.

original: ; ngo bo gzhan du byed pa'i byed pa po'am mthong ba po rab rib bzhin du 'khrul pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ; ngo bo gzhan du byed pa'i byed pa po'am mthong ba po rab rib bzhin du 'khrul pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation that the agent who makes the nature other or the seer is mistaken like the one with eye disease is

original: gal te dngos rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te dngos rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “if things are different by the difference of conditions.”

original: gzhan dang gzhan yi ge ga la sogs pa ma gtogs pa gand'i'i sgra dmigs pa'i yul ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽gal te 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin las//
