analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan yi ge ga la sogs pa ma gtogs pa gand'i'i sgra dmigs pa'i yul ma yin par bstan pa ni / gal te 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin las//
translated: The explanation that the sound of the lute is not the object of perception except for the other and other phonemes such as ga is

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “if it is from a nature of error.”

original: tha dad ces bya ba ni tha dad pa'i che ba dang chung ba las log pa'i che ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad ces bya ba ni tha dad pa'i che ba dang chung ba las log pa'i che ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: The different is the greatness and smallness that are the opposite of the greatness, etc. that are different.

original: tha mi dad pas ni gzhan pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: tha mi dad pas ni gzhan pa ma yin pas so //
translated: By not different is meant not other.

original: tha dad pa nyid min ni tha mi dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid min ni tha mi dad pa kho na'o //
translated: The not different is just the non-different.

original: 'khrul pa nyid nyams 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid nyams 'gyur ba ni //
translated: The deficiency is the fault.

original: thug pa med par dgongs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thug pa med par dgongs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The intention of the non-finality is taught:

original: 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin de las kyang //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin de las kyang // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From that, which is the nature of error,

original: chung ngu la sogs pa'i yig ge ga la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni 'khrul pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chung ngu la sogs pa'i yig ge ga la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni 'khrul pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the letters such as ga, etc. is that even in error,

original: chung ngu dang chen po la sogs pa ni skad cig ma ma yin nam /
analyzed: chung ngu dang chen po la sogs pa ni skad cig ma ma yin nam /
translated: Are the letters such as ga, etc. not momentary?

original: rjod pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'brel pa'i shes pa'i dus na mi gnas pas rjod byed ma yin pa ni yig ge ga la sogs pa tsam don byed pa'i phyir yod pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te sgra tsam gyis zhes bya
analyzed: rjod pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'brel pa'i shes pa'i dus na mi gnas pas rjod byed ma yin pa ni yig ge ga la sogs pa tsam don byed pa'i phyir yod pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te sgra tsam gyis zhes bya
translated: When connected with the cognition of expression and apprehension, they do not endure, so they are not expressive. The mere letters such as ga, etc. exist because they function, but not as anything else. If one says if it is just sound, etc.,

original: ba'o // dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don gyi bya ba byed pa nyid yod pa na chung ngu la sogs pa nyid kyi yin la brda las byung ba'i rjod byed nyid kyang sgra'i don ma yin par bstan pa ni sgra la don rtogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ba'o // dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don gyi bya ba byed pa nyid yod pa na chung ngu la sogs pa nyid kyi yin la brda las byung ba'i rjod byed nyid kyang sgra'i don ma yin par bstan pa ni sgra la don rtogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the characteristic of the object is the function of the object. When it exists, it is small, etc. The expression that arises from convention is not the meaning of the word. This is taught by “The word is understood as the meaning.”

original: dbye ba byed pa'i byed pa po gtso bo yin gyi cig shos gtso bo ma yin par bstan pa ni brgyud pa yis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbye ba byed pa'i byed pa po gtso bo yin gyi cig shos gtso bo ma yin par bstan pa ni brgyud pa yis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The primary factor is the agent that makes the distinction. The other is not the primary factor. This is taught by “Through the series.”

original: tha dad min zhes bya ba ni chung ngu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad min zhes bya ba ni chung ngu la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Not different” refers to small, etc.

original: tshigs su bcad pa'i don gzhan bstan pa ni /🔽gal te sgra rtag @278a * //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa'i don gzhan bstan pa ni / gal te sgra rtag @278a * //
translated: The meaning of the verse is taught by “If the word is permanent.”

original: bar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If the word is permanent” is stated.

original: snga na yod na btsal ma thag tu shes bya'i yul don du ci las 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni sngar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga na yod na btsal ma thag tu shes bya'i yul don du ci las 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni sngar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it existed before, what would be the purpose of the object of knowledge, the object, immediately after the search? This is taught by “Before also.”

original: de las bzlog pa bsal ba ni mi rtogs par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa bsal ba ni mi rtogs par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opposite of that is excluded. This is taught by “It is not understood.”

original: phyis kyi rtsol ba'i sngon rol du zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: phyis kyi rtsol ba'i sngon rol du zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Before the later effort” is supplied.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba la yang ngo //
translated: If it were not so, then it would be the same with regard to the manifest.

original: don gzhan bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don gzhan bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the other is taught:

original: rtsol ba'i sngon rol du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba'i sngon rol du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: prior to the effort.

original: de las gzhan gyis zhes bya ba la de las ni snga ma'i rtsol ba las so //
analyzed: de las gzhan gyis zhes bya ba la de las ni snga ma'i rtsol ba las so //
translated: By another, from the previous effort,

original: gzhan gyis ni da ltar bas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni da ltar bas so //
translated: by another, by the present one.

original: gzhan ni snga ma rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: The other is the previous one, which is excluded.

original: de ltar na yang shes pa tha mi dad na khyab pa can rtogs pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni snga phyi shes pa gcig yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar na yang shes pa tha mi dad na khyab pa can rtogs pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni snga phyi shes pa gcig yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thus, if the cognition is not different, the pervasion is taught to be the very understanding: the earlier and later cognitions are one.

original: 'di tsam gyis ni rtsol ba sgra la dgos pa med par bstan to //
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis ni rtsol ba sgra la dgos pa med par bstan to //
translated: By this much, the effort is taught to be without purpose in regard to the sound.

original: mthong ba dmigs pa na de nyid du ngo shes pas de 'di yin no zhes grub pa yin la /
analyzed: mthong ba dmigs pa na de nyid du ngo shes pas de 'di yin no zhes grub pa yin la /
translated: When the seeing is observed, it is recognized as just that, and it is established that this is it.

original: de ma dmigs pa ni bsgribs pas yin te /
analyzed: de ma dmigs pa ni bsgribs pas yin te /
translated: The non-observation of that is due to obstruction,

original: dper na rgod pa'i phyir mas ma mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na rgod pa'i phyir mas ma mthong ba yin te /
translated: just as when a mother is not seen due to distraction,

original: yul ma byung ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: yul ma byung ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: one thinks that it is because the object has not arisen.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that is so, then when...

original: mngon sum gyis ngo shes pa na dang po mthong ba bzhin du de'i 'du byed pa la yang dbang po las byung ba ni nye bar rtogs pa yin gyi sngar mthong pa'i yul nyid rtogs pa'i ni ma yin no//
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ngo shes pa na dang po mthong ba bzhin du de'i 'du byed pa la yang dbang po las byung ba ni nye bar rtogs pa yin gyi sngar mthong pa'i yul nyid rtogs pa'i ni ma yin no//
translated: When it is recognized through direct perception, the recollection that arises from the sense faculty is the ascertainment that is like the first seeing, but it is not the ascertainment of the object that was previously seen.

original: de'i tha snyad ni de nyid kho nas yin gyi ngo shes pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tha snyad ni de nyid kho nas yin gyi ngo shes pas ni ma yin no //
translated: The convention of that is just that, but it is not recognition.🔽Recognition of what was previously seen is a single appearance of memory and appearance, and it is mistaken. Since it is a subject that excludes the nonperformance of that, it is not the abandonment of the obscurations through effort.

original: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni dran pa dang snang ba gcig tu 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir la 'khrul pa yin la de mi byed pa rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yin pa de'i phyir 'bad pas bsgribs pa spangs pa ma yin gyi 'on ci zhe na
analyzed: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni dran pa dang snang ba gcig tu 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir la 'khrul pa yin la de mi byed pa rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yin pa de'i phyir 'bad pas bsgribs pa spangs pa ma yin gyi 'on ci zhe na
translated: What is it then?

original: / sgra byung ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: / sgra byung ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that it is just the arising of sound is

original: de yang rnam 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that also is called a transformation.

original: dmigs pa ldog pas zhes bya ba ni snga ma'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa ldog pas zhes bya ba ni snga ma'o //
translated: By the cessation of the object, which is the previous one,

original: gzhan dmigs pa ni gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i ngo bo de yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la gzhan gyis dmigs so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dmigs pa ni gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i ngo bo de yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la gzhan gyis dmigs so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The other is the nature of being perceived by another.

original: 'di la ni snga rol gyi ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni snga rol gyi ngo bo la'o //
translated: Here, the nature of the prior moment is the object of the prior moment.

original: bar du zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i mngon sum dag gi'o //
analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i mngon sum dag gi'o //
translated: The middle is the direct perception of the prior and the subsequent.

original: bar ma mngon sum gyi yul nyid du ma yin par bstan pa ni sgrib pas chod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bar ma mngon sum gyi yul nyid du ma yin par bstan pa ni sgrib pas chod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The object of the direct perception of the middle is not the object of the prior and the subsequent.

original: de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni phyis nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni phyis nyid do //
translated: At that time means at the time of the prior and the subsequent.

original: yod pa ni byung ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa ni byung ba'o //
translated: Existing means arisen.

original: 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Without change means at that time.

original: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba ngo shes @278b pa'i'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba ngo shes @278b pa'i'o //
translated: Inference is the recognition of what was previously seen.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni gcig bsgribs na yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni gcig bsgribs na yang ngo //
translated: By another means even when one is obscured.

original: ngas ma mthong ba des mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi tshig mngon sum gyis gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ngas ma mthong ba des mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi tshig mngon sum gyis gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the words of another, “I do not see, therefore I see,” are invalidated by perception is “by another.”

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa'o //
translated: “Thus” refers to the mixture.

original: de lta bu nyid kyis rnam par 'gyur ba ni ba spu ldang ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid kyis rnam par 'gyur ba ni ba spu ldang ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Thusness” refers to the transformation of the body hair standing on end, etc.

original: ba spu ldang ba la sogs pa'i rtags ni de lta bur gyur pas 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir rtags can yang de ltar yin par bstan pa ni de lta bu nyid 'grub kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ba spu ldang ba la sogs pa'i rtags ni de lta bur gyur pas 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir rtags can yang de ltar yin par bstan pa ni de lta bu nyid 'grub kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The sign of the body hair standing on end, etc., is similar to that which is the case, and therefore the one who has the sign is also taught to be that way, “Thusness is established.”

original: 'dra ba'i bdag nyid kyis mngon sum ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni /
analyzed: 'dra ba'i bdag nyid kyis mngon sum ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni /
translated: The knowledge that it is not perception by the identity of similarity is

original: rjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “inference.”

original: de nyid rjes su dpag pa la gnod byed yin par bstan pa ni gal te ba spu ldang ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rjes su dpag pa la gnod byed yin par bstan pa ni gal te ba spu ldang ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that that itself is the invalidator of inference is “If the body hair stands on end,” etc.

original: rang dang gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni rim gyis pas cig car yang de rtogs pa med na gnyi ga la gcig tu rtogs pa med pas gnod par byed pa zhes bya bar nges par rtogs pa ma yin na'o //🔽gnod byed skyes pa med par ni //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni rim gyis pas cig car yang de rtogs pa med na gnyi ga la gcig tu rtogs pa med pas gnod par byed pa zhes bya bar nges par rtogs pa ma yin na'o // gnod byed skyes pa med par ni //
translated: “By oneself and by another” means that if one who proceeds gradually does not understand it all at once, then both do not understand it all at once.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis so //
translated: “Without the arising of the refutation” means by oneself.

original: rmongs pa yis ni phongs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rmongs pa yis ni phongs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “By delusion” means by poverty.

original: tha snyad pa rnams kyis ni rtogs pa tsam gyi rjes su 'bred ba rigs pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: tha snyad pa rnams kyis ni rtogs pa tsam gyi rjes su 'bred ba rigs pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Those who are conventionalists say that it is proper to pursue mere understanding, but not anything else.

original: zhib mor lta bas zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pas so //
analyzed: zhib mor lta bas zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pas so //
translated: “By subtle investigation” means by analysis.

original: bstan bcos brtsams pa ni dpyod pa pa'i ming can gyi rnam par dpyad ba'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos brtsams pa ni dpyod pa pa'i ming can gyi rnam par dpyad ba'o //
translated: The composition of the treatise is an analysis having the name of an investigation.

original: mchod sbyin la 'jug pas zhi ba'i btung ba la 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mchod sbyin la 'jug pas zhi ba'i btung ba la 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: One does not engage in the drinking of soma by engaging in a sacrifice.

original: me'i sbyin sreg gi dbang du byas pa'i cho ga dang dbang bskur bar bskyed pa'i cho ga rnams dang lhan cig dbang du byed pa chen po nyid kyis gcig tu gnas pa na de'i phyogs gcig gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams la gnam stong dang zla
analyzed: me'i sbyin sreg gi dbang du byas pa'i cho ga dang dbang bskur bar bskyed pa'i cho ga rnams dang lhan cig dbang du byed pa chen po nyid kyis gcig tu gnas pa na de'i phyogs gcig gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams la gnam stong dang zla
translated: and the rites and initiations that are performed in the context of fire sacrifices, together with the rites of creation for the great subjugation that abide as one, the initiations and so on of one part of that are engaged on the eighth and fifteenth lunar days,

original: ba nya'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mtha' yas pa la 'jug par khas blangs pa'i phyir zhi ba'i btung ba dang me'i sbyin sreg la yang 'jug pa des khas blangs par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la grub mtha' ma lus pa ma grub pa'i phyir snga na
analyzed: ba nya'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mtha' yas pa la 'jug par khas blangs pa'i phyir zhi ba'i btung ba dang me'i sbyin sreg la yang 'jug pa des khas blangs par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la grub mtha' ma lus pa ma grub pa'i phyir snga na
translated: and the rites of fire sacrifice are accepted as limitless. Therefore, the rites of pacifying libations and fire sacrifices are also accepted by that.

original: med pa nyid rtogs pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa nyid rtogs pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the tenets are not established, it is not contradictory to realize that there is no prior existence.

original: yan lag thams cad sgrub par byed pa nyid las mchod sbyin bzhin du snga na med pa nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas bram ze dang / gar mkhan la sogs pa blo rtsing ba @279a * //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad sgrub par byed pa nyid las mchod sbyin bzhin du snga na med pa nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas bram ze dang / gar mkhan la sogs pa blo rtsing ba @279a * //
translated: Because it is not maintained that the sacrifice is prior to the performance of all its parts, just as the dancer is not prior to the performance of all his dance steps.

original: rnams tha snyad byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnams tha snyad byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the coarse-minded, such as the Brahmins and dancers, make conventional expressions is

original: tha snyad la rtsing ba'i blo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha snyad la rtsing ba'i blo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the statement that the coarse-minded make conventional expressions.

original: khyod kyi spyod pa ni tha snyad thams cad dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: khyod kyi spyod pa ni tha snyad thams cad dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: Your conduct is contrary to all conventions.

original: gal te dpyad na zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: gal te dpyad na zhes bya ba'o /
translated: If you analyze,🔽who can stop the stream that is drawn out by the valid cognition?🔽The statement that it cannot be stopped is

original: tshad ma dang ldan pas phyung ba'i rgyun ni su yis bzlog par nus zhes bya ba bstan pa ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma dang ldan pas phyung ba'i rgyun ni su yis bzlog par nus zhes bya ba bstan pa ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the statement that it cannot be stopped.

original: rnam par dpyad pas phra ba'i de nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin yang rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kho na yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar snang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pas phra ba'i de nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin yang rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kho na yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar snang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Although the subtle reality is established by analysis, it is shown to be only a worldly convention arising from conceptual thought: “Just as it appears.

original: long ba brgyud pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gi bskyed bya'i rtog pa nyid las so //
analyzed: long ba brgyud pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gi bskyed bya'i rtog pa nyid las so //
translated: ” “Just like a series of blind men” means that it arises from the conceptual thought that is produced by conceptual thought.

original: rnam par rtog pa nyid 'khor ba yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa nyid 'khor ba yin la /
translated: Conceptual thought itself is cyclic existence.

original: rang rig pa las ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin gyi rnam rtog las gzhan 'khor ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang rig pa las ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin gyi rnam rtog las gzhan 'khor ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nirvana is self-awareness. Apart from conceptual thought, there is no cyclic existence at all.

original: de'i phyir rnam rtog spang ba khyod //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam rtog spang ba khyod //
translated: Therefore, the teaching of the reasoning that “You who abandon conceptual thought

original: rtag tu mya ngan 'das nyid yin //
analyzed: rtag tu mya ngan 'das nyid yin //
translated: Are always in nirvana”

original: zhes bya ba'i rigs pa bstan pa ni kun rdzob tsam la ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rigs pa bstan pa ni kun rdzob tsam la ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is “Apart from mere convention.”

original: gnyis med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “It would be nondual” because it is self-awareness.

original: de ma brtags na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa la'o //
analyzed: de ma brtags na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa la'o //
translated: “If it is not examined” refers to the activity of conceptualization.

original: rang nyid kyis spros pa'i rang bzhin ni nyams par 'gyur pa ste zad par 'gyur ba ji ltar te ma yin par bstan pa ni ji srid ces bya'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis spros pa'i rang bzhin ni nyams par 'gyur pa ste zad par 'gyur ba ji ltar te ma yin par bstan pa ni ji srid ces bya'o //
translated: The nature of one’s own conceptual elaborations will be “destroyed,” that is, will cease. How? It is taught: “as long as…”

original: 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin te 'khor ba ni so so'i skye bos byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin te 'khor ba ni so so'i skye bos byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is itself “nirvāṇa,” because cyclic existence is created by the individual.

original: de la bags kyis zhes bya ba ni cig car nyid rang rig pa nyid la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la bags kyis zhes bya ba ni cig car nyid rang rig pa nyid la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Gradually” there means that one does not enter into reflexive awareness all at once.

original: dbang po las byung ba de'i bya ba las lhag pa'i bya ba byed na 'das pa dang 'dus byas pa'i thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po las byung ba de'i bya ba las lhag pa'i bya ba byed na 'das pa dang 'dus byas pa'i thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: If that which arises from the sense faculty performs an action that is greater than the action of that sense faculty, it would follow that one would apprehend past and future, and beginningless cyclic existence.

original: de lta ma yin na dngos po rnam par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dngos po rnam par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If that were not so, there would be no “establishment of things,”

original: so sor nges pa 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so sor nges pa 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: that is, there would be no apprehension of the individual.

original: dbang po'i byed pa'i yul gyi mthong ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag gi yod pa bzhin du med pa yang dus kyis bskal pa yin pas bskal pa rnams ni med par nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po'i byed pa'i yul gyi mthong ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag gi yod pa bzhin du med pa yang dus kyis bskal pa yin pas bskal pa rnams ni med par nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The seeing of the object of the activity of the sense faculty is not, like the prior and subsequent, nonexistent due to time. Therefore, the periods are not taught to be determinative of nonexistence.

original: gal te bar gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bar gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “If the nature of the middle” is the reason.

original: yul nyid bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yul nyid bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “Just like the object” is the example.

original: gad du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gad du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “The characteristic of what is observed” is the reason.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma dag ni bar du dmigs pa'i @279b mtshan nyid dang de bzhin du gcig yin par bstan pa ni de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma dag ni bar du dmigs pa'i @279b mtshan nyid dang de bzhin du gcig yin par bstan pa ni de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “Just like the prior and subsequent” is the example. The statement “The characteristic of what is observed in the middle” is the reason. The statement “Just like that” is the example. The statement “The nature of that” is the reason.

original: de nyid dang de nyid ma yin pa ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid dang de nyid ma yin pa ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid do //
translated: The statement “The same” is the example. The statement “The characteristic of that” is the reason. The statement “The nature of that” is the example.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni snga ma nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni snga ma nyid do //
translated: The statement “That itself” is the prior.

original: de med na zhes bya ba ni de'i dus su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na zhes bya ba ni de'i dus su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement “If that does not exist” is because it does not exist at that time.

original: de ltar ro zhes bya ba'i don yod pa la ma gtogs pa'i dus na dngos las tha mi dad pas dbye ba med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar ro zhes bya ba'i don yod pa la ma gtogs pa'i dus na dngos las tha mi dad pas dbye ba med par bstan pa ni /
translated: Thus, the meaning of “taste” is existence. Since it is not different from the entity, it is taught that there is no division.

original: gcig nyid na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ If it were one” means that it is one.

original: de lta na yang dus de med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po nye ba la de las lhag pa ma yin pa yang nye ba yin pa'i phyir dus snga ma la med pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang dus de med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po nye ba la de las lhag pa ma yin pa yang nye ba yin pa'i phyir dus snga ma la med pa'o //
translated: “ Even so, because that time does not exist” means that because the entity is present, it is not present in the past time, since it is not more than that.

original: de zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i'o //
translated: “ That” refers to the past.

original: dus thams cad pa zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dus thams cad pa zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “ In all times” means that it is one.

original: khyad par ma dmigs pa ni khyad par can yang de yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te dus kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par ma dmigs pa ni khyad par can yang de yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te dus kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ The non-observation of a difference” means that the difference is also that.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i dus kyi cha'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i dus kyi cha'o //
translated: “ Other” means the part of the time of seeing.🔽“ Just as it is” means that it is not understood that it is present and not present.

original: de ltar nyid snang bzhin pa dang snang bzhin pa ma yin pa de ma rtogs pas tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni mi snang ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyid snang bzhin pa dang snang bzhin pa ma yin pa de ma rtogs pas tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni mi snang ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ Not appearing” teaches that it is different.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no seeing of anything else.

original: snga ma dang cig shos kyi yan lag gi gsal bya de ltar 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: snga ma dang cig shos kyi yan lag gi gsal bya de ltar 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The clarification of the former and latter parts is shown by

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the words “the former and the latter.”

original: gcig nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gcig nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of their oneness is shown by

original: de'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the words “Therefore, if . . . .”

original: rtag pa nyid du smra ba yang skad cig ma nyid gsal ba yin par bstan pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du smra ba yang skad cig ma nyid gsal ba yin par bstan pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that the assertion of permanence also clarifies momentariness is shown by the words “Therefore . . . .”

original: de'i tshe yang /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang /
translated: Even then,

original: kun du ldog las ci zhig bya //
analyzed: kun du ldog las ci zhig bya //
translated: what is the use of the cessation of the former?

original: zhes bstan pa ni de la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni de la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of this is shown by the words “Even then . . . .”

original: dbang po la phan 'dogs pa dmigs pa nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po la phan 'dogs pa dmigs pa nges par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that the ascertainment of the object is not due to the benefit of the sense faculty is shown by

original: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the words “Even then . . . .”

original: 'di la yang tshigs su bcad pa'i don sbyor bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la yang tshigs su bcad pa'i don sbyor bar byed pa ni /
translated: Here, the application of the meaning of the verse is shown by

original: des na nges par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na nges par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the words “Therefore, it is ascertained . . . .”

original: rtag pa nyid yin na dbang po la phan 'dogs kyang de kho na bzhin du dmigs par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid yin na dbang po la phan 'dogs kyang de kho na bzhin du dmigs par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If it were permanent, it would be perceived just as it is, even when the sense faculty is helped.

original: legs byas las kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: legs byas las kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse says, “Even when well-done.”

original: de lta bur gyur pa yang de yin la nye bar dmigs pa yang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa yang de yin la nye bar dmigs pa yang yin pa'o //
translated: It is just like that, and it is also perceived.

original: skad cig tsam dmigs pa ni phan 'dogs pa med kyang yin bar bstan pa ni legs par byas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig tsam dmigs pa ni phan 'dogs pa med kyang yin bar bstan pa ni legs par byas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse says, “Even when not well-done,” to show that perception for just a moment is also possible without help.

original: de la ni dbang po la'o //
analyzed: de la ni dbang po la'o //
translated: In that case, it is in the sense faculty.

original: yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni dngos po gtso bo nyid do //
analyzed: yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni dngos po gtso bo nyid do //
translated: “It does not exist” means that the primary thing does not exist.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni legs par byas pa dang cig shos dag gi yang ngo /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni legs par byas pa dang cig shos dag gi yang ngo /
translated: “That” refers to both well-done and otherwise.

original: @280a * // rtag pa nyid ni dbang po la rung ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: @280a * // rtag pa nyid ni dbang po la rung ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: Permanence is not suitable for the sense faculty,

original: nye ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the subject of a proximate object.

original: nye ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir nye ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽rtag pa nyid ni yod mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nye ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir nye ba ma yin par bstan pa ni / rtag pa nyid ni yod mi 'gyur /
translated: To show that it is not proximate because it is not a proximate object,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the verse says, “Permanence would not exist.”

original: dmigs pa dang nye ba dmigs pa yin par bstan pa ni dmigs pa nyid ni yod ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang nye ba dmigs pa yin par bstan pa ni dmigs pa nyid ni yod ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the object of observation is the observed object is “because of the existence of the object of observation.”

original: ji ltar yong pa nyid yin //
analyzed: ji ltar yong pa nyid yin //
translated: How is it existent?

original: zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i tha snyad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i tha snyad do //
translated: This is the convention of existence.🔽Because of that,

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni mi snang ba mi dmigs pa yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni mi snang ba mi dmigs pa yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the non-appearance is the non-observation.

original: yod pa'i tha snyad ni dmigs pa la yin la tha mi dad pa'i phan 'dogs pas kyang mi rtag pa yin par bstan pa ni sgra la phan 'dogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad ni dmigs pa la yin la tha mi dad pa'i phan 'dogs pas kyang mi rtag pa yin par bstan pa ni sgra la phan 'dogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The convention of existence is the object of observation. The statement that it is impermanent because of the assistance of the non-different is “the assistance to sound.”

original: yul dang dus la dngos po gang //
analyzed: yul dang dus la dngos po gang //
translated: Whatever thing is in the place and time

original: rnam par ma dpyad yod pa yin //
analyzed: rnam par ma dpyad yod pa yin //
translated: is existent without analysis.

original: zhes bya ba ma grub par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ma grub par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement of the non-establishment of that is

original: ltos pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ltos pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “without dependence.”

original: 'ga' zhig gi tshe zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi byed pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi tshe zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi byed pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: “At some time” is connected with “not producing the effect.”

original: ltos pa med pa ni yul dang dus su bcad pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa ni yul dang dus su bcad pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Without dependence is not limited to place and time.

original: res 'ga' ba ni kha cig tu 'bras bu mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' ba ni kha cig tu 'bras bu mi byed pa'o //
translated: Sometimes means that sometimes the effect is not produced.

original: byed pa ste byed pa po nyid shes pa'i gzung bya nyid yin gyi de res 'ga'i kha cig tu mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa ste byed pa po nyid shes pa'i gzung bya nyid yin gyi de res 'ga'i kha cig tu mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The agent itself is the object of cognition, and it does not sometimes become something else.

original: de'i phyir res 'ga' ba ste dus la sogs pa bcad pa'i 'bras bu ni bya ba ste shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir res 'ga' ba ste dus la sogs pa bcad pa'i 'bras bu ni bya ba ste shes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the effect of the sometimes, such as time, is the action, which is cognition.

original: de lta ma yin na dmigs pas bcad pa'i dmigs par mi 'gyur la de'i ngo bo 'dzin pa ni rnam par ma bcad pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dmigs pas bcad pa'i dmigs par mi 'gyur la de'i ngo bo 'dzin pa ni rnam par ma bcad pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, the object would not be determined by the object of cognition, and the apprehension of its nature would be the apprehension of the undetermined.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod par rtogs pa'o //
translated: That is said to be the determination.

original: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni ma bcad pa'i gzung bya'i khyab pa can no //
analyzed: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni ma bcad pa'i gzung bya'i khyab pa can no //
translated: The pervasion is the pervasion of the object of apprehension of the undetermined.

original: 'khrul pa yin yang zhes bya ba ni ma bcad pa'i rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yin yang zhes bya ba ni ma bcad pa'i rtogs pa'o //
translated: Even though there is error means the apprehension of the undetermined.

original: gal te 'khrul pas zhes bya ba ni grub mtha' la dogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pas zhes bya ba ni grub mtha' la dogs pa'o //
translated: If there is error means a doubt about the conclusion.

original: bcad pa'i yul la dbang po las skyes pa ni 'gal ba can gyi ma bcad pa'i rnam par rtog pa la gnod pa byed pa yin par bstan pa ni ngo shes ba'i nus pa de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcad pa'i yul la dbang po las skyes pa ni 'gal ba can gyi ma bcad pa'i rnam par rtog pa la gnod pa byed pa yin par bstan pa ni ngo shes ba'i nus pa de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The power of recognition is the demonstration that the object of the exclusion is the invalidator of the non-excluded conception which is contradictory to it.

original: brtags pa rnam par bcad pa ma yin pa la mngon sum gcod pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: brtags pa rnam par bcad pa ma yin pa la mngon sum gcod pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that there is no exclusion by direct perception in the case of the non-exclusion of the imagined is

original: ngo shes kyi rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ngo shes kyi rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conception of recognition...

original: bcad pa 'dzin pa yin yang bcad pa ma yin na bum pa la sogs pa yang de ltar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni gal te khyab pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcad pa 'dzin pa yin yang bcad pa ma yin na bum pa la sogs pa yang de ltar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni gal te khyab pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though it is the apprehension of the exclusion, if it is not the exclusion, then such things as the pot would be the same. The demonstration of this is🔽If there were a pervasion...

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni khyab pa can du'o /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni khyab pa can du'o /
translated: Otherwise means: as the pervader.

original: brtags pa pa'i gcig nyid ni mngon sum @280b du grub pa'i du ma nyid kyis gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: brtags pa pa'i gcig nyid ni mngon sum @280b du grub pa'i du ma nyid kyis gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that the one of the imagined is invalidated by the many which is established by direct perception is

original: gcig nyid mi bden pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid mi bden pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: One is not true.

original: dbang po las skyes pa ni brtags ba pa la du ma nyid du mthong ba la yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa ni brtags ba pa la du ma nyid du mthong ba la yin te /
translated: The one which is produced from the sense-faculty is the seeing of the many in the imagined.

original: 'gal ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “for that reason” indicates that the reason is because they are mutually exclusive.

original: rtog pa ni mngon sum gyi yul la gzhan du byed na gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni tha dad dngos la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtog pa ni mngon sum gyi yul la gzhan du byed na gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni tha dad dngos la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “in the case of a different thing” indicates that conceptual thought is invalidated in regard to the object of direct perception.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that if difference were not established, then nondifference would not be established, and therefore conceptual thought would not be invalidated.🔽The expression “because” indicates that difference is independent.🔽The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.

original: tha mi dad pa ma grub pa la tha dad pa bzhin du tha dad pa ma grub na tha mi dad pas rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni tha dad pa nyid bden pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //🔽tha dad pa rang dbang kho na yin par bstan pa ni gang phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa ma grub pa la tha dad pa bzhin du tha dad pa ma grub na tha mi dad pas rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni tha dad pa nyid bden pa yin na zhes bya ba'o // tha dad pa rang dbang kho na yin par bstan pa ni gang phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.

original: tha mi dad pa ni tha dad par mthong ba dag 'dres pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa ni tha dad par mthong ba dag 'dres pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.

original: tha mi dad pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “nondifference” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established.🔽The expression “if difference were real” indicates that nondifference is not established if difference is not established

original: khyab pa can gyi mthong ba rnam par mi gcod pa la thal 'gyur bstan nas rnam par gcod pa bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa can gyi mthong ba rnam par mi gcod pa la thal 'gyur bstan nas rnam par gcod pa bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of the exclusion is “therefore.”

original: res 'ga' shes pa gang gi bya ba yin pa de la gzung ba nyid ma yin pa 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: res 'ga' shes pa gang gi bya ba yin pa de la gzung ba nyid ma yin pa 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Sometimes, the object of a cognition is not the grasped, because it is contradictory.

original: de byed pa gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de byed pa gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the agent of that.

original: de byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa la sogs pa la ltos pa med par mthong la /
analyzed: de byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa la sogs pa la ltos pa med par mthong la /
translated: The agent is seen without depending on the clarifier, etc.

original: snga na de kho na rnam par gcod na rtogs par byas pa ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid dam /
analyzed: snga na de kho na rnam par gcod na rtogs par byas pa ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid dam /
translated: If the exclusion of that is prior, then how is the grasped dependent?

original: gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid ji ltar yin te /
translated: Or, how is it not to be grasped?

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not of that nature.

original: de bshad pa ni gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //🔽rtag pa de nyid bstan pa ni tshad ma med pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni gzhan du zhes bya ba'o // rtag pa de nyid bstan pa ni tshad ma med pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that is “elsewhere.”🔽The demonstration of that permanence is “the nature of non-valid cognition.”

original: de kho na bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “Just that” is the uninterruptedness.

original: 'bras bu ni 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The effect is the apprehending,

original: 'dzin par byed pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other apprehender.

original: 'bras bu mi byed na gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi byed na gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If it does not produce an effect, it is not apprehended.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni snga ma'i gzung ba'i bdag nyid la'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni snga ma'i gzung ba'i bdag nyid la'o //
translated: Its nature is the previous nature of the object apprehended.

original: 'dzin pa na zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa'i tshe na rtogs pa na'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa na zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa'i tshe na rtogs pa na'o //
translated: When it is apprehended, that is, when it is perceived,

original: de yang ni snga ma snang du rung ba ste /
analyzed: de yang ni snga ma snang du rung ba ste /
translated: it is the previous one, which is suitable to appear.

original: gcig gi rang bzhin la mthong ba rgyun chad par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig gi rang bzhin la mthong ba rgyun chad par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not reasonable for the nature of one thing to be interrupted.

original: brtsal ma thag tu shes pa skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dag grub pa yin na /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu shes pa skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dag grub pa yin na /
translated: If the effect and the nature are established by the very nature of the arising of cognition immediately upon exertion,

original: de'i don byas pa nyid ni zlos ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de'i don byas pa nyid ni zlos ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: then the accomplishment of its purpose is not repeated.

original: 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kho nas @281a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kho nas @281a * //
translated: Thinking this, he says, “By this alone,” that is, by the mere arising immediately upon exertion,

original: grub kyang ngo //
analyzed: grub kyang ngo //
translated: it is established.

original: rang bzhin 'bras bu dang lhan cig bstan pa na byas pa nyid rang bzhin kho na yin pa tha dad byas pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs thams cad de 'drar zhes bya ba 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin 'bras bu dang lhan cig bstan pa na byas pa nyid rang bzhin kho na yin pa tha dad byas pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs thams cad de 'drar zhes bya ba 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: When the nature is taught together with the effect, that which is produced is just the nature itself. All reasons of nature are like that.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la 'jug pa yin par shes par mi 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la 'jug pa yin par shes par mi 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is like an effect reason. It is not understood that it applies to just one part of the similar class. This is the meaning.

original: byas pa bzhin du phyogs kyi chos bsdus pa la de la rigs mthun la yod dang / rnam gnyis med la med gang yin //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa logs su brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byas pa bzhin du phyogs kyi chos bsdus pa la de la rigs mthun la yod dang / rnam gnyis med la med gang yin // zhes bya ba la sogs pa logs su brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as with the produced, the property of the subject is not stated separately in the statement, “That which is of a similar type exists, and that which is of a different type does not exist.”

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of the statement, “It is not stated separately”?

original: rnam par dbye ba brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba brjod pa yin no //
translated: It is stated in terms of a classification.

original: ci'i phyir logs su brjod ce na zhes bya ba ni bsam par bya ba yin par kho bos mthong ngo //
analyzed: ci'i phyir logs su brjod ce na zhes bya ba ni bsam par bya ba yin par kho bos mthong ngo //
translated: Why is it not stated separately? I see that this is something to be contemplated.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa rang bzhin dang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum rtags las don mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la rtogs pa'i don dag yin yang bsdus pa 'dir ci'i phyir brjod snyam du sems
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa rang bzhin dang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum rtags las don mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la rtogs pa'i don dag yin yang bsdus pa 'dir ci'i phyir brjod snyam du sems
translated: One might think, “Why is the three modes of the reason of nature and effect, such as being produced, stated here in this summary of the meaning of inference for oneself, such as ‘seeing the object from the reason,’ and so on?”

original: pa la rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid du rtogs pa'i don yin yang bsdus pa 'dir gtan tshigs brjod par byas pa ni rtogs pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: pa la rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid du rtogs pa'i don yin yang bsdus pa 'dir gtan tshigs brjod par byas pa ni rtogs pa'i don du ste /
translated: The statement of the reason in this summary of the definition of inference is for the purpose of understanding.

original: nges pa'i don du yin la phyogs kyi chos la dbad ba'i nges par gzung ba las 'di dag nyid yin no snyam du dogs ba zlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i don du yin la phyogs kyi chos la dbad ba'i nges par gzung ba las 'di dag nyid yin no snyam du dogs ba zlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is for the purpose of ascertaining that the three modes are the property of the subject, because it is suspected that they are not.

original: yang na ci'i phyir logs su zhes bya ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin no //
analyzed: yang na ci'i phyir logs su zhes bya ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin no //
translated: Or, why is it stated separately? This verse is the answer.

original: 'di ni dpe med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brjod pa med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid mi srid pa ste byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dpe med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brjod pa med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid mi srid pa ste byas pa nyid do //
translated: Because it is not an example, the definition is impossible because it is not stated, such as being produced.

original: yang na rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid las ci'i phyir logs su brjod pa ni tshigs su bcad pa 'di'o //
analyzed: yang na rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid las ci'i phyir logs su brjod pa ni tshigs su bcad pa 'di'o //
translated: Or else, the reason why the definition of inference for oneself is stated separately is this verse.

original: de lta ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mthun phyogs la yod med rnam gnyis zhes bya ba 'di la yod pa nyid ni byas pa nyid de rang bzhin nyid yin la shes pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu ma brjod pa'i 'dra ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mthun phyogs la yod med rnam gnyis zhes bya ba 'di la yod pa nyid ni byas pa nyid de rang bzhin nyid yin la shes pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu ma brjod pa'i 'dra ba ni ma yin no //
translated: If it were not so, then the existence of the reason in the similar class would be twofold, and existence would be the nature of being produced, not the similarity of having the effect of the nature of cognition.

original: dpyod pa pa rnams kyi ni shes pa rtsol ba las byung ba yin gyi sgra ma yin pa'i phyir de dag la 'bras bu yin te de bstan pa ni gzhan gyi 'dod pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa pa rnams kyi ni shes pa rtsol ba las byung ba yin gyi sgra ma yin pa'i phyir de dag la 'bras bu yin te de bstan pa ni gzhan gyi 'dod pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since the Naiyāyikas’ knowledge arises from effort, not from sound, it is the effect of that. The teaching of that is “by the desire of others.”

original: rtsol ba'i bskyed bya'i shes pa ni de dag gi yul 'dzin par byed pa yin la des kyang skyed par byed pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'i skra'i bskyed bya yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtsol ba'i bskyed bya'i shes pa ni de dag gi yul 'dzin par byed pa yin la des kyang skyed par byed pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'i skra'i bskyed bya yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The knowledge produced by effort is the apprehender of the object of those, and since that is also produced by it, the produced by impermanent effort is taught.

original: de la ji skad @281b brjod pa yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la ji skad @281b brjod pa yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is that? It is said, “that is not so.”

original: mi rtag pa nyid la shes pa 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la shes pa 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.

original: de ltar 'dzin pa la yang 'dzin pa'i phyir skad cig ma ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de zer ba ni phyis mthong ba na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'dzin pa la yang 'dzin pa'i phyir skad cig ma ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to // de zer ba ni phyis mthong ba na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.

original: snga mas phyi ma dang des snga ma 'dzin pa ma yin na nges pas de dran par ma 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /🔽dran par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga mas phyi ma dang des snga ma 'dzin pa ma yin na nges pas de dran par ma 'gyur zhes zer ba ni / dran par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //

original: gzung ba nyid ni zhes bya ba ni mngon sum snga mas sam 'dis kyang ste sngon por nges pa bzhin du mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi de nyid 'di'o zhes bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzung ba nyid ni zhes bya ba ni mngon sum snga mas sam 'dis kyang ste sngon por nges pa bzhin du mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi de nyid 'di'o zhes bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it apprehends itself.🔽If you say that it is not so, then it would follow that it is not momentary because it appre

original: snga ma'am phyi ma mthong ba ni rang gi dus kyi don byed pa'i yul can yin la de nyid 'di'o zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'dra ba mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba can yin gyi de nyid la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: snga ma'am phyi ma mthong ba ni rang gi dus kyi don byed pa'i yul can yin la de nyid 'di'o zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'dra ba mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba can yin gyi de nyid la ni ma yin te /
translated: The seeing of the former or the latter is the subject that performs the object’s function at its own time. The conceptual thought “This is that very one” is based on the seeing of similarity, but not on that very one.

original: nus pa med pas nyams su myong ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni 'dzin pa yis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nus pa med pas nyams su myong ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni 'dzin pa yis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “because it is not experienced due to the absence of capacity” is indicated by “because of the apprehension.”

original: skad cig ma nyid ni rtag tu the tshom za ba yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid ni rtag tu the tshom za ba yin te /
translated: Momentariness is always doubted,

original: rnam par dpyad pas log pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i ma dmigs pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pas log pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i ma dmigs pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is refuted by analysis. The statement “because of the non-apprehension of the object” indicates this.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba las so //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba las so //
translated: “Because of the absence of difference” means from the present.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la the tshom yin gyi gzung bzhin pa nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la the tshom yin gyi gzung bzhin pa nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “because of the doubt regarding the future” indicates that the present is not the future.

original: de'i tshe gzung ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe gzung ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “at that time, the object” indicates that the present is not the future.

original: dngos po bzhin dus kyang rang gi ngo bos 'dzin pa the tshom za ba dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po bzhin dus kyang rang gi ngo bos 'dzin pa the tshom za ba dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Just as with things, time is also shown to be essentially contradictory with apprehension.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ste dus kyang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ste dus kyang ngo //
translated: And that, too, means time, too.

original: khyod kyi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ste 'o na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ste 'o na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Your assertion means that because it is related to the time of arising, it is called arising.

original: de ltar nyid du snang ba yang zhes bya ba ni nye ba na snang ba yang 'dra bar 'dzin pa las dran pa yin gyi de 'dzin pa las ma yin par bstan pa ni thal ba 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyid du snang ba yang zhes bya ba ni nye ba na snang ba yang 'dra bar 'dzin pa las dran pa yin gyi de 'dzin pa las ma yin par bstan pa ni thal ba 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as it appears means that memory is from the apprehension of similarity of what appears in the present, not from the apprehension of that.

original: yod min zhes bya ba ni da ltar ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yod min zhes bya ba ni da ltar ma yin pa'o //
translated: It does not exist means it is not present.

original: de min rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de min rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med pa'o //
translated: Not that means not without aspect.

original: bdag med shes zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa las mi mthun pa shes pa dang chos mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag med shes zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa las mi mthun pa shes pa dang chos mthun pa yin no //
translated: Knowledge of selflessness means that it is similar to the knowledge of the body and so on as being different.

original: de'i tshe'ang zhes bya ba ni'ang gi sgras nyams su myong ba dang dran pa'i dus nyid kyi shes pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid yin pa de ltar na 'di ltar 'gyur te 'dzin pa dang ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe'ang zhes bya ba ni'ang gi sgras nyams su myong ba dang dran pa'i dus nyid kyi shes pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid yin pa de ltar na 'di ltar 'gyur te 'dzin pa dang ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “At that time” means that the word “also” indicates that the cognition at the time of experience and memory is not the same as the cognition at the time of apprehension. Thus, it is said, “apprehension and memory are different.”

original: 'dzin pa dang dran pa dag shes pa gzhan las tha dad pa yin na thams cad thams cad kyi shes par @282a * //
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang dran pa dag shes pa gzhan las tha dad pa yin na thams cad thams cad kyi shes par @282a * //
translated: If apprehension and memory are different from other cognitions, the error would arise that everything would be the cognition of everything.

original: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon ldog pa la yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon ldog pa la yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: To avoid this error, it is said:

original: dang por 'dzin dang dran pa 'di //
analyzed: dang por 'dzin dang dran pa 'di //
translated: First, this apprehension and memory

original: zhes bya ba 'dis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis so //
translated: arise from that.

original: de yod na de dag 'byung bas de nyid yin na thal ches par bstan pa ni lus kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yod na de dag 'byung bas de nyid yin na thal ches par bstan pa ni lus kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it exists, they arise. If it were that, it would be excessive. This is shown by “the body also.”🔽If it is said that it is because it is impermanent,

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhe na zhes bya ba ni dus gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhe na zhes bya ba ni dus gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because it does not remain for a second moment,

original: /'du ba ste byad pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni de la de gnyis mi 'du ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: /'du ba ste byad pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni de la de gnyis mi 'du ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The thought that “the meeting is not in space, etc.” is because those two are not found there.

original: bdag mngon sum ba ma yin te bdag go zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag mngon sum ba ma yin te bdag go zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The self is not directly perceived, because it is said to be the self.

original: shes pa'i yul nyid rtsod pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i yul nyid rtsod pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The object of cognition is the object of dispute.

original: shes pa po'i dran pa po nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i rjes su 'brel pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni de ni rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa po'i dran pa po nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i rjes su 'brel pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni de ni rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The connection that proves the self to be the knower and the experiencer is the same in space, etc. This is shown by “because of the connection.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la yang ngo //🔽de dag gi log pa dang cig shos dag la thams cad kyi tshe 'byung ba dang cig shos kyi thal 'gyur gyi rtsod pa mtshungs pa'am /
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la yang ngo // de dag gi log pa dang cig shos dag la thams cad kyi tshe 'byung ba dang cig shos kyi thal 'gyur gyi rtsod pa mtshungs pa'am /
translated: ” “There” means in space.🔽In that case, the reversal and the other are always the same in the occurrence of the reversal and the other reductio arguments.

original: 'du pa la ldog pa dang cig shos kyi rgol ba mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'du pa la ldog pa dang cig shos kyi rgol ba mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Or, the meeting is the same in the reversal and the other objections.

original: dran pa las 'dzin pa med par bstan pa ni dran pas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa las 'dzin pa med par bstan pa ni dran pas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that there is no apprehension due to memory is “even though there is memory.

original: 'dzin pa la dran pa med par bstan pa ni dran pas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pa la dran pa med par bstan pa ni dran pas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ” The teaching that there is no memory in apprehension is “memory.

original: sngar rjes su 'brel pa 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sngar rjes su 'brel pa 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: ” It is established that there is no prior apprehension of a connection.

original: brtsal ma thag pa'i shes pa ni mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu can yin no zhes bya ba de dag tsam gnas skabs pa yin la nang gi khyad par gyi dbye ba gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni shin tu zhib mor brtag pa ni zhes bya ba'o
analyzed: brtsal ma thag pa'i shes pa ni mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu can yin no zhes bya ba de dag tsam gnas skabs pa yin la nang gi khyad par gyi dbye ba gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni shin tu zhib mor brtag pa ni zhes bya ba'o
translated: The knowledge that arises immediately after the effort is the result of the impermanent. That is just the case. The teaching that there is no internal distinction of a difference in the case of a non-enduring thing is “if one examines it very carefully.

original: // gzhan ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni phrad pa can la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: // gzhan ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni phrad pa can la sogs pa'o //
translated: ” “It is not another” refers to contact and so on.

original: de'i yang bsdu ba'i ched du de'i rnam par dbye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni 'di las lan btab pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i yang bsdu ba'i ched du de'i rnam par dbye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni 'di las lan btab pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to include that, the analysis of it is the meaning of “in this regard.” The teaching of the reply is “in this regard.”

original: kho bos mthong ba ni bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu de nyid kyis ngo bo can ma yin pa bzhin du de la 'khrul pa med pa yin pa de la yang yid ches pa ma yin na /
analyzed: kho bos mthong ba ni bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu de nyid kyis ngo bo can ma yin pa bzhin du de la 'khrul pa med pa yin pa de la yang yid ches pa ma yin na /
translated: I do not believe that the effect of the object of perception is non-different from the essence of the effect, and that it is not mistaken.

original: gar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pas de dag gi dbye ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pas de dag gi dbye ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it is the intention that it is not anything else, it is taught that it is a division of those.

original: yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba //
analyzed: yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba //
translated: That which exists without which something does not occur

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the effect.🔽Even though it is not the cause of understanding, it is the effect. Similarly, it is not the non-mistaken ascertainment.

original: go byed nyid ma yin yang 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du ma 'khrul pa'i nges pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te mi 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: go byed nyid ma yin yang 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du ma 'khrul pa'i nges pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te mi 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that it is not the non-mistaken ascertainment, it is the non-mistaken ascertainment.

original: de 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi dus kyi me la 'bras bu nyid kyi khyad par go byed yin gyi de tsam nyid ma yin te nges pa nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: de 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi dus kyi me la 'bras bu nyid kyi khyad par go byed yin gyi de tsam nyid ma yin te nges pa nyid lta bu'o //
translated: That which is called non-mistaken is the cause of understanding the difference of being the effect at its own time, but it is not merely that, like ascertainment itself.

original: @282b do gos kyi chos bzhin du'am du ba yang nges pa tsam dang bral ba ma yin par bstan pa ni 'bras bu nyid yin pas na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @282b do gos kyi chos bzhin du'am du ba yang nges pa tsam dang bral ba ma yin par bstan pa ni 'bras bu nyid yin pas na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just like the cloth and the dye, the effect is taught as being inseparable from the mere certainty.

original: me'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i du ba bzhin du 'bras bu nyid kyi khyad par gyis khyad par can yin pa de'i go byed yin gyi de'i rgyu mtshan ma yin pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: me'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i du ba bzhin du 'bras bu nyid kyi khyad par gyis khyad par can yin pa de'i go byed yin gyi de'i rgyu mtshan ma yin pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as smoke is distinguished by the distinction of fire, the effect is distinguished by the distinction of the effect itself. It is the cause of that, but it is not taught as the reason for that.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni de med na med pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni de med na med pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: That itself is that which does not exist without it.

original: nges pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyi'i sgra yin yang ldog pas 'bras bu nyid ston pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyi'i sgra yin yang ldog pas 'bras bu nyid ston pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Although the words “certainty” and “connection” are general terms, the meaning is that the effect is taught by the exclusion.

original: gang gi byed pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang gi byed pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that whatever arises from the activity of something is the effect of that?

original: des pa ni de las ma skyes kyang smin drug shar ba la sogs pa las snar ma 'char ba la sogs pa la yin na zhes zer ba la gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des pa ni de las ma skyes kyang smin drug shar ba la sogs pa las snar ma 'char ba la sogs pa la yin na zhes zer ba la gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The gentle one says: “Even though it does not arise from that, it is from the arising of the constellation of Mṛgaśiras, etc., that the arising of the constellation of Puṣya, etc., is known.”

original: byed pa la de las gzhan pa med kyang de'i bskyed bya bzhin du 'di las de med na med pa yin pas de'i 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: byed pa la de las gzhan pa med kyang de'i bskyed bya bzhin du 'di las de med na med pa yin pas de'i 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: Even though there is nothing other than the action in the production of that, since it does not exist without that, like the product of that, it is the effect of that.

original: smin drug shar ba la sogs pa yin yang de med pa la the tshom za ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: smin drug shar ba la sogs pa yin yang de med pa la the tshom za ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even though it is the constellation of Mṛgaśiras, etc., there is doubt that it does not exist without that.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir go byed ma yin yang go byed gnas pa go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir go byed ma yin yang go byed gnas pa go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Even though it is not the cause of understanding because of error, the cause of understanding is understood by the cause of understanding.

original: gang gi'o zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa'i khyad par ni bzlog pa la nus pa med pa'i khyad par can nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi'o zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa'i khyad par ni bzlog pa la nus pa med pa'i khyad par can nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The difference in the genitive case is shown to be the difference in the absence of the ability to reverse:

original: rigs pa na 'di nyid yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pa na 'di nyid yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the reasoning.

original: 'di ni tha dad pa khas blangs nas bstan pa yin gyi 'di ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni gzhan dang zhes bya ba ste 'bab pa dang ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni tha dad pa khas blangs nas bstan pa yin gyi 'di ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni gzhan dang zhes bya ba ste 'bab pa dang ngo //
translated: This is taught by way of accepting the difference, but the teaching “it is not this” is “another.”

original: de 'di ltar cung zad go bar byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni go byed dang go byed ma yin par bstan pa ni rang bzhin gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de 'di ltar cung zad go bar byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni go byed dang go byed ma yin par bstan pa ni rang bzhin gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is a little bit of understanding, but the teaching of the other as the understood and the other as the not understood is “by whatever nature.”

original: 'bras bu yang rnam par 'byed pa bzhin du yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba'am zhes bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang rnam par 'byed pa bzhin du yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba'am zhes bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The effect is also like the differentiation, and the meaning of the teaching “whatever exists without which it does not occur” is that it is.

original: bdag gang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'o //
translated: “ Whatever self” is the probandum.

original: rang zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed kyi chos kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rang zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed kyi chos kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: “ Itself” is the nature of the proving property.

original: de dang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya dang ngo //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya dang ngo //
translated: “ That” is the probandum.

original: gang gi tshe sgrub byed kyi bdag nyid bsgrub bya yin pa dang / sgrub byed kyang 'di'i yin pa'i phyir de yang go byed du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la rnam dbyer med can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgrub byed kyi bdag nyid bsgrub bya yin pa dang / sgrub byed kyang 'di'i yin pa'i phyir de yang go byed du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la rnam dbyer med can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When one thinks that the very nature of the proof is the probandum, and that the proof is also of that, then it is called “non-differentiation.”

original: bsgrub bya yang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa go byed kho na yin gyi shing nyid shing sha pa'i ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya yang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa go byed kho na yin gyi shing nyid shing sha pa'i ni ma yin te /
translated: The probandum, such as impermanence, is only the understood object of “produced,” and so on, but not of “tree” and “śimśapā.”

original: de dang de ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du nges pa dang ma nges pa'i yul can yin pas de nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽gang zhig ces bya ba ni sgrub byed kyi @283a * //
analyzed: de dang de ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du nges pa dang ma nges pa'i yul can yin pas de nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro // gang zhig ces bya ba ni sgrub byed kyi @283a * //
translated: Because it is the object of a cognition that is and is not ascertained as having the nature of that, it is not that alone.

original: chos de zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos de zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “That” is connected with “the property of the proof.”

original: shing gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni shing gang gi bdag nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: shing gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni shing gang gi bdag nyid yin pa'o //
translated: “The nature of a tree” is the nature of whatever tree.

original: gal te ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mngon sum ni gnyi ga dbye ba med par 'dzin pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mngon sum ni gnyi ga dbye ba med par 'dzin pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “If” means “just as,” and the meaning is that perception apprehends both without differentiation.

original: shing sha ba gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: shing sha ba gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as it is with the identity of a part-possessor.

original: de bzhin bsgrub byed dang cig shos nyid kyi phyir de'am de dang de ma yin pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i khyad par yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin bsgrub byed dang cig shos nyid kyi phyir de'am de dang de ma yin pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i khyad par yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the identity of the probandum and the other is also like that. Therefore, the difference between the identity of that and the identity of that and the other is not taught.

original: rnam par dbyer med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par dbyer med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no inseparability.
