original: de'i bdag nyid go byed dang cig shos su mtshungs pa yin gyi dbyer med pa ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir de'i mtshan ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te de'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid go byed dang cig shos su mtshungs pa yin gyi dbyer med pa ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir de'i mtshan ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te de'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that the sign of that is the identity of that which is the indicator and the other, which is similar, but not the inseparability, then if that is so, it is said:

original: dbyer med pa'i nges pa de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang go byed kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i nges pa de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang go byed kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The certainty of inseparability is not the identity of that, but it is taught that it is only the indicator.

original: de'i bdag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The identity of that is said.

original: dbyer med pa'am nges pa zhes bya ba yang mtshungs par brjod pa can de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag gi khyad par dmigs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dbyer med pa'am nges pa zhes bya ba yang mtshungs par brjod pa can de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag gi khyad par dmigs par byed pa yin te /
translated: The difference between the identity of that and the identity of that which arises from that is observed by the one who speaks similarly, saying inseparable or certain.

original: gzhan las ni nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'di bshad zin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan las ni nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'di bshad zin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason for this is that the other is not ascertained.🔽The reason for this is that the other is not ascertained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The reason for this is that the other is not ascertained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.

original: de'i ni go byed kyi rgyu mtshan no //🔽de dag ces bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag go //🔽de'i khyad par gyis khyad par can go byed nyid du bstan pa ni de'i nang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i ni go byed kyi rgyu mtshan no // de dag ces bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag go // de'i khyad par gyis khyad par can go byed nyid du bstan pa ni de'i nang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.

original: gzhan ma nges pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid 'di dag nges pa la med par bstan pa ni de'i bdag nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //🔽de ste sgrub byed bdag nyid gang gis yin pa de ni de'i bdag nyid yin la de bsgrub bya bdag nyid gang gis yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ma nges pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid 'di dag nges pa la med par bstan pa ni de'i bdag nyid ni zhes bya ba'o // de ste sgrub byed bdag nyid gang gis yin pa de ni de'i bdag nyid yin la de bsgrub bya bdag nyid gang gis yin pa'o //
translated: The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.🔽The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dang bral ba yang go byed yin par mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni 'di la bstan pa ni //🔽ldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dang bral ba yang go byed yin par mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni 'di la bstan pa ni // ldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
translated: The words “this has been explained” indicate that this has been explained.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words “this has been explained” indicate

original: de'i bdag nyid ni shing sha ba shing gi bdag nyid mthong ba yin pas ji ltar yin zhes brgal zhing brtag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni shing sha ba shing gi bdag nyid mthong ba yin pas ji ltar yin zhes brgal zhing brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: Since the nature of the tree is seen as the nature of the śimśapā tree, it should not be questioned as to how it is.

original: du ba ni me las byung ba yin la 'di smin drug shar ba snar ma 'char ba la sogs ma yin pa'i phyir bzlog pa las ldog par the tshom za ba yin la /
analyzed: du ba ni me las byung ba yin la 'di smin drug shar ba snar ma 'char ba la sogs ma yin pa'i phyir bzlog pa las ldog par the tshom za ba yin la /
translated: Since smoke arises from fire, and since this [smoke] is not the rising of the constellation Kṛttikā in the constellation Rohiṇī, etc., there is doubt as to whether the reverse is the case.

original: de bstan pa ni de dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni de dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of that is “because error is possible in those.”

original: 'di las gzhan du 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba ni go byed nyid med par ro //
analyzed: 'di las gzhan du 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba ni go byed nyid med par ro //
translated: “There is no other way” is without the nature of the indicator.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni ma nus pa'i shes pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni ma nus pa'i shes pas so //
translated: “Therefore” is by the cognition of the inability.

original: ldog pa la 'khrul ba can 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid bzhin du de yang 'bras bu kho na @283b yin par bstan pa ni de lta yin dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa la 'khrul ba can 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid bzhin du de yang 'bras bu kho na @283b yin par bstan pa ni de lta yin dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The reverse is the case” is the characteristic of the effect of the erroneous. That is also taught as only the effect. “If that is the case” is the characteristic of the effect of the erroneous.

original: khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nges par byed pa ste 'brel pa'i yul can no //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nges par byed pa ste 'brel pa'i yul can no //
translated: “The pervader” is the determiner, the subject of the relation.

original: shing sha pa gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de'i ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni res 'ga' ba ste /
analyzed: shing sha pa gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de'i ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni res 'ga' ba ste /
translated: That which is the nature of a śimśapā is its “indeterminate” or “sometimes” nature.

original: shing sha pa la yod pa'i shing dang gzhan la yod pa yang yin la de la gnas pa nyid kyis go byed yin gyi gzhan la yod pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shing sha pa la yod pa'i shing dang gzhan la yod pa yang yin la de la gnas pa nyid kyis go byed yin gyi gzhan la yod pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is a tree that exists in a śimśapā and it exists elsewhere. It is understood by its presence there, not by its presence elsewhere.

original: me yang du ba la nges pa can dang rnam pa gzhan yang yin pa'i phyir rgyu'i gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa dmigs pa yin gyi gtan du rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: me yang du ba la nges pa can dang rnam pa gzhan yang yin pa'i phyir rgyu'i gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa dmigs pa yin gyi gtan du rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Fire is ascertained by smoke, but it is also otherwise. Therefore, the principal and non-principal causes are observed, but it is not a cause that is always non-existent.

original: ma nges pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i ngo bos go byed yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma nges pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i ngo bos go byed yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: “Indeterminate” means that it is understood by the nature of ascertainment, not by anything else.

original: de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par 'dzin pa yin na mngon par 'dod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par 'dzin pa yin na mngon par 'dod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the cause of the particular effect that is desired, it is said to be the cause.

original: go byed kyi rgyu mtshan de'i bdag nyid dang // cig shos la sogs pa las de la ma nges pa nyid du mi 'gyur na nges pa can gyi go byed nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: go byed kyi rgyu mtshan de'i bdag nyid dang // cig shos la sogs pa las de la ma nges pa nyid du mi 'gyur na nges pa can gyi go byed nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: The reason that causes understanding is the very nature of that, and the other, etc. are not uncertain with respect to it, but are certain, and are the very cause of understanding.

original: gang de'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang de'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa med pa'o //
translated: That which is not its follower means that which does not have certain following.

original: yang na de zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa'am rgyu yang ngo //
analyzed: yang na de zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa'am rgyu yang ngo //
translated: Or, that means the pervader or cause.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni khyab bya'i 'am 'bras bu yin te rgyu mtshan ni nges pa can no //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni khyab bya'i 'am 'bras bu yin te rgyu mtshan ni nges pa can no //
translated: Its means the pervaded or effect. The reason is certain.

original: gang de'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin pa ni gang gi rjes su 'jug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang de'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin pa ni gang gi rjes su 'jug pa med pa'o //
translated: That which is not its follower is that which does not have its following.

original: de'i phyir nges pa med pa nyid ni nges par byed pa nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa med pa nyid ni nges par byed pa nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, uncertainty is not the very cause of certainty. This is the meaning.

original: de lta ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes su 'jug pa yin yang nges par byed pa nyid yin na 'bras bu dang khyad par byed pa dag la yang rjes su byed pa nyid du thal ches pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes su 'jug pa yin yang nges par byed pa nyid yin na 'bras bu dang khyad par byed pa dag la yang rjes su byed pa nyid du thal ches pa nyid yin no //
translated: If it is not so, then even though it is a subsequent state, if it is a determiner, then it follows that it would be a subsequent state even for the effect and the differentia.

original: de de bzhin no zhe na zhes bya ba cha shas kyis ma nges pa dang nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: de de bzhin no zhe na zhes bya ba cha shas kyis ma nges pa dang nges pa nyid do //
translated: If you say so be it, then it is a partial indeterminacy and determinacy.

original: phrad pa dang 'du ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni 'di ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad pa dang 'du ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni 'di ma yin te /
translated: It is not a division such as contact and combination, etc.,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because there is no difference. The explanation is:

original: ldan pa can sogs gang dag la //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ldan pa can sogs gang dag la // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In the possessor, etc.,

original: 'brel pa dang cig shos bzhin du phrad pa la sogs pa khyad par du byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'brel pa dang cig shos bzhin du phrad pa la sogs pa khyad par du byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that contact, etc., are not distinguished like connection and the other.

original: gzhi bzhin du phrad pa 'khrul ba can yin par bstan ba ni mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhi bzhin du phrad pa 'khrul ba can yin par bstan ba ni mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The error of contact is taught to be like the basis, because it is similar.

original: brten pa nyid ni rten gyis phan 'dogs pa nyid yin pas 'bras bu byed pa kho na nyid yin par bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brten pa nyid ni rten gyis phan 'dogs pa nyid yin pas 'bras bu byed pa kho na nyid yin par bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since the supported itself is the benefactor of the support, it is taught that it is only the effect.

original: 'bras bu rigs pa ni gzhan phrad pa nyid can la ltos pa yin la de med na med pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu rigs pa ni gzhan phrad pa nyid can la ltos pa yin la de med na med pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la ma yin te /
translated: The effect is reasonable, since it depends on another that has contact. If that does not exist, it does not exist.

original: de med @284a * //
analyzed: de med @284a * //
translated: If that does not exist,

original: na med ces bya ba 'di nyid 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: na med ces bya ba 'di nyid 'bras bu yin te /
translated: this is the effect.

original: nges pa can 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nges pa can 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it is the effect of certainty, it is taught:

original: 'brel pa yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If there is a connection, it is the effect.”

original: nges pa dang bral ba'i phrad pa can gzhan gyi la yang sgrub byed ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽nges pa med pa sgrub byed min //
analyzed: nges pa dang bral ba'i phrad pa can gzhan gyi la yang sgrub byed ma yin par bstan pa ni / nges pa med pa sgrub byed min //
translated: It is taught that the other, which is contact without certainty, is not the probandum:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Without certainty, it is not the probandum.”

original: nges pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba yin gyi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'gro ba'i du ba'i rtse mo la ma 'gro ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba yin gyi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'gro ba'i du ba'i rtse mo la ma 'gro ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Since certainty itself is the pervasion, it is not the peak of smoke that moves in the middle of space.

original: med na mi 'byung bar nges pa ni bum pa la sogs pa la bdag med na med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa'i yang ma yin nam de'i phyir de yang gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung bar nges pa ni bum pa la sogs pa la bdag med na med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa'i yang ma yin nam de'i phyir de yang gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la /
translated: The reply is:

original: ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid //
analyzed: ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid //
translated: The pervasion is the certainty.

original: ces bya ba ste bdag med pas byas pa'i srog la sogs pa med pa bdag khyab par byed pa nyid yin na yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste bdag med pas byas pa'i srog la sogs pa med pa bdag khyab par byed pa nyid yin na yin te /
translated: If the absence of life, etc. which is produced by the absence of self pervades self,

original: gzhan lag pas gzhan ldog par nges pa med pa'i phyir nges pa can ldog pa na khyab par byed pa dang khyab par bya ba nyid du nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan lag pas gzhan ldog par nges pa med pa'i phyir nges pa can ldog pa na khyab par byed pa dang khyab par bya ba nyid du nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: then when the certainty is that the one is absent when the other is absent, it is certain that there is pervasion and pervaded.

original: ldog pas rjes su 'gro ba 'phangs pa yin gyi ma mthong ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ldog pas rjes su 'gro ba 'phangs pa yin gyi ma mthong ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: The pervasion is implied by the contradistinction, but it is not merely the non-observation.🔽The demonstration that the absence of something is only present when the other is present is:

original: med na mi 'byung ba yang de yod pa nyid na yod pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni bdag med pa las ldog pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba yang de yod pa nyid na yod pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni bdag med pa las ldog pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The contradistinction of the absence of self.

original: rjes su 'gro ba gcig tu 'dzin pa med de thams cad du zhes de'i ldog pa la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gcig tu 'dzin pa med de thams cad du zhes de'i ldog pa la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o //
translated: There is no apprehension of a single pervasion, because the term “all” is not related to the contradistinction. This is called the “unfavorable case.”

original: rjes su 'gro ba de ltar 'dzin pa ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba de ltar 'dzin pa ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The apprehension of such a pervasion is the apprehension of the essential nature and the effect,

original: yod na 'byung ba tsam ni rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yod na 'byung ba tsam ni rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because mere occurrence when the [reason] is present is not a pervasion. This is shown by “In terms of pervasion.”

original: nges par bzung bas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu nyid gzung bas so //
analyzed: nges par bzung bas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu nyid gzung bas so //
translated: “By the specification” is by the specification of the essential nature and the effect.

original: rjes su 'gro ba bzung ba de'i 'bras bu nyid kho na ldog pas rig par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni gzhan yod pa na yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu ma yin pa yod kyang ngo //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba bzung ba de'i 'bras bu nyid kho na ldog pas rig par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni gzhan yod pa na yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu ma yin pa yod kyang ngo //
translated: The pervasion is apprehended. Its effect is indicated by the contradistinction. This is shown by “Even when the other exists,” where the other is a non-cause.

original: gzhan med na yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu ma yin pa las log pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan med na yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu ma yin pa las log pa med pa'o //
translated: “Even when the other does not exist” is the absence of the contradistinction of a non-cause.

original: ldog pa'am rjes su 'gro ba tsam la yang gzhan pa ma lus pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa'am rjes su 'gro ba tsam la yang gzhan pa ma lus pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor does mere reversal or concomitance depend on all other things.

original: de ni 'bras bu nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: For that is not the concomitance of the effect itself,

original: gsal ba gcig po la yang de'i 'bras bu nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gsal ba gcig po la yang de'i 'bras bu nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because the effect itself is perceived in a single instance.

original: 'di nyid la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by “in this very case.”

original: de tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba ni gsal ba tsam gyis so //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba ni gsal ba tsam gyis so //
translated: “By that alone” means by the mere instance.

original: rjes su 'gro ba 'di la ldog pa yang go sla @284b ba nyid bstan pa ni de yang gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba 'di la ldog pa yang go sla @284b ba nyid bstan pa ni de yang gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the easy understanding of the reversal in this concomitance is “that also from another.”

original: med na mi 'byung ba 'bras bu na yid rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa ni 'di nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba 'bras bu na yid rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa ni 'di nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the effect that is invariably concomitant with the mind is “in this very case.”

original: med na mi 'byung ba 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir gzhan ldog pa dang rjes su 'gro ba yan lag ma yin te 'brel pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir gzhan ldog pa dang rjes su 'gro ba yan lag ma yin te 'brel pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is the effect that is invariably concomitant, the reversal from another is not a part of the concomitance, because it is not of the nature of a relation. This is taught by “the action.”

original: gzhan du ni me'i gsal ba gzhan la'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni me'i gsal ba gzhan la'o //
translated: Otherwise, the manifestation of fire would be in another.

original: 'bras bu nyid rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa ni 'di nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa ni 'di nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the concomitance of the effect is “from this itself.”

original: me na mi 'byung ba'i ldog pa bstan pa ni gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: me na mi 'byung ba'i ldog pa bstan pa ni gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the non-occurrence of the effect in the absence of the cause is “not from another.”

original: rang rig pa yin par bstan pa ni de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa yin par bstan pa ni de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of self-awareness is “in that way.”

original: sngar gyi zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'das pa na'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'das pa na'o //
translated: “Previously” refers to the past cause.

original: de ma thag nyid du ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa la sogs pa'i dpyad pa med par ro //
analyzed: de ma thag nyid du ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa la sogs pa'i dpyad pa med par ro //
translated: “Immediately” means without analysis of the untenability of another.

original: de med na zhes bya ba ni rgyu med na'o //
analyzed: de med na zhes bya ba ni rgyu med na'o //
translated: “Without that” means without a cause.

original: de med na 'bras bu med pa ni rtogs bzhin pa rnams so / sngar gyi zhes bya ba ni ldog pa las so //
analyzed: de med na 'bras bu med pa ni rtogs bzhin pa rnams so / sngar gyi zhes bya ba ni ldog pa las so //
translated: “Without that, the effect does not exist” refers to the presently cognized. “Previously” refers to the negation.

original: de med pa yang gzhan med pa ste rgyu med pa na med pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i ste rtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de med pa yang gzhan med pa ste rgyu med pa na med pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i ste rtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Without that, the absence of another” means without a cause, there is no absence. This is the concomitance. “Cognized” is to be supplied.

original: gzhan las mi 'byung ba'i phyir 'bras bu yin na gzhan pa tsam med kyang khyad par can gzhan las me las bzhin du ba las kyang du ba 'byung ba'i phyir 'bras bu nyid la med na mi 'byung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag med do
analyzed: gzhan las mi 'byung ba'i phyir 'bras bu yin na gzhan pa tsam med kyang khyad par can gzhan las me las bzhin du ba las kyang du ba 'byung ba'i phyir 'bras bu nyid la med na mi 'byung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag med do
translated: If it is an effect because it does not arise from another, then even though there is no mere other, smoke arises from another, namely, fire. Therefore, the effect does not necessarily follow or revert from the non-existence of the other.

original: snyam du sems ba ni gal te gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snyam du sems ba ni gal te gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the thought expressed in the phrase “if it is from another.”

original: ldog pa med do zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'am rjes su 'gro ba tsam las khyad par du'o //
analyzed: ldog pa med do zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'am rjes su 'gro ba tsam las khyad par du'o //
translated: The phrase “there is no reversion” is a specification, either as a restrictive particle or as a mere reiteration.

original: ldog pa yang zhes bya ba ni med na mi 'byung na yang ngo //
analyzed: ldog pa yang zhes bya ba ni med na mi 'byung na yang ngo //
translated: The phrase “even though there is no reversion” means even though there is no arising without the other.

original: ma mthong ba la yang zhes bya ba ni sha za la sogs pa gzhan la yang ngo /
analyzed: ma mthong ba la yang zhes bya ba ni sha za la sogs pa gzhan la yang ngo /
translated: The phrase “even though not seen” means even though it is not seen in another, such as a ghost.

original: rgyu me'i dus na yod pa'i du ba las me nges par byed pas nges pa can gyi du bas khas blang bar bya ba yin par brjod pa na yang brjod pa ni de nges pa nyid yin par brjod pa nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bstan pa
analyzed: rgyu me'i dus na yod pa'i du ba las me nges par byed pas nges pa can gyi du bas khas blang bar bya ba yin par brjod pa na yang brjod pa ni de nges pa nyid yin par brjod pa nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bstan pa
translated: Since fire is ascertained from smoke that exists at the time of the cause, when it is said that the thesis is stated by the smoke that is the basis of the ascertainment, it is said that the statement is impaired by the statement that it is just that ascertainment.

original: ni khyod kyi gtan tshigs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ni khyod kyi gtan tshigs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is called “your reason.”

original: gzhan ltos pa yin na de'i de ma thag tu 'di 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de ma thag tu yod min na'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan ltos pa yin na de'i de ma thag tu 'di 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de ma thag tu yod min na'o zhes bya'o //
translated: If it depends on another, it would not arise immediately after that, so it is said that “if it does not exist immediately.”

original: 'bras bu so so la ni bya ba so so la'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu so so la ni bya ba so so la'o //
translated: In each effect, there is a separate action.

original: nges ba can gyi ldog pa yin pa ni bden te /
analyzed: nges ba can gyi ldog pa yin pa ni bden te /
translated: It is true that there is a separate exclusion.🔽If there is a connection, it is included within the position itself because it is understood, but it is not a part of that.

original: 'brel pa yod pa nyid na de rtogs pas phyogs nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa yin gyi de'i yan lag ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la rang bzhin bdag gam zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa yod pa nyid na de rtogs pas phyogs nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa yin gyi de'i yan lag ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la rang bzhin bdag gam zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The nature is the self, and so on.

original: ldog pa yang 'brel pa'i @285a * //
analyzed: ldog pa yang 'brel pa'i @285a * //
translated: The exclusion also has a connection.

original: shes pa yin na shes par 'gyur la de shes pa'i yul yang rjes su 'gro ba'i yul gyi dpe yin te /
analyzed: shes pa yin na shes par 'gyur la de shes pa'i yul yang rjes su 'gro ba'i yul gyi dpe yin te /
translated: If it is consciousness, it becomes consciousness. And the object of consciousness is the example of a concomitant object.

original: gzhan du na bsgrub bya ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na bsgrub bya ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Otherwise, the probandum is not ascertained. This is the meaning.

original: khyad par ni zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par ni zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //
translated: The word distinction means not common.

original: ci'i phyir ldog pa med ces zer ba la rjes su 'gro yod ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir ldog pa med ces zer ba la rjes su 'gro yod ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Why is there no exclusion? The word nonexistent is used.

original: ldog pa'i nges pa ma shes na 'bral ba'i shes pa yan lag ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa bshad pa ni de'i bdag nyid la nges pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i nges pa ma shes na 'bral ba'i shes pa yan lag ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa bshad pa ni de'i bdag nyid la nges pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the certainty of exclusion is not understood, the explanation of the knowledge of separation as not being a part is stated as not ascertained in its nature.

original: rnam pa de nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i 'brel pa'o //
translated: That very aspect is the connection of identity and origination.

original: de ltar yang ma gyur te zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma gyur te zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa rtogs pa'o //
translated: Even so, it does not happen means the realization of life, etc.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyis nges par ldog pa'i phyir gcig tu ldog pa'i ngo bo yin par ji ltar gsungs zhes zer ba la ma mthong ba tsam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyis nges par ldog pa'i phyir gcig tu ldog pa'i ngo bo yin par ji ltar gsungs zhes zer ba la ma mthong ba tsam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the master [Dignāga] said that the definition of a single reversal is for the sake of ascertaining the reversal.🔽What is this? It is called “mere non-seeing.”

original: 'di ci las she na gzhan ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya bas ma nges pa nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir na ma nges pa zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: 'di ci las she na gzhan ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya bas ma nges pa nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir na ma nges pa zhes bya ba'o//
translated: Why is this? Because it is said that the other is uncertain.

original: ldog pa nges pa yin na gtan tshigs kho nar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa nges pa yin na gtan tshigs kho nar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: If the reversal is certain, it would be the reason itself.

original: de las bzlog pa la med pa gtan tshigs yin zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa la med pa gtan tshigs yin zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is said that “the absence of that reversal is the reason,”🔽If non-existence is related to things just as things are, is it not that it is not preceded by that?

original: dngos po dag bzhin du dngos po med pa dag kho na 'brel pa yin gyi de sngon du 'gro ba can ni ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te bdag ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dngos po dag bzhin du dngos po med pa dag kho na 'brel pa yin gyi de sngon du 'gro ba can ni ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te bdag ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is said that “the absence of self” is the reason,

original: srog sogs med pas zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed do //
analyzed: srog sogs med pas zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed do //
translated: the absence of life and so on is the probandum.

original: ldog 'gyur na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: ldog 'gyur na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsgrub bya'o //
translated: The statement “If it were the case that . . .” and so on is the probandum.

original: de yang yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni lan no //🔽khyab par bya ba ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i ngo bos srog la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: de yang yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni lan no // khyab par bya ba ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i ngo bos srog la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: The statement “It does not exist” is the response.🔽The statement “It is not the case that . . .” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not established.🔽The statement “The pervaded is . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is contradictory.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.

original: dngos po ni de'i bdag nyid dam de'i 'bras bu yang rung ba nges khyab pa yin gyi med pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni gzhan ldog par zhes bya ba ste /🔽dngos su ba'am brgyud pas kyang srog la sogs pa dang bdag yod pa dang 'brel pa med de gang gi phyir bdag med las gzhan pa khyab byed ma yin pa las log pas gzhan te /
analyzed: dngos po ni de'i bdag nyid dam de'i 'bras bu yang rung ba nges khyab pa yin gyi med pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni gzhan ldog par zhes bya ba ste / dngos su ba'am brgyud pas kyang srog la sogs pa dang bdag yod pa dang 'brel pa med de gang gi phyir bdag med las gzhan pa khyab byed ma yin pa las log pas gzhan te /
translated: The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.🔽The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.

original: srog la sogs pa khyab bya ma yin pa ldog par mi rigs so //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa khyab bya ma yin pa ldog par mi rigs so //
translated: The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response to the objection that the reason is not present in similar instances.

original: de ste srog la sogs pa rnams kyi bdag nyid de ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de ste srog la sogs pa rnams kyi bdag nyid de ngo bo'o //
translated: The statement “The entity . . . ” and so on is the response

original: de las te bdag las byung ba ni skyes pa'o snyam du sems pa ni brgyud pa'i 'brel pas grub pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de las te bdag las byung ba ni skyes pa'o snyam du sems pa ni brgyud pa'i 'brel pas grub pa'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning of “arisen from that” is established by the relation of succession.

original: de ste bdag gi bdag nyid de ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de ste bdag gi bdag nyid de ngo bo'o //
translated: “That” means the self’s own nature.

original: srog la sogs pa gang gi @285b yin pa de'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa gang gi @285b yin pa de'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
translated: “Of that” means of the life faculty, etc.

original: 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rtsol ba la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni srog la sogs pa 'bras bu la yang de ltar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rtsol ba la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni srog la sogs pa 'bras bu la yang de ltar brjod pa yin no //
translated: “Because it is the cause of the collection” means that the cause of the collection characterized by effort, etc., is the life faculty, etc.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “If” and so on.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni bdag gi 'bras bu nyid yin pas rgyu'i khyad par gyi bskyed bya nyid yin gyi skyed byed nyid tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bdag gi 'bras bu nyid yin pas rgyu'i khyad par gyi bskyed bya nyid yin gyi skyed byed nyid tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: “This” means that because it is the effect of the self, it is the product of a specific cause, but it is not merely the product of a cause.

original: res 'ga' ba nyid du grub pa'i phyir de ste srog la sogs pa ma rtogs na bdag rtogs kyang srog la sogs pa dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dag gis grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: res 'ga' ba nyid du grub pa'i phyir de ste srog la sogs pa ma rtogs na bdag rtogs kyang srog la sogs pa dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dag gis grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Sometimes, it is established as a living being. Therefore, if the self is not perceived when life, etc. are not perceived, it is established by the perception and non-perception of life, etc. This is the meaning.

original: bdag dang lhan cig ma dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdag dang lhan cig ma dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The self is not non-perceived together with them.

original: de'i bdag nyid ni bdag dmigs pa yod na zhes bya bar sbyar nas /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni bdag dmigs pa yod na zhes bya bar sbyar nas /
translated: If the self is perceived, it is not the case that the self is not perceived.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa la yang 'jug pa rig pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa la yang 'jug pa rig pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition that engages in what is not its effect is the nature of cause and effect.

original: bdag dmigs pa dang ma dmigs pa dag rgyu nyid yin pa dang / srog la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid ni dbang po las 'das pa la sgrub pa ma yin la dbang po'i yul la yang de dag med na 'bras bu nyid la sogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni shin tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag dmigs pa dang ma dmigs pa dag rgyu nyid yin pa dang / srog la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid ni dbang po las 'das pa la sgrub pa ma yin la dbang po'i yul la yang de dag med na 'bras bu nyid la sogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni shin tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The self is not the cause of the perception and non-perception of life, etc., nor is life, etc. the effect of the self. This is established in the case of what is beyond the senses. Even in the case of what is within the senses, if they do not exist, they cannot be the effect, etc. This is indicated by the word at all.

original: dgag pa'i dus na thams cad lkog tu gyur pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: dgag pa'i dus na thams cad lkog tu gyur pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not the case that at the time of negation, everything is completely hidden?

original: gzhan du mthong ba ni cung zad kyang khyad par can du mthong ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la gzhan pa ste yul dang dus la yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan du mthong ba ni cung zad kyang khyad par can du mthong ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la gzhan pa ste yul dang dus la yang ngo //
translated: And is it not the case that what is seen elsewhere is not seen to be in the least different?

original: ma mthong ba tsam las med pa yin na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du sngon po'i lus la yang 'gyur te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam las med pa yin na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du sngon po'i lus la yang 'gyur te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were merely the absence of seeing, then blue would be like a pot, because there would be no difference.

original: mthong du rung ba ni mthong ba med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mthong du rung ba ni mthong ba med par 'gyur te /
translated: What is suitable to be seen would not be seen.

original: des khyab pa'i phyir yin la /
analyzed: des khyab pa'i phyir yin la /
translated: Because it is pervaded by that.

original: gson po'i lus la bdag ni de ltar ma yin par bum pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gson po'i lus la bdag ni de ltar ma yin par bum pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: But the self is not like that in the living body, which is similar to a pot, etc.

original: gang gi phyir dmigs pa log na khyab bya ldog par byed pa yin gyi dngos po tsam ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dmigs pa log na khyab bya ldog par byed pa yin gyi dngos po tsam ni ma yin te /
translated: Because when the object is negated, the pervaded is negated, but not merely the thing.

original: dmigs pa med pa rnams kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa rnams kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even those without objects exist.

original: de'i phyir bdag mi dmigs pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag mi dmigs pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the non-observation of the self is not a non-observation that is a pervader.

original: bum pa la sogs pa la bdag med par ma nges pa na mi mthun pa'i phyogs la nges pa med pa yin la mi mthun pa'i phyogs las log pa la nges pa med pa'i srog la sogs pa ldog pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdag med pa la
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la bdag med par ma nges pa na mi mthun pa'i phyogs la nges pa med pa yin la mi mthun pa'i phyogs las log pa la nges pa med pa'i srog la sogs pa ldog pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdag med pa la
translated: When a pot, etc. is not ascertained as selfless, there is no ascertainment of the counter-correlate. When there is no ascertainment of the counter-correlate, the reversal of life, etc. is not ascertained as the counter-correlate of the self.

original: khyab pa can ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni ldog pa shes pa med pa'i zhes bya ba ste /🔽med @286a * //
analyzed: khyab pa can ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni ldog pa shes pa med pa'i zhes bya ba ste / med @286a * //
translated: The teaching that it is not a pervader is “when there is no knowledge of the reversal.”

original: par ma nges pa'i bdag med pa'i med pa yod pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa med pa ldog pa med na khyab pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par ma nges pa'i bdag med pa'i med pa yod pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa med pa ldog pa med na khyab pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When the non-existence of the self is not ascertained, the existence of the non-existence of the self is not ascertained. Therefore, when the non-existence of life, etc. is not ascertained, it is not a pervader.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi srog la sogs pa khyab pa can yin no /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi srog la sogs pa khyab pa can yin no /
translated: It is a pervader of the self-existence of life, etc.

original: de'i med pa yang bdag gi med pa la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i med pa yang bdag gi med pa la 'gyur ro //
translated: The non-existence of that is the non-existence of the self.

original: de'i med pa ni bdag srog la sogs pa med pa'i med pa ste /
analyzed: de'i med pa ni bdag srog la sogs pa med pa'i med pa ste /
translated: The non-existence of that is the non-existence of the non-existence of the self.

original: srog la sogs pa la'o zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa la'o zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
translated: “In life, etc.” is in the commentary.

original: de bstan pa ni srog la sogs pa ni med pa ldog pa la bdag gis khyab par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni srog la sogs pa ni med pa ldog pa la bdag gis khyab par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of that is: “How can the non-existence of life, etc. be pervaded by the self?”

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni bdag gi'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni bdag gi'o //
translated: “That which” is the self.

original: gang ldog pas zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa ldog pas so //
analyzed: gang ldog pas zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa ldog pas so //
translated: “By the cessation of which” is by the cessation of life, etc.

original: de ldog pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi ldog pa de'i'o //
analyzed: de ldog pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi ldog pa de'i'o //
translated: “By the cessation of that” is by the cessation of the qualified.

original: ldog pa ni zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa ni zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Cessation” is of life, etc.

original: des zhes bya ba ni bdag gis so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni bdag gis so //
translated: “By that” is by the self.

original: ldog pa log pas med pa'i med pa yod pa'i phyir 'di ni khyab par bya ba dang cig shos kyi ngo bo bdag gi med pa ma nges pa srid pa ma yin par bstan pa ni bdag ldog pa ma grub pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa log pas med pa'i med pa yod pa'i phyir 'di ni khyab par bya ba dang cig shos kyi ngo bo bdag gi med pa ma nges pa srid pa ma yin par bstan pa ni bdag ldog pa ma grub pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The cessation of the cessation” is the existence of the non-existence of the non-existence. Therefore, it is not possible that the existence of the pervaded and the other be the non-existence of the self. The demonstration of that is: “Since the cessation of the self is not established.”

original: gal te bum pa la bdag ma dmigs pas med par grub pa mi byed pa de lta na yod par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la srog la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bum pa la bdag ma dmigs pas med par grub pa mi byed pa de lta na yod par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la srog la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that the self is not established as nonexistent because it is not perceived in a pot, then it would exist.

original: kha cig tu mthong ba ni mthong ba dang mthong ba dag gis yod pa dang med pa nyid du nges par byed de srog la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu mthong ba ni mthong ba dang mthong ba dag gis yod pa dang med pa nyid du nges par byed de srog la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: In some cases, one determines existence and nonexistence by seeing and not seeing, as in the case of life force and so on.

original: bdag ni ma yin te mthong ba med pa'i phyir dang / nyams su myong ba ni skad cig ma nyid kyis de nyid kyi shes pa la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag ni ma yin te mthong ba med pa'i phyir dang / nyams su myong ba ni skad cig ma nyid kyis de nyid kyi shes pa la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But the self is not like that, because it is not seen and because the experience of it is undermined by the cognition of momentariness.

original: srog la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa nyid dag gis bdag yod pa dang med pa ni lus dang bum pa dag la rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa nyid dag gis bdag yod pa dang med pa ni lus dang bum pa dag la rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Are the existence and nonexistence of the self not understood through the existence and nonexistence of life force and so on, just as the existence and nonexistence of a pot are understood through the existence and nonexistence of a pot?

original: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la srog la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa dag gis rgyu blo la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa rtogs pa yin gyi bdag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don
analyzed: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la srog la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa dag gis rgyu blo la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa rtogs pa yin gyi bdag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don
translated: One should understand that the existence and nonexistence of life force and so on are the causes of the existence and nonexistence of the mind and so on, but not the self.

original: bstan pa ni rgyu gang zhig ces bya ba ste /🔽gzhan du yang 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan pa ni rgyu gang zhig ces bya ba ste / gzhan du yang 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the statement “What is the cause?”🔽is that it is tenable that the mind and so on arise from the existence and nonexistence of life force and so on, but not from the self.

original: srog la sogs pa med pas chos mi mthun pa nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa med pa ni chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis so //🔽bdag dang bcas par zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa med pas chos mi mthun pa nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa med pa ni chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis so // bdag dang bcas par zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if life force and so on are not the cause of the mind and so on, the mind and so on are still not the self because they are impermanent.

original: lus bdag med pa nyid yin na bum pa bzhin du srog la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la mi 'dod par @286b thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lus bdag med pa nyid yin na bum pa bzhin du srog la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la mi 'dod par @286b thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “If the body is selfless, it follows that, like a vase, it is devoid of life force and so on” is made by one who thinks that if the body is selfless, it follows that, like a vase, it is devoid of life force and so on.🔽The statement “This is unacceptable” is made by one who thinks that the body is not devoid of life force and so on.

original: gal te cung zad ces bya ba ste tha dad pa yang zhes bya ba ni bum pa las lus so //
analyzed: gal te cung zad ces bya ba ste tha dad pa yang zhes bya ba ni bum pa las lus so //
translated: If there is a slight difference, that is, if the body is different from the pot,

original: blo la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis cung zad chos mthun pa'i phyir ni bdag med pa nyid du chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis cung zad chos mthun pa'i phyir ni bdag med pa nyid du chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the body is not the self because of the similarity of selflessness, that is, because of the similarity of the absence of self.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni srog la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni srog la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid do //
translated: That is, it is not endowed with life, etc.

original: gzhal bya nyid phyir ni lus bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa bdag dang bcas par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid phyir ni lus bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa bdag dang bcas par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If it were endowed with life, etc., then the pot, etc., would have a self, like the body, because of being an object of knowledge.

original: bum pa la sogs pa 'di bdag med pa ma yin te gzhal bya nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa 'di bdag med pa ma yin te gzhal bya nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: But the pot, etc., are not without a self, because it would follow that they would not be objects of knowledge.

original: mo gsham gyi bu la sogs mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi shes bya nyid las gzhal bya nyid las log pa yin zhing mthun pa'i phyogs la yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu la sogs mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi shes bya nyid las gzhal bya nyid las log pa yin zhing mthun pa'i phyogs la yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The non-object of knowledge, such as the son of a barren woman, is not an object of knowledge, and it is not in the similar instance,

original: de med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa bzhin ldog pa can yin no //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa bzhin ldog pa can yin no //
translated: because it does not exist. Therefore, like life, etc., it is excluded.

original: tshad ma'i stobs kyis mi 'dod kyang 'ongs pa spang bar mi rigs par bstan pa ni mi 'dod ce na zhes bya ba'o //🔽tshad mas bsgrub pa yang rang gi rgyud 'joms pa dor bya ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshad ma'i stobs kyis mi 'dod kyang 'ongs pa spang bar mi rigs par bstan pa ni mi 'dod ce na zhes bya ba'o // tshad mas bsgrub pa yang rang gi rgyud 'joms pa dor bya ma yin nam /
translated: If you say, “We do not accept it,”🔽then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa nyid kyis de yang rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba la dngos po dang dngos med rnam gzhag ste nges pa'o //🔽tsher ma la sogs pa dor byar tshad mas grub kyang 'dod pas 'dor ba yin pa yang bdag la sogs pa blang bar bya ba ni de lta ma yin te de lta yin na /🔽bdag cag gis bdag la sogs pa 'dor la khyed kyis kyang bdag med pa nyid bor ba'i phyir rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa nyid kyis de yang rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba la dngos po dang dngos med rnam gzhag ste nges pa'o // tsher ma la sogs pa dor byar tshad mas grub kyang 'dod pas 'dor ba yin pa yang bdag la sogs pa blang bar bya ba ni de lta ma yin te de lta yin na / bdag cag gis bdag la sogs pa 'dor la khyed kyis kyang bdag med pa nyid bor ba'i phyir rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.

original: tshad ma'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshad ma'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by means of valid cognition,” then you have no grounds for your assertions.🔽If you say, “We do not accept the establishment of things by

original: 'dod pas dngos po yod pa dang med pa 'dor bar byed ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dod pas dngos po yod pa dang med pa 'dor bar byed ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “By desire, one abandons existent and nonexistent things” is to be supplied.

original: ma 'chol ba med pa ni 'chol ba nyid do //
analyzed: ma 'chol ba med pa ni 'chol ba nyid do //
translated: “Not unmixed” means “mixed.”

original: gzhan nyid ces bya ba ni dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams so //🔽bum pa dang lus bdag med pa nyid du khyad par med na srog la sogs pa ji ltar yong ces zer ba la srog dang mig 'byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ces bya ba ni dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams so // bum pa dang lus bdag med pa nyid du khyad par med na srog la sogs pa ji ltar yong ces zer ba la srog dang mig 'byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Other” refers to memory, desire, etc.🔽If the pot and the body are not different in being selfless, how can there be life, etc.?

original: rlung 'byin pa dang 'dren pa ni 'bang rtsol med pas gang las yin zhes bya bas srog la sogs pa ni rtsol ba las byung ba yin la de yang 'dod pa las so //
analyzed: rlung 'byin pa dang 'dren pa ni 'bang rtsol med pas gang las yin zhes bya bas srog la sogs pa ni rtsol ba las byung ba yin la de yang 'dod pa las so //
translated: The “life” and “opening of the eyes” are the exhalation and inhalation of the breath, which are due to the effort of the life-force, which is due to desire.

original: 'dod pa yang nyams su myong ba dran pa yin na dran pa de yang yul dang dbang po dang blo dag las yin te //🔽yul dang dbang po 'dzin pa ni bdag dang dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dor @287a * //
analyzed: 'dod pa yang nyams su myong ba dran pa yin na dran pa de yang yul dang dbang po dang blo dag las yin te // yul dang dbang po 'dzin pa ni bdag dang dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dor @287a * //
translated: Desire is the memory of experience, which is due to the object, sense-faculty, and mind.

original: pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: pa'i ched du'o //
translated: The apprehension of the object and sense-faculty is for the sake of abandoning the self, Īśvara, etc.

original: nyams su myong ba'i bag chags las byung ba'i dran pa ni dran par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i bag chags las byung ba'i dran pa ni dran par byed pa yin no //
translated: Memory arises from the latent impressions of experience.

original: de med na gzhan yang de nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na gzhan yang de nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it did not exist, it would be unreasonable for another to be that.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni yul dang dbang po dang blo rnams te yul dang dbang po dang blo'i skad cig rnams ni snga ma'i rang gi rigs rnams yin pa de las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni yul dang dbang po dang blo rnams te yul dang dbang po dang blo'i skad cig rnams ni snga ma'i rang gi rigs rnams yin pa de las 'byung ba'o //
translated: “Those” refers to objects, faculties, and cognitions. The moments of objects, faculties, and cognitions are of the same kind as their predecessors, arising from them.

original: phan tshun rkyen nyid du ltos pa yin gyi de la yang bdag rgyu nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun rkyen nyid du ltos pa yin gyi de la yang bdag rgyu nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa ma yin no //
translated: They are mutually dependent as conditions, but the self does not enter into the cause of that.

original: bdag nyid ni bdag gi dngos po 'di'o zhes bya ba tha snyad byed pa po'i skyes bu'i mngon sum mo //
analyzed: bdag nyid ni bdag gi dngos po 'di'o zhes bya ba tha snyad byed pa po'i skyes bu'i mngon sum mo //
translated: The self is the direct perception of the person who makes the convention “this is the nature of the self.”

original: 'di ni rang nyid gsal ba nyid do zhes bya ba yang 'di nyid la yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rang nyid gsal ba nyid do zhes bya ba yang 'di nyid la yin te /
translated: This is itself the self-illumination.

original: gzhan la tshad ma med pa'i phyir lung tsam gyis go byar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan la tshad ma med pa'i phyir lung tsam gyis go byar 'gyur te /
translated: This is understood by mere scripture, because there is no other valid cognition for that.

original: mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not perceived.

original: de mthong ba las byang grol yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de mthong ba las byang grol yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not liberated by seeing it.

original: gdol pa'i bar la'ang ma btsal bzhin //
analyzed: gdol pa'i bar la'ang ma btsal bzhin //
translated: And it is not sought even among the untouchables.

original: lung nyid las ni snang ba yin //
analyzed: lung nyid las ni snang ba yin //
translated: It is seen in the scriptures.

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not reasonable.

original: de'i phyir de tsam la ni zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i cha la yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de tsam la ni zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i cha la yin no //
translated: Therefore, “in that alone” means in the aspect of the positive and negative concomitances.🔽“Arisen from that alone” means “ultimately,” because there is no other cause.

original: de tsam las byung ba ni mthar thug pa yin te rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir thug pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de tsam las byung ba ni mthar thug pa yin te rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir thug pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that there is no infinite regress is as follows:

original: dran pa las mthong ba'i tha dad pa nyams su myong ba yin la /
analyzed: dran pa las mthong ba'i tha dad pa nyams su myong ba yin la /
translated: Memory experiences the difference between seeing and not seeing.

original: dran pa po dang mthong ba po dag gi yang /
analyzed: dran pa po dang mthong ba po dag gi yang /
translated: And the one who remembers and the one who sees

original: de'i ngo bo dang 'brel pa can nyid yin na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo dang 'brel pa can nyid yin na /
translated: are related to the nature of that.

original: de dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin na de nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin na de nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If they are not related to that, it is shown that they are not that:

original: dran pa gcig la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa gcig la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In one memory.”

original: gzhan gyi khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni dran pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni dran pas so //
translated: “By the difference of another” means by memory.

original: nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa'i phyir dran pa nyams su myong ba'i yul ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du de'i khyad par gyis bskyed pa'i phyir de'i khyad par gyi yul ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa'i phyir dran pa nyams su myong ba'i yul ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du de'i khyad par gyis bskyed pa'i phyir de'i khyad par gyi yul ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Because it is generated by the latent potentialities of experience, it is the object of the experience of memory. But it is not the object of the particularity of memory, because it is generated by the particularity of the object.🔽

original: rang gi rgyu las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is produced by the latent impressions of experience, the object of memory is just as it was experienced. Because it is produced by its special qualities, it is not the object of its special qualities. This is taught by “from its own cause.”

original: de nyid dran pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni dran par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid dran pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba ni dran par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “That itself is the cause of memory” means that it is the cause of remembering.

original: ci las she na /
analyzed: ci las she na /
translated: From what?

original: rgyu nyid la ni gzung bar shes //
analyzed: rgyu nyid la ni gzung bar shes //
translated: “The cause is known as the object.”

original: zhes pa'i rigs pas bstan pa ni //
analyzed: zhes pa'i rigs pas bstan pa ni //
translated: This is taught by the reasoning.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Because of the reasoning of cause and effect.”

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid kyis so zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽bdag smra ba pos kyang nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyi nges pa ni dran pa nges pa'i rgyur khas blang bar bya ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid kyis so zhes bya ba'i don to // bdag smra ba pos kyang nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyi nges pa ni dran pa nges pa'i rgyur khas blang bar bya ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This means because of the nature of object and subject.

original: bdag yod pa nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag yod pa nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The self-proponent also must accept that the certainty of latent impressions of experience is the cause of the certainty of memory. This is taught by “because of the existence of the self.”

original: bdag gi nus pas dran pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ba zhig na 'gyur ba ni @287b ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi nus pas dran pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ba zhig na 'gyur ba ni @287b ma yin no //
translated: It would be so if it were due to one’s own power, but it is not so.

original: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i bag chags las byung ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni /🔽der 'gyur na ni 'gyur phyir dang // zhes bya ba ste nyams su myong ba dang bag chags dag gi rnam par 'gyur bas 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i bag chags las byung ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni / der 'gyur na ni 'gyur phyir dang // zhes bya ba ste nyams su myong ba dang bag chags dag gi rnam par 'gyur bas 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: Therefore, it is taught that it arises only from the latent impressions of experience:🔽If it were so, it would be due to transformation.🔽The difference is that it is due to the transformation of both experience and latent impressions.

original: rjes 'gro ldog pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes 'gro ldog pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is due to the transformation of both experience and latent impressions.

original: nyams su myong ba po med na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba po med na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If there were no experiencer,🔽it would not be so.

original: mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rgyu nyid yin par thal bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rgyu nyid yin par thal bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It would not be so, because it would follow that it is the cause.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus dang 'brel pa can gyi gnas pa po'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus dang 'brel pa can gyi gnas pa po'o //
translated: The one who is connected to the earlier and later times is the experiencer.

original: mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: It is not direct perception.

original: rim pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: rim pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la /
translated: Because it is not sequential.

original: gang gi phyir gnas skabs zhes bya ba ste ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir gnas skabs zhes bya ba ste ;
translated: Because of the connection with the state,

original: gnas skabs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas skabs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not temporary.

original: lus gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: lus gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs la'o //
translated: “Another body” refers to a different state.

original: nged kyi phyogs grub pa la ni zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: nged kyi phyogs grub pa la ni zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa grub pa'o //
translated: “When our position is established” means when selflessness is established.

original: dran pa dang nyams su myong ba tha dad pa de la dran pa po nyid la sogs pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa dang nyams su myong ba tha dad pa de la dran pa po nyid la sogs pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: In that case, memory and experience are different, and it is shown that there is no experiencer, etc.

original: rtag pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that it is permanent.

original: 'du ba yin yang rnam par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par 'gyur ba yang 'di la rtag pa nyid du 'gal ba med pa yin la /
analyzed: 'du ba yin yang rnam par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par 'gyur ba yang 'di la rtag pa nyid du 'gal ba med pa yin la /
translated: Even though there is a collection, because there is no transformation, it is not contradictory for it to be permanent, even though there is a transformation of the nature of consciousness.

original: dran pa dang nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo rnam par 'gyur ba tha dad pa ma yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa yang yin zhing de nyid rtogs pa'i phyir rtog pa yang yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dran pa dang nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo rnam par 'gyur ba tha dad pa ma yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa yang yin zhing de nyid rtogs pa'i phyir rtog pa yang yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Because the nature of memory and experience is not different, it is impermanent. Because it is realized, it is conceptual.🔽If it is thought that memory is the nature of consciousness,

original: gal te de dran byed ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te de dran byed ces bya ba ste /
translated: then it is said:

original: gal te de nyid rtogs pa po dran pa po nyid yin na nyams su myong ba por mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te de nyid rtogs pa po dran pa po nyid yin na nyams su myong ba por mi 'gyur la /
translated: If the one who realizes suchness were the one who remembers, then the one who experiences would not exist.

original: gal te de ltar na dran pa por mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na dran pa por mi 'gyur te /
translated: If that were so, then the one who remembers would not exist,

original: dngos po'i dbye ba ni ngo bo'i dbye ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i dbye ba ni ngo bo'i dbye ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the classification of things is characterized by the classification of their nature.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gnas pa po'i dran pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa ni nyams su myong ba tsam la nyams pa yin gyi de las bdag grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gnas pa po'i dran pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa ni nyams su myong ba tsam la nyams pa yin gyi de las bdag grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “The one who remembers is not tenable as something different from the one who experiences” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.

original: gang phyir dran pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽nyin zhag snga ma la mthong ba rnams la nyid zhag phyi ma la bdag gis 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i shes pa skye ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang phyir dran pa zhes bya ba'o // nyin zhag snga ma la mthong ba rnams la nyid zhag phyi ma la bdag gis 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i shes pa skye ba ma yin nam /
translated: The statement “Because of memory” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.🔽The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.🔽The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.

original: shes pa de las bdag gzhan yod do snyam du sems pa ni /🔽'on te nga zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa de las bdag gzhan yod do snyam du sems pa ni / 'on te nga zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.🔽The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.🔽The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.🔽The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.🔽The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.

original: rnam shes pa zhes bya ba ni dbang po las skyes pa ma yin pa mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam shes pa zhes bya ba ni dbang po las skyes pa ma yin pa mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences.🔽The statement “The thought ‘I saw this in the past’ does not arise in relation to things seen in the past” teaches that the one who remembers is not established as something different from the one who experiences

original: tha la ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha la ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the extreme consequence.

original: skad cig ma dang thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa la yang yid las byung ba'i shes pa dgag pa med pa @288a * //
analyzed: skad cig ma dang thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa la yang yid las byung ba'i shes pa dgag pa med pa @288a * //
translated: Also, with regard to momentariness, omniscience, and so on, the non-existence of a mental cognition is taught.

original: yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching is:

original: sngon mthong dran zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon mthong dran zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Remembering what was seen before.”

original: kun rdzob pa tsam zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma mthong ba dag gi rang rig pa'i byed pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas brda ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par zhen par byed cing /
analyzed: kun rdzob pa tsam zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma mthong ba dag gi rang rig pa'i byed pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas brda ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par zhen par byed cing /
translated: “Mere convention” means that, following the activity of reflexive awareness of the seeing of the former and latter, one conceives in accordance with the conventional symbol.

original: shes pa sbyor bar byed pa ni bdag shes pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa sbyor bar byed pa ni bdag shes pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one engages in the cognition of the self.

original: de ni 'di ltar bsgrub bya la rjes su 'jug pa med pa las mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul pa ni mnyan par bya ba bzhin du srog la sogs pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar bsgrub bya la rjes su 'jug pa med pa las mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul pa ni mnyan par bya ba bzhin du srog la sogs pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since that is the case, the teaching that the error of the contrary characteristic is like the heard, and so on, is:

original: 'khrul pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “From the very error.”

original: ji ltar sgrub min nyid las de //
analyzed: ji ltar sgrub min nyid las de //
translated: How is it that it is not established?

original: zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las so //
translated: This is because of the very discordant position.

original: ldog pa ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: The reversal is the difference.

original: 'on kyang bsgrub bya las kyang ste mthun pa'i phyogs las kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub bya las kyang ste mthun pa'i phyogs las kyang ngo //
translated: But also from the probandum, and from the concordant position.

original: de ni mnyan par bya ba nyid ces bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
analyzed: de ni mnyan par bya ba nyid ces bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
translated: That is to be heard, is the opponent's statement.

original: 'o na zhas bya ba ni bsgrub bya las kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'o na zhas bya ba ni bsgrub bya las kyang ngo //
translated: But, is from the probandum.

original: don gyis ni shugs kyis so //
analyzed: don gyis ni shugs kyis so //
translated: By implication, is by force.

original: de zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis so //
translated: That, is by force.

original: gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa la yang ngo //
translated: Also in another, is also in life, etc.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya la 'jug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya la 'jug pa med pa'o //
translated: This, is the non-engagement in the probandum.

original: mtshungs zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya yod dam med pa la yang khyad par zung zad kyang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshungs zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya yod dam med pa la yang khyad par zung zad kyang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The same, means that there is no difference at all in the presence or absence of the probandum.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni bsgrub bya rnam par gcod pa yin gyi sog la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni bsgrub bya rnam par gcod pa yin gyi sog la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: To be heard is the exclusion of the probandum, not of life, etc.

original: bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid las rnam par bcad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di khyad par ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la bsgrub min nyid la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid las rnam par bcad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di khyad par ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la bsgrub min nyid la zhes bya ba'o //
