translated: Is it not the case that the word “only” is a qualifier?

original: khyad par gyi sgrub pa ni khyad par dgag pa la brten pa yin pa'i phyir sgra dang don dag las gcig gis gnyi ga ston pa yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gyi sgrub pa ni khyad par dgag pa la brten pa yin pa'i phyir sgra dang don dag las gcig gis gnyi ga ston pa yin te /
translated: The word “only” is not a qualifier, because the proof of a qualifier is based on the negation of a qualifier. Therefore, both the word and the meaning indicate only.

original: gzhan du na mnyan par bya bas 'di las khyad par med do //
analyzed: gzhan du na mnyan par bya bas 'di las khyad par med do //
translated: Otherwise, there would be no difference between this and what is to be heard.

original: de bstan pa ni don go bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni don go bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of this is “because the meaning is understood.”

original: yang ldog pa'i ngag gis rjes su 'gro ba ston pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba'i ngag gis kyang ldog pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /🔽de nyid phyir na don go bas //
analyzed: yang ldog pa'i ngag gis rjes su 'gro ba ston pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba'i ngag gis kyang ldog pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni / de nyid phyir na don go bas //
translated: Moreover, the demonstration of concomitance by a statement of the contrapositive and the demonstration of the contrapositive by a statement of concomitance are shown by the words

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore, the meaning is understood.”

original: 'di 'dra'i zhes bya ba ni mnyan par bya ba nyid dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ste /
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i zhes bya ba ni mnyan par bya ba nyid dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ste /
translated: The word “such” is not similar to what is to be heard.

original: bsgrub min nyid las zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'i mtshan nyid can nam med na mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub min nyid las zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'i mtshan nyid can nam med na mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: “From the very thing that is not to be established” means that it is a necessary condition, or that it does not occur in the absence of the other.

original: slob dpon gyis ma gsungs so zhes bya ba 'di la yang thams cad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ma gsungs so zhes bya ba 'di la yang thams cad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: “The master has not said this” means that everything is said.

original: gsal bar ma rtogs kyang gsungs pa la gsungs pa kho nar go pa yin te gzhan du na khyad par du @288b dgag pa la don med do //
analyzed: gsal bar ma rtogs kyang gsungs pa la gsungs pa kho nar go pa yin te gzhan du na khyad par du @288b dgag pa la don med do //
translated: Even though it is not clearly understood, it is understood that it is said, because otherwise the negation would be meaningless.

original: de bzhin du med na mi 'byung ba dgag pas yod na yod pa 'phangs pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du med na mi 'byung ba dgag pas yod na yod pa 'phangs pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid yin no //
translated: In the same way, since the negation of the absence of the necessary condition implies the presence of the necessary condition, it is just that.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus pa 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba can no //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus pa 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba can no //
translated: “This” refers to the apprehension of the entire discordant class.

original: ldog pa 'dzin pa ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir nus pa ma yin gyi de dang 'brel pa can nyid na de nyid gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas gzhan las med par bya sla ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ldog pa 'dzin pa ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir nus pa ma yin gyi de dang 'brel pa can nyid na de nyid gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas gzhan las med par bya sla ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since the apprehension of the negation is infinite, it is not possible, but when it is related to that, it is just that, and it does not become something else. The ease of negating nonexistence from something else is shown by “it is easy.”

original: bdag nyid la ni 'brel pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag nyid la ni 'brel pa'i phyir //
translated: because it is related to the self.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: 'o na med pa yin par 'gyur bas zhes bya bas mnyan par bya ba nyid las khyad par med pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na med pa yin par 'gyur bas zhes bya bas mnyan par bya ba nyid las khyad par med pa'o //
translated: But if it is nonexistent, then there is no difference between it and what is to be heard.

original: ngas ni srog la sogs pa bdag gi rjes su 'gro bar smras pa ma yin pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ngas ni srog la sogs pa bdag gi rjes su 'gro bar smras pa ma yin pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa la /
translated: I do not at all maintain that life and so on are the self’s followers.

original: bkag par 'gog par byed ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bkag par 'gog par byed ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation of the refutation is stated in the words “It is not tenable that the object of refutation is nonexistent.”

original: bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid las rnam par bcad pa bsgrub bya la ma yin par bden mod kyi bsgrub bya yod na bsgrub pa yin gyi med pa la ni ma yin te 'gal ba'i phyir 'gog pa yang rten nyid la sogs pas blo'i spyod yul ma yin
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid las rnam par bcad pa bsgrub bya la ma yin par bden mod kyi bsgrub bya yod na bsgrub pa yin gyi med pa la ni ma yin te 'gal ba'i phyir 'gog pa yang rten nyid la sogs pas blo'i spyod yul ma yin
translated: It is true that the object of refutation is not the negation itself, but rather the negatee. However, if the object of refutation exists, then the refutation is of it, but if it does not exist, then the refutation is not of it, because that would be contradictory.

original: pa'i phyir nye bar brjod pa ma yin pa la 'thad pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni bsgrub bya nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa'i phyir nye bar brjod pa ma yin pa la 'thad pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni bsgrub bya nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Also, it is not tenable that the negatee is not the object of the mind, because it is the basis of the mind and so on.🔽The words “It is not tenable that the object of refutation is nonexistent” are stated because of the thought that if the object of refutation exists, then it is refuted, but if it does not exist, then it is not refuted, because that would be contradictory.

original: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya med pa las te mthun pa'i phyogs las so //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya med pa las te mthun pa'i phyogs las so //
translated: The reason that has life, etc. is not pervaded by the probandum, i.e., by the similar instance.

original: bsgrub min nyid la zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: bsgrub min nyid la zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la'o //
translated: The word only is for the purpose of precluding the dissimilar instance.

original: med ces bya ba'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: med ces bya ba'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: The word not is the reason.

original: blo'i yul ma yin pa'i bsgrub bya las gtan tshigs ldog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid ldog pa'i ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: blo'i yul ma yin pa'i bsgrub bya las gtan tshigs ldog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid ldog pa'i ldog pa yin no //
translated: The reason does not revert from the probandum that is not an object of the intellect. This is the reversion of the reversion.

original: gtan tshigs dang de ldog pa'i ldog pa yin pas cung zad kyang khyad par med pa ji ltar yin zhes bstan pa ni de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang de ldog pa'i ldog pa yin pas cung zad kyang khyad par med pa ji ltar yin zhes bstan pa ni de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How can there be no difference at all between the reason and the reversion of the reason? This is stated by that itself.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni ldog pa ldog pa'o //🔽ldog pa'i gzhi gang yin pa ni ldog pa'i'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni ldog pa ldog pa'o // ldog pa'i gzhi gang yin pa ni ldog pa'i'o //
translated: And that is the reversion of the reversion.🔽The basis of the reversion is the reversion of the reason.

original: ldog pa'i 'byung khungs zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ldog pa'i'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i 'byung khungs zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ldog pa'i'o //
translated: The source of the reversion is the reversion of the reason.

original: gang dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gang dang ngo //
analyzed: gang dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gang dang ngo //
translated: That which possesses is the reason.

original: gang dang zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: gang dang zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: That refers to the answer.

original: med pa la gdon mi za bar bral ba yin par bstan pa ni bral ba tsam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa la gdon mi za bar bral ba yin par bstan pa ni bral ba tsam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that what does not exist is certainly devoid of is “mere absence. ”

original: rtag tu sdig pa las ldog pa zhes bya ba ni phrad pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yin na mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtag tu sdig pa las ldog pa zhes bya ba ni phrad pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yin na mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The statement that there is always a turning away from evil is “not without prior contact. ” The meaning is that it would not be so.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni blo la yod pa'i med pa la gtan tshigs ldog pa dgag pa'i phyir ro //🔽ldog pa ni lhan cig pa yin te 'gal ba med @289a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni blo la yod pa'i med pa la gtan tshigs ldog pa dgag pa'i phyir ro // ldog pa ni lhan cig pa yin te 'gal ba med @289a * //
translated: Therefore, in order to refute the reason for the nonexistence of what exists in the intellect, he says,

original: pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ldog ba med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ldog ba med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Absence is not without presence, ” showing that absence is simultaneous with presence, because there is no contradiction.

original: sgrub pa nyid kyi bshad pa ni dngos yod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa nyid kyi bshad pa ni dngos yod ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the proof itself is “existence is not without presence. ”

original: 'gal ba can ni yod la 'gal ba med pa ni med do zhes bya ba ni blun po nyid ngo //
analyzed: 'gal ba can ni yod la 'gal ba med pa ni med do zhes bya ba ni blun po nyid ngo //
translated: The statement “what is contradictory exists, what is noncontradictory does not exist” is just foolish talk.

original: bzlog kyang zhes bya ba ni yod kyang ngo //
analyzed: bzlog kyang zhes bya ba ni yod kyang ngo //
translated: The statement “even if it is reversed” means “even if it exists. ”

original: cig shos ni med pa ste 'thad pa'i rang bzhin yin yang med do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: cig shos ni med pa ste 'thad pa'i rang bzhin yin yang med do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The other is nonexistence, but even though it has a nature that is tenable, it does not exist.

original: med pa la ni med pa dang / yod pa dang med pa la'o //
analyzed: med pa la ni med pa dang / yod pa dang med pa la'o //
translated: In the non-existent, in the existent and non-existent, and in the non-existent.

original: de la med bzhin pa nyid kho na de las ldog pa nyid du tha snyad 'dogs pa yin par bstan pa ni de la med pa ni zhes bya ba'o //🔽phan tshun spangs pa'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: de la med bzhin pa nyid kho na de las ldog pa nyid du tha snyad 'dogs pa yin par bstan pa ni de la med pa ni zhes bya ba'o // phan tshun spangs pa'i rang bzhin can //
translated: In this regard, the statement “the non-existent in that” teaches that the mere non-existence is the negation of that.

original: zhes bshad pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “mutually exclusive natures” explains that the nature of an entity is not different.

original: de ldog pa la zhes bya ba ni med pa ldog pa'o //
analyzed: de ldog pa la zhes bya ba ni med pa ldog pa'o //
translated: The statement “in the negation of that” means in the negation of the non-existent.

original: sdud par ni 'di ltar gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sdud par ni 'di ltar gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The summary is as follows: “If that is so, then . . . ”

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni dngos po yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni dngos po yang ngo //
translated: The statement “that” refers to the entity.

original: tshad ma gcig 'jug pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dngos po 'dzin par byed pa ste rang gi yul las bzlog pa dgag par byed na rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma gcig 'jug pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dngos po 'dzin par byed pa ste rang gi yul las bzlog pa dgag par byed na rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The statement “by the engagement of a single valid cognition” means that if the entity is apprehended, and the negation of its own object is negated, it is not established.

original: gzhan du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not possible in any other way.

original: rnam pa gzhan la zhes bya ba ni yul las zlog pa la'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan la zhes bya ba ni yul las zlog pa la'o //
translated: The statement “in another mode” means in the negation of the object.

original: rnam pa gzhan gyi ngo bor zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyi ngo bor zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa nyid do //
translated: “The nature of another aspect” is the opposite of that.

original: rnam pa gzhan ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo las bzlog pa'o //
translated: Another aspect is the opposite of the nature of both.

original: phyi rol gyi ngo bo las rnam par gzhag ba ci'i phyir yin zhes zer ba la gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ngo bo las rnam par gzhag ba ci'i phyir yin zhes zer ba la gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: Why is it established as the nature of the external?

original: der ma chud pa ni khong du chud par gyur pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: der ma chud pa ni khong du chud par gyur pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: “That which is not included” is not included there.

original: dngos po med pa ni med bzhin pa'i mthun pa'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni med bzhin pa'i mthun pa'i phyogs la'o //
translated: “Non-entity” is the non-existent similar class.

original: med pa nye bar brjod pa ma yin pa la gtan tshigs 'brel pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: med pa nye bar brjod pa ma yin pa la gtan tshigs 'brel pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the reason not related to the non-existent expression?

original: ji ltar ldog pa brjod pas sgrub pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: ji ltar ldog pa brjod pas sgrub pa ji ltar yin /
translated: How is it established by the expression of the opposite?

original: 'brel pa med pa nyid ldog pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni yon po'i tshig gis bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa nyid ldog pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni yon po'i tshig gis bstan pa ni /
translated: “Like the unrelated” is the teaching with a crooked word.

original: gal te de la ldog med na /
analyzed: gal te de la ldog med na /
translated: If there is no opposite there,

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: it is said.

original: ma 'brel pa'i ngo bo'i 'jug pa ni 'brel pa'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: ma 'brel pa'i ngo bo'i 'jug pa ni 'brel pa'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: The engagement of the nature of non-connection is the nature of connection.

original: 'brel pa'i ngo bo 'di nyid bkag pa yin na ldog pa ci ste ldog ces bya ba ni ldog pa med do zhes bya bas ji ste 'gog ces bya bar sbyar te ldog pa ma yin pas zhes bya bas ni yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i ngo bo 'di nyid bkag pa yin na ldog pa ci ste ldog ces bya ba ni ldog pa med do zhes bya bas ji ste 'gog ces bya bar sbyar te ldog pa ma yin pas zhes bya bas ni yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the nature of the relation is refuted, how could the exclusion be refuted? The phrase “how could the exclusion be refuted?” is connected with the phrase “there is no exclusion.” The phrase “because there is no exclusion” means that it exists.

original: 'brel pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa nyid ldog pa yin te gzhan du na mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa zhes bya ba yang tha snyad du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa nyid ldog pa yin te gzhan du na mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa zhes bya ba yang tha snyad du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The nature of the relation is not the exclusion. Otherwise, the expression “nonexistent in the similar class” would not be possible.

original: bsgrub bya dang dgag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang dgag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “the probandum and the negation” is used.

original: med pa la 'brel pa med pas dgag pa ma yin na med de zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa la 'brel pa med pas dgag pa ma yin na med de zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the negation is not the absence of a relation in the nonexistent, then the expression “it does not exist” would not be possible.

original: de @289b bstan pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs med pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de @289b bstan pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs med pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is demonstrated by the phrase “in the nonexistent similar class.”

original: de bzhin kho nar zhes bya ba ni mi smra pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin kho nar zhes bya ba ni mi smra pa nyid du'o //
translated: The phrase “in the same way” means “without speaking.”

original: ldog pa'i dngos po kho na khyed cag gi med pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ldog pa'i dngos po kho na khyed cag gi med pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the very thing that is excluded your “nonexistent,” and not something else?

original: ci zhes gang du 'gog par byed snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ci zhes gang du 'gog par byed snyam du sems pa la /
translated: What is it that is being denied?

original: yod pa rnams la zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yod pa rnams la zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In response to this, the root text states, “With regard to existents. . . . ”

original: bum pa bzhin du de'i med pa yang yod na dgag pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa bzhin du de'i med pa yang yod na dgag pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: If the nonexistence of something were itself existent, like a pot, then it would not be an object of negation.

original: bum pa'i med pa 'di yin no zhen zhig pa'i bum pa ldog pa ma yin nam gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa'i med pa 'di yin no zhen zhig pa'i bum pa ldog pa ma yin nam gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin no //
translated: But isn’t the nonexistence of a pot the cessation of a broken pot? There is nothing else that is nonexistent.

original: bum pa log bzhin pa kho na med pa yin te /
analyzed: bum pa log bzhin pa kho na med pa yin te /
translated: A pot that is in the process of ceasing is precisely what is nonexistent.

original: de gnas skabs kha cig bum pa las gzhan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de gnas skabs kha cig bum pa las gzhan pa ma yin te /
translated: At a certain point, it is not different from a pot.

original: med pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For, if it were, then it would follow that a nonexistent would be nonexistent.

original: dngos po ldog pa na med pa'i tha snyad du 'jig rten la grags par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po ldog pa na med pa'i tha snyad du 'jig rten la grags par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The root text states that if an existent thing were to cease, then the world would not know it to be nonexistent.

original: de lta med la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta med la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In response to this, the root text states, “In the absence of that. . . . ”

original: yod pa bkag pa ni yod pa kho na bkag pa yin gyi gzhan nye bar brjod pa med pa skyed pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir med pa brjod de dgag byas stong pa'i med pa tsam mo //
analyzed: yod pa bkag pa ni yod pa kho na bkag pa yin gyi gzhan nye bar brjod pa med pa skyed pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir med pa brjod de dgag byas stong pa'i med pa tsam mo //
translated: The negation of an existent is simply the negation of an existent. It does not express anything else, such as a nonexistent. Therefore, the term “nonexistent” refers to a mere absence, which is the absence of the object of negation.

original: nges par rtogs pa med pa'i yul la zhes bya ba ni nges par rtogs pa'i dgag bya la'o //
analyzed: nges par rtogs pa med pa'i yul la zhes bya ba ni nges par rtogs pa'i dgag bya la'o //
translated: With respect to an object that is not ascertained means with respect to an object of negation that is not ascertained.

original: thams cad la kho bo'i dang 'grel pa po'i bshad pa bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad la kho bo'i dang 'grel pa po'i bshad pa bsdus pa yin no //
translated: All of this is a summary of the explanations of both myself and the commentator.

original: 'on te rtogs pa ni rnam pa gzhan du zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus la sogs pas so ;
analyzed: 'on te rtogs pa ni rnam pa gzhan du zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus la sogs pas so ;
translated: But if ascertainment is in some other way means if it is in terms of place, time, and so on.

original: ; yod pa rnams la dgag pa med pa ni bden mod kyi dngos po dgag pa nye bar brjod pa med pa la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ; yod pa rnams la dgag pa med pa ni bden mod kyi dngos po dgag pa nye bar brjod pa med pa la yang ma yin te /
translated: It is certainly true that there is no negation of existent things, but it is not the case that there is no expression of the negation of things.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: yod pa kho na yul gzhan la lam dus gzhan du dgag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa kho na yul gzhan la lam dus gzhan du dgag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is only existent things that are negated in another place or at another time.

original: de lta na yang yul gang na de rnams yod pa ni dgag pa'i yul ma yin zhing yul dang dus gzhan la yang de dag gtan ma byung ba yin pas med pa'i phyir dgag bya ma yin pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /🔽gal te yul dus 'gog ce na //
analyzed: de lta na yang yul gang na de rnams yod pa ni dgag pa'i yul ma yin zhing yul dang dus gzhan la yang de dag gtan ma byung ba yin pas med pa'i phyir dgag bya ma yin pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni / gal te yul dus 'gog ce na //
translated: Even so, the place where they exist is not the place of negation, and since they do not occur at all in another place or time, they are nonexistent and therefore not objects of negation.🔽This is demonstrated by the passage:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that they are negated in terms of place and time.

original: dngos po las tha dad par nye bar brjod pa med pa ni gzhi nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir rtogs par mi nus pas dgag pa'i yul ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po las tha dad par nye bar brjod pa med pa ni gzhi nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir rtogs par mi nus pas dgag pa'i yul ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the commentary is that since it is not possible to understand a negation that is not expressed as distinct from the entity, it is not a basis.

original: de'i phyir dngos po nyid nyams pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin gyi nyams pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po nyid nyams pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin gyi nyams pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the valid cognition is that the entity itself is the object of the convention, not the mere loss.

original: yod pa dang med pa'i tha snyad kyi dus dag la khyad par cung zad yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i tha snyad kyi dus dag la khyad par cung zad yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t there some difference between the times of the conventions of existence and nonexistence?

original: bden te 'jug pa dang ldog pa @290a * //
analyzed: bden te 'jug pa dang ldog pa @290a * //
translated: It is true, but the difference is only in terms of engagement and withdrawal.

original: yang zhes bya ba yin gyi ldog pa gzhan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba yin gyi ldog pa gzhan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The withdrawal is the same, not another.

original: med par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gzhi med pa'o //
analyzed: med par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gzhi med pa'o //
translated: How could it be nonexistent? It has no basis.

original: dgag par bya ba sgro 'dogs pa'i gzhi ma yin nam /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba sgro 'dogs pa'i gzhi ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the object of negation the basis of superimposition?

original: dgag pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: dgag pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: It is not the object of negation.

original: 'on te dgag par bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te dgag par bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, it is the object of negation.

original: dgag par bya ba bzhin du de'i yul yang mthun pa'i phyogs la sgro 'dogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba bzhin du de'i yul yang mthun pa'i phyogs la sgro 'dogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Just like the object of negation, its object is also a superimposition on the similar class.

original: de lta yin na mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by “If that were so, it would be called the similar class.”

original: 'on te med par zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i sgras yod par gzung na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'on te med par zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i sgras yod par gzung na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “But if it is nonexistent” is to be connected with “if the word pot grasps existence.”

original: gal te yod par zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gal te yod par zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: “If it is existent” is a summary.

original: gal te bum pa nyid ldog pa de'i ldog pa la ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te bum pa nyid ldog pa de'i ldog pa la ma yin na /
translated: If the pot itself is the negation, then its negation is not in the pot.

original: med pa la zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gang du byas /
analyzed: med pa la zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gang du byas /
translated: Where is the expression “in the nonexistent” used?

original: yul med pa la ni yul la sogs pa'i nges pas de 'byung ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /🔽de'i phyir dngos dngos mi rten pa //
analyzed: yul med pa la ni yul la sogs pa'i nges pas de 'byung ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la / de'i phyir dngos dngos mi rten pa //
translated: One might think that without an object, the ascertainment of the object, etc., does not occur.🔽Therefore it is said,

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The thing does not depend on the nonthing.

original: ldog pa'i dngos po rtogs nas bag chags kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni dngos po ldog pa yin pa'i phyir des bstan pa la brten nas med do zhes bya ba'i dgag pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i dngos po rtogs nas bag chags kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni dngos po ldog pa yin pa'i phyir des bstan pa la brten nas med do zhes bya ba'i dgag pa'o //
translated: Having realized the thing that is to be refuted, the conceptual thought that follows after the latent impressions is the thing that is refuted. Therefore, based on what is indicated by that, there is the negation “it does not exist.”

original: de ltar na sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul de'i phyir phyi rol kho na dgag pa yin no zhe na /🔽dngos dang dngos med rten pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar na sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul de'i phyir phyi rol kho na dgag pa yin no zhe na / dngos dang dngos med rten pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thus, because that is the object of words and conceptual thought, therefore, the external object alone is refuted.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la thun mong ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la thun mong ba'o //
translated: “ Existence and nonexistence are not tenable” means that they are not tenable in common.

original: med do zhes bya bas med pa kho na ma yin te yod pa la yang thogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med do zhes bya bas med pa kho na ma yin te yod pa la yang thogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ It does not exist” does not mean that it is nonexistent alone, because it is also obstructed in existence.

original: de bzhin du yod pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du yod pa la yang ngo //
translated: Similarly, it is also in existence.

original: sgra las byung ba dang phyi rol dag la snang ba'i khyad par 'di yin no //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba dang phyi rol dag la snang ba'i khyad par 'di yin no //
translated: This is the difference between what appears from words and what appears externally.

original: de'i phyir phyi rol rten min zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi rol rten min zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: Therefore, “it is not the support of the external” is the summary.

original: phyi rol du lhag par zhen par byas kyang so sor snang ba'i dbye bas de ltar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol du lhag par zhen par byas kyang so sor snang ba'i dbye bas de ltar brjod pa yin no //
translated: Although it is made to adhere externally, it is described in that way by the division of individual appearances.

original: so sor snang ba'i dbye ba nyid bshad pa ni tshad ma'i don yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: so sor snang ba'i dbye ba nyid bshad pa ni tshad ma'i don yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The division of individual appearances is explained as the meaning of valid cognition.

original: gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don la nges pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don la nges pa'o //
translated: The meaning of other is the ascertainment of the meaning of a word.

original: sgra'i don nges pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgra'i don nges pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-ascertainment of the meaning of a word is taught.

original: sgra las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From the word sound.

original: thams cad ni tshad ma ma yin zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni tshad ma ma yin zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: All refers to cognitions such as the two moons.

original: sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad kyang yul bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad kyang yul bstan pa ni /
translated: The presentation of the object of the conventions of affirmation and negation is:

original: gal te tshad ma ma yin par zhes bya ba'o /🔽bsgrub pa'i tshul du zhugs na gal te tshad ma yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gal te tshad ma ma yin par zhes bya ba'o / bsgrub pa'i tshul du zhugs na gal te tshad ma yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If it is not a valid cognition, and so on.🔽If it engages in the mode of affirmation, if it is a valid cognition, and so on is applied.

original: dgag pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i rjes thogs su 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs par 'brel to //
analyzed: dgag pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i rjes thogs su 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs par 'brel to //
translated: After in the mode of negation, engagement and so on are connected.

original: sgrub pa'i tshul du zhugs @290b pa na de nyid kyis tshad ma ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i tshul du zhugs @290b pa na de nyid kyis tshad ma ma yin nam /
translated: But when it is engaged in the mode of proof, is it not a valid cognition?

original: rang rig pa yin pas de la yang dgag pas ci zhig bya snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rang rig pa yin pas de la yang dgag pas ci zhig bya snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: And if you think, “It is reflexive awareness, so what is the use of refuting it?”

original: gal te 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is, “If it is this . . .”

original: ngo bo gzhan du snang ba yin yang de nyid rang rig pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ngo bo gzhan du snang ba yin yang de nyid rang rig pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though it appears as something else, it is taught that it is reflexive awareness.

original: rnam pa gzhan du snang yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du snang yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is, “Even though it appears in another form . . .”

original: 'on te de la dngos po'i nye bar len pa nyid 'gog pa yod pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te de la dngos po'i nye bar len pa nyid 'gog pa yod pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: But if you say, “There is the negation of the appropriation of an entity in that,”

original: rang gi ngo bor zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the response to that is, “Its own nature . . .”

original: dngos po'i nye bar len pa nyid gang gi dgag pa yin pa'i chos grub pa kho na yin na ji ltar 'di'i dgag pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i nye bar len pa nyid gang gi dgag pa yin pa'i chos grub pa kho na yin na ji ltar 'di'i dgag pa yin te /
translated: If the negation of the appropriation of an entity is established as a phenomenon, how can it be the negation of that?

original: de'i nye bar len pa nyid de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gzhan mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i nye bar len pa nyid de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gzhan mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the appropriation of that is the nature of that, another does not appear.

original: de ji ltar sgrub pa dang dgag pa sgra'i don la brten pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba 'di la bstan pa ni /🔽de dag dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ji ltar sgrub pa dang dgag pa sgra'i don la brten pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba 'di la bstan pa ni / de dag dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to this is:

original: sgrub pa dag dang ngo //
analyzed: sgrub pa dag dang ngo //
translated: “Those” refers to the proof and the negation.

original: chos can de zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don to //
analyzed: chos can de zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don to //
translated: The “subject” is the meaning of the words.

original: zhen par bya ba'i 'brel pa can rang rig pa yin na dgag par bya ba dang bsgrub par bya ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: zhen par bya ba'i 'brel pa can rang rig pa yin na dgag par bya ba dang bsgrub par bya ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If it is the object of self-awareness, which is related to the object of conception, how can it be the object of negation and proof?

original: de rig pa yang ma yin la yod pa yang ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de rig pa yang ma yin la yod pa yang ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that it is neither known nor existent is:

original: de 'dra med na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dra med na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If such does not exist…”

original: zhen pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol ma yin te /
analyzed: zhen pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol ma yin te /
translated: It is not external as it is conceived.

original: zhen par bya ba ni tshad mas rtogs bya ma yin zhing rang rig pa yang ma yin la bar ma yang ma yin no //
analyzed: zhen par bya ba ni tshad mas rtogs bya ma yin zhing rang rig pa yang ma yin la bar ma yang ma yin no //
translated: The object of conception is not the object of valid knowledge, nor is it self-awareness, nor is it in between.

original: de lta bur snang ba dang med do zhes bya ba 'gal ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta bur snang ba dang med do zhes bya ba 'gal ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t it contradictory to say that it appears in that way and does not exist?

original: ma yin te sgra 'jug pa nyid las te rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa las snang ba yin no //
analyzed: ma yin te sgra 'jug pa nyid las te rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa las snang ba yin no //
translated: No, it is due to the application of the term, i.e., due to the operation of conceptualization.

original: yod pa dang med pa thun mong ba'i phyir yod pa ste /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa thun mong ba'i phyir yod pa ste /
translated: It is existent because existence and non-existence are common.

original: bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag la rung ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag la rung ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The propriety of affirmation and negation is demonstrated.

original: de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That also is...

original: dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa la rang gi ngo bor mi snang ba gzhan las log par snang ba yin pa'i phyir thun mong ba dang ma nges par rnam par gzhag par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa la rang gi ngo bor mi snang ba gzhan las log par snang ba yin pa'i phyir thun mong ba dang ma nges par rnam par gzhag par byed pa yin te /
translated: Since an entity does not appear in the conceptualization as its own nature, but appears as the exclusion of other, it is established as common and indeterminate.

original: de bstan pa ni gzhan sel ba la brten to zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni gzhan sel ba la brten to zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is demonstrated by the statement: “It is based on the exclusion of other.”

original: de 'dra ba'i phyi rol dang nang gi ba yang zhes bya ba ni dngos dngos med rten pa /
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i phyi rol dang nang gi ba yang zhes bya ba ni dngos dngos med rten pa /
translated: Such an external and internal entity is...

original: phyi rol rten min zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis 'di las gzhan pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol rten min zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis 'di las gzhan pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: This very statement, “The external is not the basis,” excludes anything else.

original: sgro btags pa ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgro btags pa ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: Superimposition is understanding.

original: phyi rol ni shes pa las so //
analyzed: phyi rol ni shes pa las so //
translated: The external is from consciousness.

original: rang bzhin de ngo bo gang gi yin pa de de bzhin te zhen par bya ba ste shes par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang bzhin de ngo bo gang gi yin pa de de bzhin te zhen par bya ba ste shes par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That nature is just as it is of the essence of that, i.e., it is to be adhered to, which is to say, it is to be known.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni chos can gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni chos can gyi'o //
translated: “Its” refers to the subject.

original: shes pa dang shes bya ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa bar na gnas pa las so //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa bar na gnas pa las so //
translated: “Except for cognition and the cognized” means except for the apprehended and the apprehender, which are the defining characteristics.

original: nang @291a * //
analyzed: nang @291a * //
translated: It is not internal.🔽It is not external.

original: yang ma yin phyi rol yang ma yin zhes bya ba shes pa las sam shes bya las kyang gzhan du brtags pa phyi rol gyi 'dra ba nyid las phyi rol du sgro btags pa dang gzung ba'i rnam pa yang de las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: yang ma yin phyi rol yang ma yin zhes bya ba shes pa las sam shes bya las kyang gzhan du brtags pa phyi rol gyi 'dra ba nyid las phyi rol du sgro btags pa dang gzung ba'i rnam pa yang de las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: It is not imagined to be other than cognition or the cognized, but it is a superimposition of externality on the mere appearance of externality. The aspect of the apprehended is not other than that.

original: ma nges pa'i phyir rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa'i phyir rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not imagined because it is not ascertained.

original: phyi rol gyi rnam pa las rang rig pa ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid nyid du zhen pa yin gyi 'di nyid phyi rol ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rnam pa las rang rig pa ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid nyid du zhen pa yin gyi 'di nyid phyi rol ma yin no //
translated: Self-awareness from the aspect of externality is the adherence to the external as the defining characteristic of externality, but it is not external.

original: bde ba la sogs pa la ltos nas phyi rol kho na yin no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa la ltos nas phyi rol kho na yin no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is external because it is related to pleasure, etc., we reply: No,

original: mngon sum gzhan bzhin du rtog pa med pa thob pa'i phyir de nyid phyi rol nyid du rtogs pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gzhan bzhin du rtog pa med pa thob pa'i phyir de nyid phyi rol nyid du rtogs pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: because it is obtained without conceptualization, like any other perception. It is contradictory to claim that it is external.

original: me'i zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid du zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: me'i zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid du zhen pa yin no //
translated: The word “fire” is a reification of an external particular.

original: de ni 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is an error,

original: de la yang gzhan du sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir thug pa med do //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan du sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir thug pa med do //
translated: then there is an infinite regress, because it is a superimposition on something else.

original: de'i phyir rang gi snang ba gzung ba'i rnam pa don ma yin pa phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba nyid la tshad ma 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi snang ba gzung ba'i rnam pa don ma yin pa phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba nyid la tshad ma 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the aspect of the object of the appearance of the self is not an external particular. This is the application of the argument.

original: de nyid gzhan gyi ngo bos rtogs pa yin phyir de nyid yin no zhes zer ba la thug pa med do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid gzhan gyi ngo bos rtogs pa yin phyir de nyid yin no zhes zer ba la thug pa med do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that it is the real thing because it is understood by the nature of something else, then there is an infinite regress.

original: de la yang gzhan gyi ngo bo 'thob pa'i phyir don la ma reg pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa la ma reg pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan gyi ngo bo 'thob pa'i phyir don la ma reg pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa la ma reg pa nyid do //
translated: And, “not touching the object because of not touching the other nature” means not touching the purpose.

original: rang gi rang bzhin la zhes bya ba ni bar na gnas pa'i rang gi yul la'o //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin la zhes bya ba ni bar na gnas pa'i rang gi yul la'o //
translated: “In its own nature” means in its own object that is present.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa nyid gzung ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa rang rig pa yin gyi 'di'i shes bya gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa nyid gzung ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa rang rig pa yin gyi 'di'i shes bya gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the very conceptualization that possesses the aspect of the object is self-awareness. To show that there is no other object of knowledge for it, he says,

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore . . . ”

original: tha snyad las zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa las ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: tha snyad las zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa las ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: “From convention” means that it is not from self-awareness, but rather,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa las rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa las rtogs pa'o //
translated: “from the activity of conceptualization, it is known.”

original: gal te cung zad ces bya ba ni rang rig pa'i byed pa'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed na skyon yin pa'o //
analyzed: gal te cung zad ces bya ba ni rang rig pa'i byed pa'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed na skyon yin pa'o //
translated: “If it does not follow the activity of self-awareness” means that it is a fault.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa las 'di yin no zhes rtog pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa las 'di yin no zhes rtog pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: To show that it is only the conceptualization that is from the activity of conceptualization, he says,

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore . . . ”

original: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa'i byed par ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa'i byed par ro //
translated: Otherwise means: if it were not so.

original: tha snyad pa'i yang mngon par 'dod pa las rang rig pa gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha snyad pa'i yang mngon par 'dod pa las rang rig pa gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the conventional is not different from the self-awareness that is accepted is:

original: sgra las gzhan ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra las gzhan ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: There is nothing other than the word.

original: rtog pa rnams kyi rgyud pa 'ba' zhig yin gyi gzhan brjod bya med do //
analyzed: rtog pa rnams kyi rgyud pa 'ba' zhig yin gyi gzhan brjod bya med do //
translated: It is only the continuum of thoughts, there is no other object of expression.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni me 'o na cig ces brjod pa na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni me 'o na cig ces brjod pa na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained: But when one says 'fire,' etc.

original: dngos po brjod bya yin zhing chos dang chos can tha mi dad pa yin na mngon sum bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa'i yul nyid dang / gcig gis rnam pa thams cad @291b brjod na gnyis la sogs pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po brjod bya yin zhing chos dang chos can tha mi dad pa yin na mngon sum bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa'i yul nyid dang / gcig gis rnam pa thams cad @291b brjod na gnyis la sogs pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: If the thing is the object of expression and the property and the possessor of the property are not different, then, like perception, it would have a unique object, and if one were to express all the aspects, it would be shown that two, etc., do not exist, as in the statement:

original: de lta min na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta min na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, etc.

original: bdag tha dad med phyir zhes bya ba ni dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag tha dad med phyir zhes bya ba ni dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement because there is no difference of self is because there is no division.

original: chos dang chos can dag la dbye ba yod na srid pa dang 'khrul pa dag gis rnam par bcad par bya ba dang rnam par gcod par byed pa'i ngo bos 'bral pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: chos dang chos can dag la dbye ba yod na srid pa dang 'khrul pa dag gis rnam par bcad par bya ba dang rnam par gcod par byed pa'i ngo bos 'bral pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If there were a distinction between the property and the property-possessor, then there would be a separation by the nature of the object of elimination and the eliminator through existence and error.

original: tha dad yin na gzhan dang gzhan //
analyzed: tha dad yin na gzhan dang gzhan //
translated: If they were different, like other,

original: dgag pa dang ni sgrub pa bzhin //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dgag pa dang ni sgrub pa bzhin // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it would be like negation and affirmation.

original: ba lang dang rta dang mi dang glang po che bzhin du /
analyzed: ba lang dang rta dang mi dang glang po che bzhin du /
translated: If the property and the property-possessor were different, then they would be like other things, like a cow, a horse, a human, and an elephant.

original: chos can gcig la 'du mi 'gyur //
analyzed: chos can gcig la 'du mi 'gyur //
translated: They would not be combined in one property-possessor.

original: zhes bya ba ste gzhi mthun pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste gzhi mthun pa med pa'o //
translated: There would be no common locus.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni de bkag na de'i bdag nyid dgag pa ma yin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni de bkag na de'i bdag nyid dgag pa ma yin pa med pa'o //
translated: Just as means that if that is negated, there would be no negation of its nature.

original: ma bkag pa zhes bya ba ni de yang ma bkag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bkag pa zhes bya ba ni de yang ma bkag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Not negated means that it would follow that it is not negated.

original: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi khyad par med pa'i bdag nyid la nus pa med pa'i phyir med pa nyid bzlog par bya ba ma yin no zhe na ma yin te tha dad pa med pas dum bu med pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi khyad par med pa'i bdag nyid la nus pa med pa'i phyir med pa nyid bzlog par bya ba ma yin no zhe na ma yin te tha dad pa med pas dum bu med pa'i phyir ro//
translated: If you say that because there is no difference between the nature of sound and conceptualization, it is not possible to reverse the nonexistence of sound, that is not so, because there is no difference.

original: 'o na thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang nges pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang nges pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that because there is no difference between conceptualization and ascertainment, all is conceptualization,

original: nges pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mngon sum la ni nges pa dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba yod pa yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: nges pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mngon sum la ni nges pa dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba yod pa yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: then, because of the difference between direct perception, which has the nature of ascertainment, and the opposite, conceptualization,

original: rnam par dbye ba yod na zhes bya ba'o //🔽de nges pa yin na ma nges pa de las tha dad pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba yod na zhes bya ba'o // de nges pa yin na ma nges pa de las tha dad pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: there is a difference.🔽If there is a difference, then, because of the difference between ascertainment and non-ascertainment,

original: de rnam par dbye bas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de rnam par dbye bas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is taught that ascertainment is different from non-ascertainment.🔽Because of the difference between ascertainment and non-ascertainment,

original: nges pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: nges pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: there is a difference.

original: sngon po'o zhes bya bas sngon por nges kyang tha dad pa yin yang skad cig ma nyid du ma nges pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: sngon po'o zhes bya bas sngon por nges kyang tha dad pa yin yang skad cig ma nyid du ma nges pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: One might think: Although it is ascertained as blue by 'it is blue', it is not ascertained as momentary, even though it is different.

original: gal te skad cig ma nyid du ma nges kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te skad cig ma nyid du ma nges kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not ascertained as momentary, even though it is ascertained as blue, it is not ascertained as momentary, even though it is different.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni nges pa dang ma nges pa dag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni nges pa dang ma nges pa dag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of contradiction means because of the difference between ascertainment and non-ascertainment.

original: sngon po las skad cig ma nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sngon po las skad cig ma nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't momentariness different from blue?

original: de ji ltar 'di yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'di yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: How can it be this?

original: nges pas gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pas gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is ascertained by ascertainment, it is said if it is ascertained as blue.

original: snga ma dang phyi mar gyur pa'i yul nyid las 'di nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi mar gyur pa'i yul nyid las 'di nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is ascertained from the object that has become prior and posterior.

original: 'on te mthong bas bsgribs pa nye bar rtog pa'i byed pa ni rang gi byed pa'i rjes su 'breng ba can gyi nges pa bskyed pa ni mthong ba nyid byed pa zhen nas lhag par rjes su 'gro ba min pa de'i phyir skad cig ma la gnod pa
analyzed: 'on te mthong bas bsgribs pa nye bar rtog pa'i byed pa ni rang gi byed pa'i rjes su 'breng ba can gyi nges pa bskyed pa ni mthong ba nyid byed pa zhen nas lhag par rjes su 'gro ba min pa de'i phyir skad cig ma la gnod pa
translated: Or, the activity of the conception of what is seen is the production of a definite determinative cognition that is related to its own activity. Since the activity of seeing is not the subsequent engagement of that conception, there is no contradiction in terms of momentariness.

original: med pa yin te /
analyzed: med pa yin te /
translated: There is no contradiction in terms of momentariness.

original: 'gal ba can gyi yul can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba can gyi yul can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The response to the objection that the activity of valid knowledge is not tenable in terms of momentariness is as follows:

original: 'on te gal te sngon por nges pa zhes @292a * //
analyzed: 'on te gal te sngon por nges pa zhes @292a * //
translated: If you say that the ascertainment of blue🔽is the activity of seeing blue,

original: bya ba'o // sngon po tsam mthong ba'i rjes su 'breng ba'i nges pa ni skad cig ma nyid ma gtogs par nges pa nyid ni tshad ma'i byed pa yin la /
analyzed: bya ba'o // sngon po tsam mthong ba'i rjes su 'breng ba'i nges pa ni skad cig ma nyid ma gtogs par nges pa nyid ni tshad ma'i byed pa yin la /
translated: then the ascertainment that is related to the mere seeing of blue is the activity of valid knowledge, except for momentariness.

original: des na mthong ba yang nges pa dang tshul mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i nges pa ni skad cig ma nyid dang 'gal ba can ma yin gyi mthong ba yang bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa ma yin te dgos pa can la nges
analyzed: des na mthong ba yang nges pa dang tshul mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i nges pa ni skad cig ma nyid dang 'gal ba can ma yin gyi mthong ba yang bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa ma yin te dgos pa can la nges
translated: Therefore, because seeing is similar to ascertainment, the ascertainment that accompanies seeing is not inconsistent with momentariness. But seeing does not apprehend all of itself, because ascertainment is primary for one who has a purpose.

original: pa gtso bo yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: pa gtso bo yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation that ascertainment is primary is:

original: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid de ldan phyir //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid de ldan phyir // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it has the characteristic of impairment.

original: mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba ni sngon por nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i rjes su 'breng ba'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba ni sngon por nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i rjes su 'breng ba'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Following the valid cognition of direct perception” means that it is the state of being followed by the valid cognition of direct perception that has the nature of ascertaining blue.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sngon por nges pa'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sngon por nges pa'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: “By that very thing” means by the nature of ascertaining blue.

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma nyid la'o //
translated: “Here” means in regard to momentariness.

original: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni sngon por ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni sngon por ro //
translated: “Elsewhere” means in regard to blue.

original: yang na 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni khyed kyi 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni khyed kyi 'dod pa la'o //
translated: Or, “here” means in regard to your assertion.

original: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni kho bo cag gi 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni kho bo cag gi 'dod pa la'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means in our own position.

original: tha dad med pas dum bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de nyid kyi nye bar bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: tha dad med pas dum bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de nyid kyi nye bar bsdu ba ni /
translated: Since they are not different, they are not parts. This is the summary of that.

original: des na gcig bsgrubs pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na gcig bsgrubs pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, since one is established, the other is also established.

original: sngon po yon tan ni bum pa dang snam bu bzhin du rdzas las rnam par gcod pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sngon po yon tan ni bum pa dang snam bu bzhin du rdzas las rnam par gcod pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the quality of blue distinguished from substance, like a pot and a cloth?

original: des na 'dres pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: des na 'dres pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Therefore, because they are mixed, they are common loci.

original: 'on te sngon po yan gar ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te sngon po yan gar ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: But if blue is alone,

original: tha dad pa yang bum pa la gnas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha dad pa yang bum pa la gnas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is not located in a pot. This is the meaning.

original: phan tshun spangs pa ma yin pas 'dres pa ni gcig rtogs na gzhan rtogs pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phan tshun spangs pa ma yin pas 'dres pa ni gcig rtogs na gzhan rtogs pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since they are not mutually exclusive, it is taught that if one is cognized, the other is also cognized.

original: de lta yin na sngon po'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na sngon po'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that were so, then blue and a pot would be mixed.

original: rdzas dang yon tan brjod pa bstan nas rigs dang yon tan brjod pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rdzas dang yon tan brjod pa bstan nas rigs dang yon tan brjod pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Having explained the expression of substance and quality, the expression of class and quality is explained.

original: 'on te rigs dang yon tan yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te rigs dang yon tan yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, is it a class or a quality?

original: 'on te sngon po'i rdzas nyid ces bya ba ni gnyi ga sngon por brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te sngon po'i rdzas nyid ces bya ba ni gnyi ga sngon por brjod pa'o //
translated: Or, is it the substance of blue? Both are called blue.

original: 'on te sngon po yan gar ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te sngon po yan gar ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, is it not a mere blue? Because it is mixed.

original: mngon par brjod pa bzhi'am zhes bya ba ni sgra gnyis pos re re zhing gnyis brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa bzhi'am zhes bya ba ni sgra gnyis pos re re zhing gnyis brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, are there four expressions? Because each of the two terms expresses both.

original: gsum zhes bya ba ni sngon po rdzas nyid yin pa'i phyogs la sngon po'i sgras gnyis brjod pa dang / autpala'i sgras rigs brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gsum zhes bya ba ni sngon po rdzas nyid yin pa'i phyogs la sngon po'i sgras gnyis brjod pa dang / autpala'i sgras rigs brjod pa yin no //
translated: Or, are there three? In the position that blue is a substance, the term blue expresses both, and the term lotus expresses the class.

original: yon tan sngon po dang rigs dang rdzas rnams 'dus pa nyid kho na re re zhing mngon sum gyis rtogs @292b par mi nus pa ni bden mod kyi de la bum pa dang snam bu bzhin du gzhi mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te
analyzed: yon tan sngon po dang rigs dang rdzas rnams 'dus pa nyid kho na re re zhing mngon sum gyis rtogs @292b par mi nus pa ni bden mod kyi de la bum pa dang snam bu bzhin du gzhi mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te
translated: It is true that the mere collection of the quality blue, the class, and the substance cannot be understood by each sense faculty, but it is not like a common locus, like a pot and a cloth.

original: sngon po la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Or, is it blue, etc.?

original: sgra'i tha snyad gzhi mthun pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: sgra'i tha snyad gzhi mthun pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The verbal conventions are based on a common locus.

original: sngon po la sogs pa de dag ni zhes bya ba ste yon tan rnams so //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa de dag ni zhes bya ba ste yon tan rnams so //
translated: Those such as blue, etc. are the qualities.

original: sgra gzhan sbyar ro zhes bya ba ni sgra du ma sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sgra gzhan sbyar ro zhes bya ba ni sgra du ma sbyor ba'o //
translated: The other words are applied, i.e., many words are applied.

original: sgra ni dngos po'i yul mngon sum bzhin du 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni dngos po'i yul mngon sum bzhin du 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: Sound is the apprehender, like the direct perception of an object,🔽otherwise, because of the non-existence of the object.

original: gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la gal te sdo sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la gal te sdo sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one says, “blue, etc.,”

original: sgra dang shes pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dang shes pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because of the engagement of sound and cognition, i.e., because of the apprehension.

original: ci yang nyams par mi byed do //
analyzed: ci yang nyams par mi byed do //
translated: It does not destroy anything at all.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin du rtogs na zhes bya ba ste gnas skabs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin du rtogs na zhes bya ba ste gnas skabs pa'o //
translated: If one understands the intrinsic nature, i.e., the state.

original: phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of mutual exclusion,

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i zhes bya bas sngon po ma yin pa bcad pa dang autpala zhes bya bas ni autpala ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i zhes bya bas sngon po ma yin pa bcad pa dang autpala zhes bya bas ni autpala ma yin pa'o //
translated: i.e., because of the exclusion of non-blue by “blue” and the exclusion of non-lotus by “lotus.”

original: 'di'i shugs kyis autpala sngon por rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i shugs kyis autpala sngon por rtogs pa'o //
translated: By implication, it is understood that it is a blue lotus.

original: sngon po ni autpala dang autpa la ma yin pa dang / autpala yang sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa gnyi ga la yod kyang gzhan du ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer ba la /🔽zin pa gzhan dang gzhan las ni //
analyzed: sngon po ni autpala dang autpa la ma yin pa dang / autpala yang sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa gnyi ga la yod kyang gzhan du ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer ba la / zin pa gzhan dang gzhan las ni //
translated: But it is said: Blue is in both the lotus and the non-lotus, and in both the blue and the non-blue lotus. How can it be otherwise?

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said: From another, from a different one, etc.

original: gzhan yod pas sgra'i nus pa gzhan du 'gyur na mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan yod pas sgra'i nus pa gzhan du 'gyur na mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the potency of the word changes due to the existence of another, it would be impermanent, is the meaning.

original: sngon po autpala yin pa la the tshom za ba ni de rnam par gcod pa'i phyir sgra gnyis sbyor bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sngon po autpala yin pa la the tshom za ba ni de rnam par gcod pa'i phyir sgra gnyis sbyor bar bstan pa ni /
translated: When there is doubt about whether blue is a lotus, in order to eliminate that, it is taught to apply two words: This is a blue lotus.

original: 'o na sgra gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na sgra gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But it is said: From another word.

original: rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ni the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ni the tshom za ba'o //
translated: When there is doubt, it is said: When there is investigation.

original: de'i sgra las zhes bya ba ni ci autpala sngon po'am 'on te gzhan yin zhes bya ba'i sgra las so //
analyzed: de'i sgra las zhes bya ba ni ci autpala sngon po'am 'on te gzhan yin zhes bya ba'i sgra las so //
translated: From the word that, meaning from the word blue lotus or is it another?

original: autpala sngon po zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig dang 'on te gzhan zhes bya ba sngon po ma yin pa ni gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: autpala sngon po zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig dang 'on te gzhan zhes bya ba sngon po ma yin pa ni gnyis pa ste /
translated: The phrase blue lotus is one case, and not blue is another case.

original: sgra las rtogs pa'i spyi bzhin du the tshom za ba yang bsdus par bzlog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra las rtogs pa'i spyi bzhin du the tshom za ba yang bsdus par bzlog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that just as in the case of a universal that is understood from a word, doubt is also included in the negation.

original: de lta bu nyid ni bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid ni bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: That is not to be negated.

original: ma nges par bzlog par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid tsam mo //
analyzed: ma nges par bzlog par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid tsam mo //
translated: The phrase that is not to be negated as uncertain is just a mistake.

original: spyi brjod pa las sgra gzhan brjod pa na khyad par rtogs pa bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: spyi brjod pa las sgra gzhan brjod pa na khyad par rtogs pa bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't it the case that when a word expresses a universal, the understanding of a distinction is not to be negated?

original: don med pa nyid ni sgra'i nus pa'i rjes su 'brengs nas rtogs par bya ba snga ma dang phyi ma yang zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no zhes zer ba la /🔽spyi tsam brjod pa zhes bya ba ste de'i phyir phyi ma the tshom za @293a * //
analyzed: don med pa nyid ni sgra'i nus pa'i rjes su 'brengs nas rtogs par bya ba snga ma dang phyi ma yang zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no zhes zer ba la / spyi tsam brjod pa zhes bya ba ste de'i phyir phyi ma the tshom za @293a * //
translated: The meaninglessness is to be understood by following the capacity of the word. The phrase the former and the latter is reasonable, he says.

original: ba'i gnod byed ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ba'i gnod byed ma yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase merely expressing a universal means that therefore the latter is not a fault that causes doubt.

original: sgra ni 'brel pa med pa'i phyir gnod byed ma yin du zin kyang rjes su dpag pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: sgra ni 'brel pa med pa'i phyir gnod byed ma yin du zin kyang rjes su dpag pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Sound is not a refutation, even though it is unrelated, but inference is not like that.

original: 'on te rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, it is called inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa la yang zhes bya ba la the tshom za ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la yang zhes bya ba la the tshom za ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not taught that there is doubt even in inference,

original: de la yang mngon sum gyis gnod pa'i phyir te gnod par byed pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang mngon sum gyis gnod pa'i phyir te gnod par byed pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is refuted by perception, since it is seen to be refuted.

original: spyi la zhes bya ba ni me ma yin pa las ldog pa la'o //
analyzed: spyi la zhes bya ba ni me ma yin pa las ldog pa la'o //
translated: In the general case, it is in the exclusion of what is not fire.

original: thams cad kho na the tshom yin te tha na yod pa nyid do zhes bya ba yang rnam pa gsum pa gzhan las ldog pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: thams cad kho na the tshom yin te tha na yod pa nyid do zhes bya ba yang rnam pa gsum pa gzhan las ldog pa kho na yin la /
translated: Everything is just doubt, even the statement “it exists,” which is only the exclusion of another alternative.

original: de dag tsam gyis kyang khyad par la nges pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dag tsam gyis kyang khyad par la nges pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: And it is taught that even by those alone, there is no certainty about the particular.

original: ma yin te spyi rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin te spyi rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: No, because the understanding of the general.

original: khyad par la spyi'i rtogs pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig de las nges pa can yang ma yin par bstan pa ni spyi la ni rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par la spyi'i rtogs pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig de las nges pa can yang ma yin par bstan pa ni spyi la ni rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that a particular is not a universal and that it is not ascertained from that is called “ascertainment of the universal.”

original: nges pa med par bstan pa ni shes pa thams cad bslad pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: nges pa med par bstan pa ni shes pa thams cad bslad pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The statement that it is not ascertained is called “all cognition is erroneous.”

original: khyad par la ma nges ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par la ma nges ba'o //
translated: It is not ascertained in the particular.

original: khyad par lam nges pa nyid kyi bslad pa bshad pa ni spyi rtogs kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par lam nges pa nyid kyi bslad pa bshad pa ni spyi rtogs kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the error of ascertainment in the particular is “even though the universal is cognized.”

original: rtogs pa bslad pa ni the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa bslad pa ni the tshom za ba'o //
translated: The error of cognition is doubt.

original: chos mtshungs pa gang gi yin pa de ni chos mtshungs pa'i chos can nyid mthong ba las de'i khyad par la the tshom za ba yin gyi spyi la ni ma yin ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: chos mtshungs pa gang gi yin pa de ni chos mtshungs pa'i chos can nyid mthong ba las de'i khyad par la the tshom za ba yin gyi spyi la ni ma yin ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
translated: If it is the same property, then it is the property of the subject. Seeing that, one doubts its particular, not its universal.

original: ji ste yang srid pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste yang srid pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: If one says, “Is it not so that even though it is possible,”

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: then “that” is the particular.

original: gang la zhes bya ba ni spyi la'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba ni spyi la'o //
translated: “In which” is the universal.

original: de zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: “That” is the particular.

original: de mthong bas ni spyi mthong bas so //
analyzed: de mthong bas ni spyi mthong bas so //
translated: Because of seeing that, one sees the universal.

original: de nyid la the tshom zhes bya ba ni khyad par la'o //
analyzed: de nyid la the tshom zhes bya ba ni khyad par la'o //
translated: Doubt about that is doubt about the particular.

original: gang mthong ba las the tshom za bar chos mtshungs pa'i chos can de ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na chos can nyid the tshom za ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang mthong ba las the tshom za bar chos mtshungs pa'i chos can de ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na chos can nyid the tshom za ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: From seeing what, is there doubt? Not from seeing the similar property, but rather from doubt about the very property itself.

original: khra bo la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khra bo la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to demonstrate this, he says, “such as the variegated.”

original: de ma nges na de la the tshom za ba mi rigs pa'i phyir the tshom za ba nyid las nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ma nges na de la the tshom za ba mi rigs pa'i phyir the tshom za ba nyid las nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is not ascertained, it is not reasonable to have doubt about it. Therefore, ascertainment is from doubt itself.

original: the tshom gyi yul nyid du nges pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin la rnam par rtog pa'i nges pa yin na the tshom za ba kho na las nges pa yin na zhes bya ba las khyad par med do //
analyzed: the tshom gyi yul nyid du nges pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin la rnam par rtog pa'i nges pa yin na the tshom za ba kho na las nges pa yin na zhes bya ba las khyad par med do //
translated: It is ascertained as the very object of doubt. This is a contradiction. If it is ascertained by conceptual thought, then there is no difference from the statement, “Ascertainment is from doubt itself.”

original: sgra tsam mtshungs pa yin gyi gzhan pa'i ba lang nyid med par bstan pa ni sgra tsam zhig ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra tsam mtshungs pa yin gyi gzhan pa'i ba lang nyid med par bstan pa ni sgra tsam zhig ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to demonstrate that the similarity is only verbal, and that there is no other universal called “cow,” he says, “The mere word . . .”

original: ba lang ni khra bo'am gzhan zhes bya ba'i the tshom za bas ba lang nyid du rtogs pa kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ba lang ni khra bo'am gzhan zhes bya ba'i the tshom za bas ba lang nyid du rtogs pa kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Since one is in doubt as to whether the cow is variegated or something else, is it not the case that one only understands cowhood?

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa nyid bag chags las byung @293b ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa nyid bag chags las byung @293b ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: The cognition that has such an aspect arises from latent impressions, and not from anything else,

original: mngon sum gyis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because it is not understood by direct perception.

original: yang na thog med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na thog med ces bya ba'o //
translated: Or, it is beginningless.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni the tshom za ba'o //
translated: Conceptual thought is doubt.

original: rtags kyang zhes bya ba ni khyad par gcig gis nges na mngon sum bzhin du bdag nyid thams cad kyis so //
analyzed: rtags kyang zhes bya ba ni khyad par gcig gis nges na mngon sum bzhin du bdag nyid thams cad kyis so //
translated: And the sign is also, if one is ascertained by one distinguishing feature, then by all of its own distinguishing features, like direct perception.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni khyad par gcig tu rnam par bcad pa tsam yin gyi khyad par gzhan gyi khyad par du byas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni khyad par gcig tu rnam par bcad pa tsam yin gyi khyad par gzhan gyi khyad par du byas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But if, it is only the exclusion of one distinguishing feature, and not the distinguishing feature that is the basis of another distinguishing feature.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni khyad par gzhan gyis khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni khyad par gzhan gyis khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Another is a distinguishing feature that is the basis of another distinguishing feature.

original: sngon bo'i khyad par gyis rnam par bcad pa ni autpala gzhan du sgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon bo'i khyad par gyis rnam par bcad pa ni autpala gzhan du sgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The exclusion of the difference of the prior state cannot be established as another lotus.

original: 'o na ci zhe na sgro 'dogs ba tsam yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na sgro 'dogs ba tsam yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What then? It is mere superimposition.

original: de lta na autpala ma yin pa las log pa ji ltar yin zer na yang /
analyzed: de lta na autpala ma yin pa las log pa ji ltar yin zer na yang /
translated: If it is asked how it is the opposite of non-lotus,

original: de las gzhan bzlog pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan bzlog pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is the opposite of that.

original: ji ltar autpala nyid dang ldan pa med pa de bzhin du autpala ma yin pa nyid dang ldan pa yang srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar autpala nyid dang ldan pa med pa de bzhin du autpala ma yin pa nyid dang ldan pa yang srid pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as there is no possession of lotus, there is also no possibility of possession of non-lotus.

original: mi srid par nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi srid par nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because impossibility is certain.

original: mi srid par nges pa gang las mi srid pa kho na yin pa de'i tshe chos dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: mi srid par nges pa gang las mi srid pa kho na yin pa de'i tshe chos dang ldan pa ni /
