translated: From where is the certainty of impossibility? When it is only impossibility, then that which possesses a property

original: sngon po'i chos dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sngon po'i chos dang ldan pa'o //
translated: possesses the property of blue.

original: de las gzhan pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni autpala ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni autpala ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa'o //
translated: That which possesses a different property possesses the property of non-lotus.

original: yang na sgro btags pa'i autpala nyid dang ldan pa'am de las gzhan pa ste ;
analyzed: yang na sgro btags pa'i autpala nyid dang ldan pa'am de las gzhan pa ste ;
translated: Or it is the imputed blue lotus itself or something other than that.🔽

original: autpala las gzhan pa nyid dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: autpala las gzhan pa nyid dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: Or else, it is the lotus itself, which is imagined, or it is something other than the lotus.

original: ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i dbye ba can gyi khyad par rnams ni spyi yin la thams cad thob pas gzhan la yang des nye bar mtshon pa'i gsal ba tsam yin no //
analyzed: ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i dbye ba can gyi khyad par rnams ni spyi yin la thams cad thob pas gzhan la yang des nye bar mtshon pa'i gsal ba tsam yin no //
translated: The word “cow” is a universal, because it is a property that is shared by the different individuals that are not intended to be expressed, and it is a mere manifestation of the other individuals that are not obtained.

original: sngon po'i tshig nye ba de ji ltar bsdus pa yin te /
analyzed: sngon po'i tshig nye ba de ji ltar bsdus pa yin te /
translated: How can the word “blue” be included in the word “lotus”?

original: brjod pa'i dus na de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa'i dus na de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist at the time of expression.

original: ma 'ongs pa la ni thams cad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa la ni thams cad du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is in the future.

original: de dang bral ba'i ngag la ji ltar ltos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dang bral ba'i ngag la ji ltar ltos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: How can it be related to a sentence that is devoid of it?

original: ma yin te brjod pa'i dus thams cad du ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te brjod pa'i dus thams cad du ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is not related to the sentence at all times.

original: de brjod pa tsam gyi sgra'i byed pa la snga ma dang phyi ma'i rjes su 'gro ba brjod pa rnams kho na yin te /
analyzed: de brjod pa tsam gyi sgra'i byed pa la snga ma dang phyi ma'i rjes su 'gro ba brjod pa rnams kho na yin te /
translated: The function of the word is merely the expression of the word itself, and the words that express the prior and subsequent parts are the only ones that are related.

original: skyes bu'i blo las byung ba ni don to //
analyzed: skyes bu'i blo las byung ba ni don to //
translated: The meaning is that which arises from the mind of a person.

original: de lta na don gzhan la rung ba nyid kyi dbang gis rung ba nyid 'dzin pa ni rjes su dpag pa'am gal te ma bzung na skyes bu'i blo'i nus pa min no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta na don gzhan la rung ba nyid kyi dbang gis rung ba nyid 'dzin pa ni rjes su dpag pa'am gal te ma bzung na skyes bu'i blo'i nus pa min no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Thus, the apprehension of a property-possessor is through the power of suitability with regard to another object. If it were not apprehended, it would not be the capacity of the mind of a person. This is taught by:

original: gal te phyogs gzhan 'thob  na ni //
analyzed: gal te phyogs gzhan 'thob  na ni //
translated: If it obtains another property.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: 'on te gzhan rnams thob med na //🔽zhes bya ba ni @294a * //
analyzed: 'on te gzhan rnams thob med na // zhes bya ba ni @294a * //
translated: If the others are not obtained.

original: don dang ldan pa nyid kyi brjod bya'o //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa nyid kyi brjod bya'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the expression.

original: khyad par gzhan gyis ci bya ste //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan gyis ci bya ste //
translated: What is the use of another property?

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i don te nyid kyis brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i don te nyid kyis brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is its meaning. It is expressed by itself.

original: mi mtshon pa'i mtshon pa las ni mtshon pa nyid med kyang khyad par dang ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi mtshon pa'i mtshon pa las ni mtshon pa nyid med kyang khyad par dang ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From the indication of what is not indicated, even without indication, it has a property. This is said by If it has a property.

original: nam yang zhes bya ba ni thag ring ba dang nye ba la yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam yang zhes bya ba ni thag ring ba dang nye ba la yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Never means that it does not apprehend even at a distance or nearby.

original: rdzas la brten pa'i dbyibs la sogs pa 'dzin na yang khyad par gcig gis bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir khyad par gzhan la don med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rdzas la brten pa'i dbyibs la sogs pa 'dzin na yang khyad par gcig gis bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir khyad par gzhan la don med par bstan pa ni /
translated: If one apprehends the shape, etc. that is based on substance, then because one apprehends the whole by means of one part, it is taught that the other parts are meaningless.

original: 'on te dbyibs ni zhes bya ba ste /🔽rdzas ma yin pa gzhan mngon sum ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: 'on te dbyibs ni zhes bya ba ste / rdzas ma yin pa gzhan mngon sum ma yin pa'am /
translated: But if the shape is not a substance, then how is it that one apprehends the whole?

original: sgra yang bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa ji ltar yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra yang bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa ji ltar yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: if the shape is not a substance, then it is not a direct perception, or else, how is it that one apprehends the whole of sound?

original: rnam par rtog pa'i yul nyid yin na bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa dang / gzhi mthun pa ma yin pa rnams su thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i yul nyid yin na bdag nyid thams cad 'dzin pa dang / gzhi mthun pa ma yin pa rnams su thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin bar bstan pa ni /
translated: If it is the object of conceptual thought, then it is not the case that there is the absurd consequence that the whole is apprehended and that there is a common locus.

original: sna tshogs chos kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs chos kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is taught by “the various phenomena.”

original: de dag tsam gyi yul can gyi rtogs pas bstan pa'i chos can ni dngos su de lta bu yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dag tsam gyi yul can gyi rtogs pas bstan pa'i chos can ni dngos su de lta bu yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The subject that is taught by the cognition that has just those as its object is actually like that.

original: sna tshogs chos kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs chos kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is taught by “the various phenomena.”

original: mi rtag pa grub pa ni yod pa dang med pa'i chos gzhan gyi sems pa dang bral ba ni chos gzhan rnams la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa grub pa ni yod pa dang med pa'i chos gzhan gyi sems pa dang bral ba ni chos gzhan rnams la ltos pa yin te /
translated: The establishment of impermanence is the exclusion of the thought of other existent and non-existent things in relation to other things.

original: chos med pa'i chos can mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos med pa'i chos can mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a subject without a property is impossible.

original: yang na dngos po grub pa na de las gzhan pa rnams te /
analyzed: yang na dngos po grub pa na de las gzhan pa rnams te /
translated: Or, when an entity is established, the others are excluded,

original: sngon po ma yin pa rnams btang snyoms te 'gog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa rnams btang snyoms te 'gog par byed pa'o //
translated: i.e., the non-blue is excluded.

original: 'gog na zhes bya ba ni autpala'o zhes bya bas autpala ma yin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa 'gog pa na'o //
analyzed: 'gog na zhes bya ba ni autpala'o zhes bya bas autpala ma yin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa 'gog pa na'o //
translated: When it is excluded, i.e., when the non-blue is excluded, it is said that the blue is an utpala.

original: de las kyang gzhan la zhes bya ba ni autpala dang sngon po rnams la ltos pa de bzhin du autpala grub pa la yang brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las kyang gzhan la zhes bya ba ni autpala dang sngon po rnams la ltos pa de bzhin du autpala grub pa la yang brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: And also in relation to that, i.e., in relation to the blue and the utpala, it is said that the utpala is established.

original: yang na gcig grub pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa na'o //
analyzed: yang na gcig grub pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa na'o //
translated: Or, when one is established, i.e., when they are mixed,

original: gzhan rnams btang snyoms zhes bya ba ni dbye ba yod do zhes bya'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan rnams btang snyoms zhes bya ba ni dbye ba yod do zhes bya'i don to //
translated: the others are excluded, i.e., there is a difference.

original: 'gog pa dang des dben pa dag gi don yin na yang de las gzhan la ltos pa ste 'dres pa la'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa dang des dben pa dag gi don yin na yang de las gzhan la ltos pa ste 'dres pa la'o //
translated: If it is the meaning of cessation and that which is isolated from it, then it is dependent on something else, that is, on a mixture.

original: tha snyad dang tha snyad kyi yul shugs kyis bstan nas ji ltar zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: tha snyad dang tha snyad kyi yul shugs kyis bstan nas ji ltar zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: Having implicitly indicated the conventional and the object of the conventional, “how” is the mode of the situation.

original: dben pa yang yin la don yang yin pa de ma yin pa de ni mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: dben pa yang yin la don yang yin pa de ma yin pa de ni mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: That which is isolated and that which is not the object is not direct perception,

original: rtog pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen in accordance with thought.

original: ma brtags par zhes bya ba ni ma dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: ma brtags par zhes bya ba ni ma dpyad pa'o //
translated: “Without examination” means without analysis.

original: tha dad don zhes bya ba ldog pa ni rten de skyed byed yin pa'i phyir @294b gang yin pa de la ma brtags pa rang rten pa ni tha snyad pa rnams so //
analyzed: tha dad don zhes bya ba ldog pa ni rten de skyed byed yin pa'i phyir @294b gang yin pa de la ma brtags pa rang rten pa ni tha snyad pa rnams so //
translated: The object of the conventional is the basis of the exclusion, because it is the producer of that. Without examining that, the basis of the conventional is the conventionalists.

original: mi bden pa'i don ni rtog pa'i yul la blos ji ltar brtags pa de bzhin du de lta bur chos can la gnod mi 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mi bden pa'i don ni rtog pa'i yul la blos ji ltar brtags pa de bzhin du de lta bur chos can la gnod mi 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning of the unreal is the object of thought. The mind examines it in that way. In that way, the subject is not harmed. This is what is meant by “without examination.”

original: rnam par rtog pa las byung ba rnams la gnod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa las byung ba rnams la gnod pa kho na yin te /
translated: It is only harmful to those who arise from conceptual thought,

original: tshad ma mi bzod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma mi bzod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not valid knowledge.

original: blo de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: blo de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: And that cognition is not valid knowledge,

original: mi bden pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bden pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has an unreal object.🔽Thus, it is explained that the cognition itself realizes the subject, not perception.

original: de lta de ltar chos can du blo nyid rtogs par byed kyi mngon sum gyis ma yin par bshad pa ni sgrub ba dgag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta de ltar chos can du blo nyid rtogs par byed kyi mngon sum gyis ma yin par bshad pa ni sgrub ba dgag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The refutation of the proof is called “the negation of the object.”

original: dngos po mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no //
translated: The object is not the domain of direct perception.

original: de la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur ba yin zer ba la /
analyzed: de la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur ba yin zer ba la /
translated: How can it engage with that?

original: 'ba' zhig ni med ba ste gzhan sel ba'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni med ba ste gzhan sel ba'o //
translated: “Only” means without another.

original: de lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rtogs pa'o //
translated: “Such” means as it is cognized.

original: mi 'gyur ba ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i 'dzin par byed pa'i dag gnyis yin la /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i 'dzin par byed pa'i dag gnyis yin la /
translated: “Unchanging” means not changing into something else.

original: rtogs pa zhes bya ba bshad pa ni 'di ni kho na yin du kho bos zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya ba bshad pa ni 'di ni kho na yin du kho bos zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The explanation of “realization” is “this alone is mine.”

original: nges par gzung ba'i don yin te /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i don yin te /
translated: It has the meaning of ascertainment.

original: de la ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: But this is not so.

original: 'ba' zhig kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of “only” and so on is:

original: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “because of that.”

original: 'khrul pa tsam sel ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ba lang ngam /
analyzed: 'khrul pa tsam sel ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ba lang ngam /
translated: Because it is the mere removal of error.🔽When there is doubt, such as “Is this a cow or a horse?

original: me'am yod pa'am me ma yin nam zhes bya ba'i the tshom za bas sam /
analyzed: me'am yod pa'am me ma yin nam zhes bya ba'i the tshom za bas sam /
translated: Is this a fire or not a fire?”

original: me ma yin pa'i cha la sgro btags pa 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir yid gnyis med na 'khrul ba'i 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: me ma yin pa'i cha la sgro btags pa 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir yid gnyis med na 'khrul ba'i 'jug pa med do //
translated: or when there is error superimposing on the part that is not a fire, there is no engagement of error when there is no doubt.

original: 'jug min yul dang zhes bya ba ni yal bar 'dug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug min yul dang zhes bya ba ni yal bar 'dug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Not engaging” is the object of indifference.

original: ma nges pa ni zhes bya bas ni 'jug pa'i yul bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa ni zhes bya bas ni 'jug pa'i yul bstan pa yin no //
translated: “Indeterminate” indicates the object of engagement.

original: gzhan du rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni spyis rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni spyis rtogs pa'o //
translated: “Realizing something else” means realizing through a universal.

original: sgra las byung ba'i rang gi yul la 'khrul pa bzlog pa ni mngon sum las byung ba'i rtog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i rang gi yul la 'khrul pa bzlog pa ni mngon sum las byung ba'i rtog pa ma yin te /
translated: The reversal of error regarding one’s own object arising from words is not conceptual knowledge arising from perception.

original: de dang lhan cig pa'i don nyid dang grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig pa'i don nyid dang grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because the meaning of that, its establishment, and its bliss are not different.

original: mngon sum gyi dus phyis 'byung ba'i zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi dus phyis 'byung ba'i zhes bya'o //
translated: The meaning of “arising after the time of perception” is taught.

original: de 'di'i zhes bya ba mngon sum las byung ba lnga yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bo yul can ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la de 'di'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de 'di'i zhes bya ba mngon sum las byung ba lnga yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bo yul can ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la de 'di'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of “that of this” is that the five arising from perception are not the nature of the prior and subsequent objects.

original: mngon sum las byung ba'i phyir de'i yul yang snga ma dang phyi ma ni mngon sum bzhin du rgyu kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te de skad cig ma nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum las byung ba'i phyir de'i yul yang snga ma dang phyi ma ni mngon sum bzhin du rgyu kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te de skad cig ma nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: If one thinks that, it is said, “that of this.” Because it arises from perception, its object is also only the cause, like perception, of the prior and subsequent.🔽If one says that, it is said, “but is that momentary?”

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid skad cig ma nyid ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid skad cig ma nyid ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “No” means that perception itself is momentary.

original: 'thad de zhes bya ba ni skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: 'thad de zhes bya ba ni skyon med pa'o //
translated: “It is tenable” means without fault.

original: dngos po tha mi @295a * //
analyzed: dngos po tha mi @295a * //
translated: Things are not different.

original: dad pas de las ldog pa rnams gzhi mthun pa nyid yin na phan tshun tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam grangs par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: dad pas de las ldog pa rnams gzhi mthun pa nyid yin na phan tshun tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam grangs par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If faith and its opposite were the same basis, they would be mutually undifferentiated and therefore synonymous.

original: gal te ldog pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ldog pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say, “The opposites are called ‘different,’

original: tha dad pa'i phyir rnam grangs ma yin te kun rdzob tu ni rnam rtog la'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i phyir rnam grangs ma yin te kun rdzob tu ni rnam rtog la'o //
translated: they are not synonymous because they are different. In the conventional, they are conceptual.

original: sgra don zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gi go cha'o//
analyzed: sgra don zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gi go cha'o//
translated: The meaning of the term ‘conceptual’ is the armor of conceptualization.

original: tha dad tha dad med pa dag ni rnam grangs ma yin pa dang cig shos dag gi rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: tha dad tha dad med pa dag ni rnam grangs ma yin pa dang cig shos dag gi rgyu mtshan no //
translated: Difference and non-difference are the reasons for non-synonymy and the opposite.

original: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs ma yin pa dang cig shos nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs ma yin pa dang cig shos nyid do //
translated: The nature of both is called ‘non-synonymy and the opposite.’

original: ldog pa rnams rnam par rtog pas so so bar byas pas rnam grangs ma yin pa dang cig shos nyid kyi dbye ba yin no zhes bya ba ni lhur len pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa rnams rnam par rtog pas so so bar byas pas rnam grangs ma yin pa dang cig shos nyid kyi dbye ba yin no zhes bya ba ni lhur len pa'o //
translated: The division of non-synonymy and the opposite is made by conceptualization distinguishing the opposites.” This is the assertion.

original: don gyi dbye ba'i rten chos can la brten nas don gyi dbye ba don las tha mi dad pas tha mi dad pa yin na rnam grangs nyid du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la de 'brel can zhes bya ba'o ste /
analyzed: don gyi dbye ba'i rten chos can la brten nas don gyi dbye ba don las tha mi dad pas tha mi dad pa yin na rnam grangs nyid du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la de 'brel can zhes bya ba'o ste /
translated: If one thinks that the classification of objects is non-different from the objects in dependence upon the dharmin which is the basis of the classification of objects, then it is non-different, and it would be a mere enumeration.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni bum pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni bum pa'o //
translated: The result of that is the pot.

original: de de zhes bya ba ni yod pa ni med pa las dang dkar po ni dkar po ma yin pa las tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de de zhes bya ba ni yod pa ni med pa las dang dkar po ni dkar po ma yin pa las tha dad pa'o //
translated: That is that is the existent from the non-existent, and the white from the non-white, is different.

original: de de las zhes bya ba ni de dang de las tha dad pa tsam las byung ba'i nye bar bslad pa ste /
analyzed: de de las zhes bya ba ni de dang de las tha dad pa tsam las byung ba'i nye bar bslad pa ste /
translated: That from that is the mere difference from that and that, the contamination from that,

original: rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis so //
translated: from the conceptual thoughts.

original: byed pa ste 'phel bar bsgrubs pa dang zhes bya ba ni yod pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ste 'phel bar bsgrubs pa dang zhes bya ba ni yod pa'o //
translated: The activity is the establishment of the increase, that is the existent.

original: 'grib pa ni dkar po gang dag gi yin pa de dag gi ni de lta bu ma yin pa'o//
analyzed: 'grib pa ni dkar po gang dag gi yin pa de dag gi ni de lta bu ma yin pa'o//
translated: The decrease is not like that of the white ones.

original: lta bur zhes bya ba'i don ni sgro btags yin gyi rtog pa rnams rang rig pa tsam yin pa'i phyir de nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: lta bur zhes bya ba'i don ni sgro btags yin gyi rtog pa rnams rang rig pa tsam yin pa'i phyir de nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of like that is the superimposition, but it is not that itself because the conceptual thoughts are mere self-awareness.

original: gang gis rtogs par brjod pa des zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gis rtogs par brjod pa des zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “by which” is “by that which is said to be the realization.”

original: phyi rol yang de'i ston pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phyi rol yang de'i ston pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa ni /
translated: The external is taught to be the nature of its teacher:

original: de ldan nyid min yang zhes bya ba la rnam par rtog pas bstan pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba yang ste /
analyzed: de ldan nyid min yang zhes bya ba la rnam par rtog pas bstan pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba yang ste /
translated: “Even though it is not endowed with that,” that is, even though it is free from the nature taught by conceptualization,

original: mngon sum gyis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not realized by direct perception.

original: 'brel pa 'ga' las zhes bya ba ni de dang de tha dad pa'i don nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyi 'brel las so //
analyzed: 'brel pa 'ga' las zhes bya ba ni de dang de tha dad pa'i don nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyi 'brel las so //
translated: “From some connection” means from the connection of the latent tendencies of the experience of the meaning that is different from that.

original: 'grel par ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i rtags kyi 'grel pa las so //
analyzed: 'grel par ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i rtags kyi 'grel pa las so //
translated: In the commentary, it is explained as the connection of the evidence of the nature of that and arising from that.

original: mthong bar sbyar zhes bya ba ni rang gi byed pa ste sgro btags pa zhen par bya ba la'o //
analyzed: mthong bar sbyar zhes bya ba ni rang gi byed pa ste sgro btags pa zhen par bya ba la'o //
translated: “Is applied to seeing” is its own function, which is to be attached to superimposition.

original: ci las she na tha dad rten can zhes bya ba smos te gang gis te dag dbye ba la brten pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: ci las she na tha dad rten can zhes bya ba smos te gang gis te dag dbye ba la brten pa yin pa'o //
translated: From what? It is said, “based on difference,” that is, based on the division of the pure.

original: mi slu ba zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
analyzed: mi slu ba zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
translated: “Nondeceptive” is in the commentary.

original: de las ni mi slu ba las so //
analyzed: de las ni mi slu ba las so //
translated: “From that” means from nondeceptiveness.

original: bslad pa yang shes ma yin zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa de dag bslad @295b pa nyid du mi shes pa ste mi slu ba la dga' bas de nyid dam cig shos la ltos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bslad pa yang shes ma yin zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa de dag bslad @295b pa nyid du mi shes pa ste mi slu ba la dga' bas de nyid dam cig shos la ltos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Nor is it a delusion, that is, it is not a delusion that those conceptual thoughts are themselves delusions. Since it is non-deceptive, it does not depend on the other, that is, reality.

original: ldog pa rnams tha dad pa'i phyir rnam grangs ma yin pa nyid dang nyams su myong ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir don gyi yul can yin te gnod pa med pa'i phyir tha snyad kyi rgyu nyid dang de'i rgyu mtshan yang bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa rnams tha dad pa'i phyir rnam grangs ma yin pa nyid dang nyams su myong ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir don gyi yul can yin te gnod pa med pa'i phyir tha snyad kyi rgyu nyid dang de'i rgyu mtshan yang bstan pa yin no //
translated: Since the negations are different, it is not a synonym. Since it is related to experience, it has an objective domain. Since it is non-deceptive, it is the cause of conventional usage. The reason for that has also been taught.

original: de 'bras med pa yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de 'bras med pa yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: The absence of result should be stated in the same way.

original: de nyid ma yin pa'i yul nyid la gnod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ma yin pa'i yul nyid la gnod pa kho na yin te /
translated: It is only a fault in regard to a domain that is not reality.

original: thag pa la sbrul gyi blo lta bu'o zhes zer ba la ni /
analyzed: thag pa la sbrul gyi blo lta bu'o zhes zer ba la ni /
translated: For example, the cognition of a snake in a rope.

original: gal te tha snyad 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te tha snyad 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that this is conventional usage,

original: rgyu mtshan mthong ba la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni mi slu ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan mthong ba la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni mi slu ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of “because the reason is seen” is “because of non-deception.”

original: rnam par rtog pas ldog pa ni tha snyad par nye bar bstan pa yin yang tha dad pa thob pa ma yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa 'dod pa thob pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas ldog pa ni tha snyad par nye bar bstan pa yin yang tha dad pa thob pa ma yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa 'dod pa thob pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: Although the negation by conceptualization is taught conventionally, it is not dependent on the attainment of the desired difference or non-difference, because difference is not attained.

original: 'bras bu zhig pa dang skyur ba'i rgyu nyid du tha mi dad par brjod kyang /
analyzed: 'bras bu zhig pa dang skyur ba'i rgyu nyid du tha mi dad par brjod kyang /
translated: Although the cause of the destruction and arising of an effect is said to be non-different,

original: bu ram dang mngar ba nyid tha mi dad pas don gyi bya ba mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /🔽tha dad tha dad med slu ba //
analyzed: bu ram dang mngar ba nyid tha mi dad pas don gyi bya ba mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni / tha dad tha dad med slu ba //
translated: because the function of the object is seen, sugar and sweetness are not different.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “difference and non-difference are deceptive” is made.

original: de 'bras can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de 'bras can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of “it has an effect” and so on is as follows.

original: chos kyi dbye ba ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbye ba ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The division of phenomena is said to be

original: de 'bras bu yin pa la de ma yin pa'i 'bras bu can mthar thug pa dang / de 'bras bu can ma yin pa ni cig shos so //
analyzed: de 'bras bu yin pa la de ma yin pa'i 'bras bu can mthar thug pa dang / de 'bras bu can ma yin pa ni cig shos so //
translated: that which has an effect and that which does not have an effect. The final one is that which has an effect that is not an effect. The other is that which does not have an effect.

original: brtags pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: brtags pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Examination” means that it is not reality.

original: dngos po dang 'brel ba las zhes bya bas 'brel ba 'ga' la zhes bya ba bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang 'brel ba las zhes bya bas 'brel ba 'ga' la zhes bya ba bshad pa'o //
translated: “In connection with a thing” explains “in some connection.”

original: dpyod pa las zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa las zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: “In analysis” means in conceptualization.

original: tha snyad ni mngon par brjod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tha snyad ni mngon par brjod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Convention” means verbal expression, etc.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po la dngos po ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan ni med pa'i tha snyad gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po la dngos po ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan ni med pa'i tha snyad gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Therefore” means that the reason for the negation of a thing in a thing is not the reason for the negation of another thing.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la mthong ba ni gzhan la mi mthong ba'i phyir med do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la mthong ba ni gzhan la mi mthong ba'i phyir med do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “In the case of a thing seen in a similar instance, it is not seen in another case” means that it is not seen in another case.

original: gzhan du ni 'di'i ngo bo kho na bsgrub bya thams cad la the tshom za bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni yod pa nyid sgrub byed 'jug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni 'di'i ngo bo kho na bsgrub bya thams cad la the tshom za bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni yod pa nyid sgrub byed 'jug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Otherwise, its nature would be established as the object of doubt in all cases” means that the proof of existence would be inconclusive.

original: gson po'i lus la yod pa dang bum pa la sogs pa la med pa ni bdag yin no zhes bya ba'i lung las dbye ba grub pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: gson po'i lus la yod pa dang bum pa la sogs pa la med pa ni bdag yin no zhes bya ba'i lung las dbye ba grub pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The distinction of the self as existing in the living body and not existing in the pot, etc. is established by scripture.

original: khas blangs tshad mar min pa las med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khas blangs tshad mar min pa las med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, “It is not established by a valid cognition accepted by both parties.”

original: the tshom mi za bar ji ltar @296a * //
analyzed: the tshom mi za bar ji ltar @296a * //
translated: How can there be no doubt?

original: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid kyis so //
translated: It is because of nonexistence.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs med pas de las gtan tshigs med par nges pa na mnyan par bya ba nyid dang mtshungs par bstan pa yin gyi ma nges pa yin na the tshom za ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa la 'gyur te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs med pas de las gtan tshigs med par nges pa na mnyan par bya ba nyid dang mtshungs par bstan pa yin gyi ma nges pa yin na the tshom za ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa la 'gyur te /
translated: Since there is no similar instance, when the reason is ascertained to be nonexistent, it is shown to be the same as the probandum. But if it is not ascertained, then doubt arises with regard to the similar instance,

original: ngo bo las the tshom za ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /🔽med las ldog pa med na yang //
analyzed: ngo bo las the tshom za ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni / med las ldog pa med na yang //
translated: because of doubt about the nature. This is shown by the passage,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Even if it is not the case that the reason is absent when the probandum is absent.”

original: gal te sangs rgyas pas khas blangs pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni khas blangs tshad ma yin pa las /
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas pas khas blangs pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni khas blangs tshad ma yin pa las /
translated: If the Buddhist accepts that the reason is established by a valid cognition accepted by both parties, then the response is, “If the reason is established by a valid cognition accepted by both parties, then the probandum must also be established by a valid cognition accepted by both parties.”

original: med pa zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is explained that it does not exist.

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs yin gyi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas ma yin pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la phung po gnyis las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs yin gyi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas ma yin pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la phung po gnyis las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that the reason is that it is not tenable in any other way, and that it is not that it exists in the similar class, then there is the phrase “from the two classes.”🔽That it is not tenable in any other way is ascertained. Moreover, that which is grasped is only the similar class, but not the dissimilar class, even if it is not seen.

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni nges pa yin la de yang gang du gzung ba de kho na mthun pa'i phyogs yin gyi gzhan du ma mthong ba yin yang ste mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ni mthong ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi ma mthong yang ldog par
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni nges pa yin la de yang gang du gzung ba de kho na mthun pa'i phyogs yin gyi gzhan du ma mthong ba yin yang ste mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ni mthong ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi ma mthong yang ldog par
translated: It is not that it is seen only in the dissimilar class, but it is also seen in the similar class.

original: 'gyur ro // 'di gnyis kyang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa'i phung po gnyis yin na yin gyi gzhan du ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // 'di gnyis kyang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa'i phung po gnyis yin na yin gyi gzhan du ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: These two are the two classes of existence and nonexistence in the similar and dissimilar classes, but not in any other way.

original: mthong med dag la zhes pa ste /
analyzed: mthong med dag la zhes pa ste /
translated: The phrase “in what is not seen” teaches this.

original: gnyi ga med na mthun pa'i phyogs dang / cig shos dag la yod pa dang med pa ma mthong ba rnams la mthong bar ma nges pa'i phyir the tshom za ba ste ma nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga med na mthun pa'i phyogs dang / cig shos dag la yod pa dang med pa ma mthong ba rnams la mthong bar ma nges pa'i phyir the tshom za ba ste ma nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: If neither is the case, then there is doubt, because one does not see the existence and non-existence of the similar and dissimilar instances.

original: lus dang bum pa dag la bdag med par khyad par med pa ma yin na srog la sogs pa yod pa dag cig shos kyi rnam par dbye bas dbye ba dang ldan pa bdag ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gsal ba khyab byed ma yin na zhes
analyzed: lus dang bum pa dag la bdag med par khyad par med pa ma yin na srog la sogs pa yod pa dag cig shos kyi rnam par dbye bas dbye ba dang ldan pa bdag ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gsal ba khyab byed ma yin na zhes
translated: If the body and the pot are not distinguished as to the absence of self, then is the self not distinguished as to the existence of life, etc., by the distinction of the other?

original: bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bya ba smos so //
translated: The reply is: If the manifest is not the pervader.

original: yang gi sgras ni blo la sogs pa gcig po yod pa dang med pa nyid du rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu yin par yang bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni blo la sogs pa gcig po yod pa dang med pa nyid du rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu yin par yang bstan pa'o //
translated: The word “also” indicates that the existence and non-existence of the single cognition, etc., are the cause of the distinction.

original: bdag med pa nyid kyi rigs pa la yod pa'i srog la sogs pa rnams ni gsal ba thams cad la khyab pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag med pa nyid kyi rigs pa la yod pa'i srog la sogs pa rnams ni gsal ba thams cad la khyab pa ma yin te /
translated: The life, etc., which exist in the reasoning of selflessness do not pervade all the manifest.

original: ma khrigs pa'i rigs kyi gsal ba rnams bum pa dang rdo rje pha lam la sogs pa yang rnam par dbye ba med kyang mtshon gyis chod pa dang mi chod pa'i rnam par dbye ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: ma khrigs pa'i rigs kyi gsal ba rnams bum pa dang rdo rje pha lam la sogs pa yang rnam par dbye ba med kyang mtshon gyis chod pa dang mi chod pa'i rnam par dbye ba lta bu'o //
translated: The types of clarity that are not well-defined are like the distinction between what is cut and what is not cut by a sword with regard to a pot, a diamond, etc., even though there is no distinction in the clarity of the pot, the diamond, etc.

original: de'i phyir kha cig tu mthong bas ma mthong ba'i bdag dang srog la sogs pa la yang nges pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir kha cig tu mthong bas ma mthong ba'i bdag dang srog la sogs pa la yang nges pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no certainty with regard to the self, life-force, etc., which are not seen in some places, but are seen in others.

original: de'i phyir bdag med pa nyid kyang yin la srog @296b la sogs pa yod pa la 'gal ba ci zhig yod ces bstan pa ni dngos po la bdag med pa'i srog la sogs pa la yang the tshom gang las ldog par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag med pa nyid kyang yin la srog @296b la sogs pa yod pa la 'gal ba ci zhig yod ces bstan pa ni dngos po la bdag med pa'i srog la sogs pa la yang the tshom gang las ldog par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, he demonstrates that there is no contradiction in maintaining that there is no self, but that there is a life-force, etc. He says, “What is the doubt with regard to a life-force, etc., which are devoid of self?”

original: ci las she na /
analyzed: ci las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'gal pa ma mthong na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'gal pa ma mthong na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He says, “If one does not see a contradiction.”

original: 'gal ba'i 'bras bu ma mthong na'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i 'bras bu ma mthong na'o //
translated: If one does not see a contradictory effect.

original: 'gal ba ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: A contradiction is a contradictory effect.

original: 'gal ba khyab pa nyid kho na srog la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba khyab pa nyid kho na srog la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: He demonstrates that the pervasion by contradiction itself is the contradiction with a life-force, etc., and not anything else.

original: la lar nges pa las gzhan ci yod ces bya ba ni 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: la lar nges pa las gzhan ci yod ces bya ba ni 'gal ba ste /
translated: To some, he says, What else is there but ascertainment? This is contradictory.

original: 'gal ba khyab pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gal ba khyab pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that contradiction is pervasion alone.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni nges ba yin la de'i 'bras bu nyid med na de'i nges pa med pas de dang 'gal ba can yin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang yang 'gal ba yin par the tshom za bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni nges ba yin la de'i 'bras bu nyid med na de'i nges pa med pas de dang 'gal ba can yin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang yang 'gal ba yin par the tshom za bar bstan pa ni /
translated: That itself is ascertainment. Since there is no effect of that, there is no ascertainment of that. Therefore, it is taught that there is doubt regarding the contradiction with the discordant class.

original: des ni bdag med pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des ni bdag med pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is in regard to selflessness.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'gal ba ma yin na gzhan ni 'gal ba med pa kho na yin pa des so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'gal ba ma yin na gzhan ni 'gal ba med pa kho na yin pa des so //
translated: Therefore means that if there is no contradiction that is preceded by a connection, then the other is just non-contradictory. By that,

original: de sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'brel pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽ldog tu chug pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'brel pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽ldog tu chug pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is taught that it is not preceded by a connection.🔽It is if it were possible.

original: med pa'i med pa yod pa nyid du khas mi len pa'i phyir bdag med pa med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa las bdag grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: med pa'i med pa yod pa nyid du khas mi len pa'i phyir bdag med pa med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa las bdag grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because we do not accept the non-existence of non-existence as existent, the self is not established from life and so on, because selflessness does not exist.

original: ldog pa zhes bya ba ni med pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa zhes bya ba ni med pa'o //
translated: The term “reverse” means non-existence.

original: med pa'i med pa gang du yod pa mi 'dod pa yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: med pa'i med pa gang du yod pa mi 'dod pa yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: If you assert that the non-existence of non-existence exists somewhere,

original: dper na srog la sogs mthun pa'i phyogs la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dper na srog la sogs mthun pa'i phyogs la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then it is like life and so on, which are similar cases.

original: med pa'i med pa la'o //
analyzed: med pa'i med pa la'o //
translated: It is in the non-existence of non-existence.

original: med pa'i med pa gal te yod pa 'dod na de ltar na srog la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: med pa'i med pa gal te yod pa 'dod na de ltar na srog la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If you assert that the non-existence of non-existence exists, then it is taught that it would follow that life and so on exist.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med //
translated: There is no reverse from a similar case.

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: rjes su 'gro ba nyid med na bdag med pa nyid kyang bdag tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba nyid med na bdag med pa nyid kyang bdag tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: If there is no positive concomitance, then selflessness would not be a self. This is taught by the line:

original: rjes 'gro can yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes 'gro can yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It would follow that it is not a self.

original: med pa'i med pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i med pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The non-existence of non-existence also does not exist.

original: chos can la yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos can la yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The thought that it exists in the subject is the “similar position.”

original: med pa'i med pa yod pa nyid kyi stobs kyis mthun pa'i phyogs med pa mi 'grub par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i med pa yod pa nyid kyi stobs kyis mthun pa'i phyogs med pa mi 'grub par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The power of the existence of the non-existence of non-existence does not establish the non-existence of the similar position, as has been shown.

original: med pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because the non-existence itself is not tenable, as has been said.

original: phyi ltar mthun pa'i phyogs med par zhes bya ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ltar mthun pa'i phyogs med par zhes bya ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'o //
translated: The “non-existence of the similar position” in the external sense is the non-existence of the similar position.

original: gal te yod pa mi srid na de nyid med pa mi srid par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gal te yod pa mi srid na de nyid med pa mi srid par bstan pa ni /
translated: If existence is not possible, then non-existence is not possible, as has been shown.

original: 'o na med pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na med pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Well then, non-existence itself” and so on.🔽Just as the existence of the similar position is not, so also life-force and so on are not, as has been shown.

original: @297a * // ji ltar mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa med pa bzhin du srog la sogs pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @297a * // ji ltar mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa med pa bzhin du srog la sogs pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Just as the similar position” and so on.

original: gal te med na bdag med pa ldog pa yin yang bdag med pa nyid ldog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nye bar bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: gal te med na bdag med pa ldog pa yin yang bdag med pa nyid ldog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nye bar bsdu ba ni /
translated: If it does not exist, then the non-existence of self is reversed, but the non-existence of self itself is not reversed, as has been shown.

original: de lta yin na gson po'i lus la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na gson po'i lus la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that were so, then it would be as follows: “In the living body.”

original: de zhes bya ba ni gson po'i lus so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gson po'i lus so //
translated: “That” refers to the living body.

original: gzhan yod pa yis zhes bya ba ni gson po'i lus yod pas so //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa yis zhes bya ba ni gson po'i lus yod pas so //
translated: “By the existence of another” refers to the existence of the living body.

original: 'khrul can zhes bya ba ni yod pa med pa ste med pa las 'khrul par gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul can zhes bya ba ni yod pa med pa ste med pa las 'khrul par gyur pa yin te /
translated: “Erroneous” means non-existent. It is an error to think that it exists.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa zhes bya ba 'di las gzhan pa la'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa zhes bya ba 'di las gzhan pa la'o //
translated: “In the similar instance” refers to the other.🔽The non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.

original: med pa rten nyid ma yin pa bzhin du brten pa nyid kyang med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: med pa rten nyid ma yin pa bzhin du brten pa nyid kyang med par bstan pa ni /
translated: “The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.

original: med pa yang zhes bya ba ste mthun pa'i phyogs la bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med pa de'i phyir ldog pa can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽mthong ba'i dngos po kha cig las ldog pa na med pa yin gyi bdag ni mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir med pa tsam ni bum pa la sogs pa las yin te /
analyzed: med pa yang zhes bya ba ste mthun pa'i phyogs la bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med pa de'i phyir ldog pa can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽mthong ba'i dngos po kha cig las ldog pa na med pa yin gyi bdag ni mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir med pa tsam ni bum pa la sogs pa las yin te /
translated: “The non-existence is not the basis” means that the non-existence is not the basis, just as the existence is not the basis.🔽“The non-existence is not the basis” means

original: de log kyang lus la med pa tsam grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de log kyang lus la med pa tsam grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that even if that is refuted, the mere non-existence of the body is established is:

original: so sor nges ba'i rang bzhin ma mthong bar zhes bya ba'o //🔽sgro btags pa khyad par can yin na mthun pa'i phyogs la yang yin par bstan pa ni de'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor nges ba'i rang bzhin ma mthong bar zhes bya ba'o // sgro btags pa khyad par can yin na mthun pa'i phyogs la yang yin par bstan pa ni de'i phyir /
translated: “The nature of the individual is not seen.”🔽If it is a special superimposition, it is also in the similar class. The demonstration of that is:

original: gal te gtan tshigs mthun phyogs las //
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs mthun phyogs las //
translated: Therefore, if the reason is in the similar class,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is not a correct reason.🔽If selflessness does not exist, the self is not established. But is it not the case that the consequence is that it does not have life, etc.?

original: bdag med pa nyid med na yang bdag mi 'grub na srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la 'jug pa gang gi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bdag med pa nyid med na yang bdag mi 'grub na srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la 'jug pa gang gi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to that is: “Whose?”

original: nges pa can ni nges par byed la log pas ldog pa yin la /
analyzed: nges pa can ni nges par byed la log pas ldog pa yin la /
translated: The definite is that which makes definite. The reversed is that which reverses.

original: bdag ni srog la sogs pa'i nges par byed pa por mthong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag ni srog la sogs pa'i nges par byed pa por mthong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The self is not seen to be that which makes definite life, etc.

original: bdag rang bzhin gyis log par nges par byed pa'i ldog par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: bdag rang bzhin gyis log par nges par byed pa'i ldog par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the self is that which makes definite the reversal of the natural reversal,🔽then it is not the case that the consequence is that it does not have life, etc.

original: de la mthong ba ci zhig bya snyam du sems pa la /🔽med na mi 'byung de yang ni //
analyzed: de la mthong ba ci zhig bya snyam du sems pa la / med na mi 'byung de yang ni //
translated: One might think, What is the use of seeing that?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And that is the invariable concomitance.

original: 'jug par byed ba dang ldog par byed pa zhes byed pa'i nges pa yang tshad ma med pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'jug par byed ba dang ldog par byed pa zhes byed pa'i nges pa yang tshad ma med pa ma yin la /
translated: The certainty of it causes engagement and disengagement is not without a valid cognition.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma yang de mthong ba kho nas mthong ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang lhog pa dag mthong ba dag tu grub pa'i ngo bo la yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma yang de mthong ba kho nas mthong ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang lhog pa dag mthong ba dag tu grub pa'i ngo bo la yin no //
translated: And the valid cognition that establishes that is seen just by seeing that, so the pervasion and the counter-pervasion are established by seeing the nature of that.

original: de dag gzhan kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de dag gzhan kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: One might think, Those are just other things.

original: de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid de mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid de mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'o //
translated: The cause and effect are just that, seen and unseen.

original: @297b de tsam mthong nas 'di ni 'bras bu yin pa dang gzhan zhes bya ba yang nges pa'i phyir 'di la sgrub byed yin no zhes nyes par btags pa mthong ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @297b de tsam mthong nas 'di ni 'bras bu yin pa dang gzhan zhes bya ba yang nges pa'i phyir 'di la sgrub byed yin no zhes nyes par btags pa mthong ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having seen just that, it is ascertained that this is the effect and that is other, so the establishment is just that. The fault of superimposition is seen in it is also seen.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid du nges pa 'grub pa ma yin te sgrub byed med na ste rjes su 'gro ba dag med na'o //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid du nges pa 'grub pa ma yin te sgrub byed med na ste rjes su 'gro ba dag med na'o //
translated: If the probandum is not established, the invariable concomitance is not established.

original: sgrub par byed pa ni rtags rgyu mtshan te sgrub byed gzhan gyi'am tshad ma'i de zhes bya ba ldog pa'i dbye bas de ltar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni rtags rgyu mtshan te sgrub byed gzhan gyi'am tshad ma'i de zhes bya ba ldog pa'i dbye bas de ltar brjod pa yin no //
translated: The probans is the reason, the probans of another, or the valid cognition.

original: tha dad pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid dgag pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid dgag pa ste /
translated: The difference is in terms of the negation of identity.

original: 'bras bu la sogs pa'i nus pa kun du ston pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs pa'i nus pa kun du ston pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the capacity of the effect and so on is shown.

original: snga ma las de ma thag pa rnam par gcod pas de ma thag tu 'byung ba'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa dang / phyi ma rnam par gcod pas snga ma rgyu nyid yin par nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: snga ma las de ma thag pa rnam par gcod pas de ma thag tu 'byung ba'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa dang / phyi ma rnam par gcod pas snga ma rgyu nyid yin par nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: Because the immediate antecedent is excluded, it is the effect that arises immediately after. Because the subsequent is excluded, it is ascertained as the cause that precedes. This is the reason.

original: gzhan mthong ba dang mthong ba dag gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan mthong ba dang mthong ba dag gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is seen in other things.

original: yod pa dang med pa tsam ni 'bras bu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa tsam ni 'bras bu nyid ma yin te /
translated: Mere existence and non-existence are not the effect.

original: skye ba'i khyad par yang 'di'i de ma thag tu mthong ba dang de lta bu'i rnam pa can du byung ba yang de ltar mthong bar brjod kyi gzhan yod pa dang med pa yang dmigs pa dang dmigs pa dag ma yin te /
analyzed: skye ba'i khyad par yang 'di'i de ma thag tu mthong ba dang de lta bu'i rnam pa can du byung ba yang de ltar mthong bar brjod kyi gzhan yod pa dang med pa yang dmigs pa dang dmigs pa dag ma yin te /
translated: The difference in the arising is also said to be the seeing of that and the arising of that kind, but not the seeing of the existence and nonexistence of another, nor the seeing of the objective support and nonobjective support.

original: skye ba'i khyad par yang 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid de'i go bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skye ba'i khyad par yang 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid de'i go bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The difference in the arising is also the effect, etc., of that.

original: mthong ba dang mthong ba de dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba dang mthong ba de dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The seeing and the seen are the same.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ltog pa dag las zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa dag las so //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ltog pa dag las zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa dag las so //
translated: From the positive and negative concomitances means from the existence and nonexistence.

original: don gzhan zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang 'brel ba'i 'brel pa can gyi med na mi 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: don gzhan zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang 'brel ba'i 'brel pa can gyi med na mi 'byung ba nyid do //
translated: The other object means the nonexistence that is the related object of the relation of positive and negative concomitance.

original: de'i sgrub byed pa med pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ma med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrub byed pa med pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ma med pa'o //
translated: The proof of that is the nonexistence of the means of valid cognition.

original: de yong gang zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang bral ba yod na yang ngo //
analyzed: de yong gang zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang bral ba yod na yang ngo //
translated: That is what is meant by the existence of that.

original: gzhan yod pa'i nges pa ma yin pa ni khyad par med pa ma yin pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba can du nges pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i nges pa ma yin pa ni khyad par med pa ma yin pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba can du nges pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The non-existence of the other is not the non-existence of the non-distinct.

original: 'bras bu la 'bras bu yod pa nyid ni de la gnas pa kho na sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan la ltos pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu la 'bras bu yod pa nyid ni de la gnas pa kho na sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan la ltos pa ma yin la /
translated: The existence of the effect in the cause is not dependent on the reason for the establishment of the effect in the cause itself.

original: 'bras bu nyid de yang mthong ba dang ma mthong ba yod pa dang med pa dag la yin gyi gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don du mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid de yang mthong ba dang ma mthong ba yod pa dang med pa dag la yin gyi gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don du mthong ngo //
translated: The effect itself is seen to exist in the existent and non-existent, but not in the other.

original: bdag yong pa kho na la srog la sogs pa yod pa yin te khyab byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag yong pa kho na la srog la sogs pa yod pa yin te khyab byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The soul alone has life, etc., because it is the pervader.

original: de med na med ces bya ba yang de yod na yod pa kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de med na med ces bya ba yang de yod na yod pa kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: And is it not the case that when it does not exist, it does not exist?

original: rtag tu yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag tu yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said to always exist.

original: de yod @298a * //
analyzed: de yod @298a * //
translated: It exists

original: na gzhan la yang yod pa srid na de kho nas nus pa can rtag pa khyab byed yod na 'byung ba kho na yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: na gzhan la yang yod pa srid na de kho nas nus pa can rtag pa khyab byed yod na 'byung ba kho na yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is possible that another person has it, then it would follow that only that which is permanent, pervasive, and potent is an element.

original: ngo bo la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there would be no difference in their nature.

original: 'di lta bu'i ni bdag khyab byed nyid las ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i ni bdag khyab byed nyid las ma yin te /
translated: It is not so in this case, because the self is not pervasive.

original: 'bras bu cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang srog la sogs pa de rnams med pa mi srid par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang srog la sogs pa de rnams med pa mi srid par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the effect is not simultaneous, and because it is impossible for those such as life to be absent.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na rtag du yod pa ste ther zug tu gnas pa ma mthong bas med pa'i phyir rgyu nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na rtag du yod pa ste ther zug tu gnas pa ma mthong bas med pa'i phyir rgyu nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: When? It is not seen to exist permanently, to endure eternally, and therefore it is not a cause.

original: mthong ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yang rgyu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yang rgyu nyid ma yin te /
translated: It is not a cause because it does not follow what is seen.

original: khyab pa can gyi yul dang dus la nges pa can ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa can ma yin pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba zhig na nges pa can yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyab pa can gyi yul dang dus la nges pa can ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa can ma yin pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba zhig na nges pa can yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Because it is not restricted to a specific place or time, it would be an unrestricted effect. But it is taught to be restricted:

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad rnams //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad rnams //
translated: The nature of the effect is different.

original: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus dang ngo bo'i khyad par rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus dang ngo bo'i khyad par rnams so //
translated: The differences are in terms of place, time, and nature.

original: rgyu rnams ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu rnams ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par rnams so //
translated: The causes are the differences.

original: khyab pa can ma yin pa ni de dag yod pa'i ni de dag yod pa'i phyir de dag med par zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa can ma yin pa ni de dag yod pa'i ni de dag yod pa'i phyir de dag med par zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The nonpervading is the effect that is not present when they are absent, because it is present when they are present.

original: gzhan las zhes bya ba ni blo la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan las zhes bya ba ni blo la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: From another is the arising of a difference from a nondifferent thing, such as cognition and so on.

original: khyad par can las khyad par med par 'byung na des bskyed de khyad par can gyi bskyed bya khyad par med par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par can las khyad par med par 'byung na des bskyed de khyad par can gyi bskyed bya khyad par med par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it arises from a pervading thing, the effect that is not different from it would not arise when the pervading thing does not exist.

original: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyi rgyu nyid yin na khyab pa can ma yin pa'i 'bras bu de med kyang gzhan las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyi rgyu nyid yin na khyab pa can ma yin pa'i 'bras bu de med kyang gzhan las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is a cause that is merely concomitant, the nonpervading effect would arise even when it does not exist, because it would arise from another.

original: mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don yin par 'grel par ro //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don yin par 'grel par ro //
translated: The meaning is that it would not arise. This is explained in the commentary.

original: yin du zin mod ce na yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni de dag med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yin du zin mod ce na yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni de dag med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But even if that were so, it is unreasonable, as is demonstrated by the words “they do not exist.

original: des bskyed pa'i zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i bskyed bya'i khyad par med pa'o //
analyzed: des bskyed pa'i zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i bskyed bya'i khyad par med pa'o //
translated: ” “Generated by them” means that there is no difference in the generated effect.

original: de bzhin du khyad par can gyi ngo bo yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni /🔽tshogs pa'i nus pa tha dad min //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par can gyi ngo bo yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni / tshogs pa'i nus pa tha dad min //
translated: Similarly, it is unreasonable for there to be a nature that is qualified, as is demonstrated by the words

original: zhes bya ba'o //🔽khyad par can nyid kyi yin gyi khyad par can gyi ma yin pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o // khyad par can nyid kyi yin gyi khyad par can gyi ma yin pa ni ma yin la /
translated: “The capacity of the collection is not different.”🔽It is the nature of the qualified, not the qualifier.

original: khyad par can gyi khyad par yin gyi khyad par ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi khyad par yin gyi khyad par ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
translated: It is the qualifier of the qualified, not the qualified.

original: gal te de zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'i nus pa'o //
analyzed: gal te de zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'i nus pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the capacity of the collection.

original: tha dad byed min ni dbye ba ma yin na de'i 'bras bu yang de ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha dad byed min ni dbye ba ma yin na de'i 'bras bu yang de ltar 'gyur te /
translated: “Not different” means that if there is no difference, its effect would be like that.

original: khyad par med na yang thams cad khyad par med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par med na yang thams cad khyad par med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if there is no difference, everything would be undifferentiated.

original: tha dad par ni re zhig dmigs na zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa tsam don du gnyer ba ma yin pa des na gzhan tshol ba @298b yin pa de dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'du ba'i 'brel pa ji ltar yin pa bsam par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: tha dad par ni re zhig dmigs na zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa tsam don du gnyer ba ma yin pa des na gzhan tshol ba @298b yin pa de dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'du ba'i 'brel pa ji ltar yin pa bsam par bya ba yin no //
translated: “If they are perceived as different” means that one who is not seeking mere perception seeks another, and therefore one should consider how the relation of inherence is related to that.

original: de bsam pa ni srog sogs 'brel pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bsam pa ni srog sogs 'brel pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The consideration of that is “the relation of life, etc.”

original: nges pa zhes bya ba ni dus dang yul la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya ba ni dus dang yul la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: “Certainty” is with respect to time, place, etc.

original: 'brel pa can ma yin pa las grub pa nges pa can gyi ma yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar bdag kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa can ma yin pa las grub pa nges pa can gyi ma yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar bdag kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that it is not established from that which is not related with certainty is “just as the self, etc.”

original: 'on te srog la sogs pa skul bar byed pa bskul bar bya ba nyid kyis skul byed du go bar byed kyi nam mkha' la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te srog la sogs pa skul bar byed pa bskul bar bya ba nyid kyis skul byed du go bar byed kyi nam mkha' la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But if it is said that life, etc., are understood to be the instigator by the instigatability, but not space, etc.,

original: sems pa can ma yin no zer ba ni 'on te skul bar byed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems pa can ma yin no zer ba ni 'on te skul bar byed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because they are not sentient, then “but if the instigator, etc.”

original: bskul bar bya ba nyid yin pas go bar byed na /
analyzed: bskul bar bya ba nyid yin pas go bar byed na /
translated: If it is understood by instigatability,

original: skul byed la yin gyi khyab pa can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skul byed la yin gyi khyab pa can ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a universal,

original: sgro gdags par bya ba'i khyad par ma yin pa nyid kyis 'byung ba la de nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni bya med khyab pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sgro gdags par bya ba'i khyad par ma yin pa nyid kyis 'byung ba la de nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni bya med khyab pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it is not a universal, since it is not understood to be the same in the elements.

original: khyab pa can bya ba med pa la srog la sogs pa 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyab pa can bya ba med pa la srog la sogs pa 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the verse is that the universal, which is not an action, is the effect of the contradictory cause, life, etc.

original: rtogs pa nges pa yin na zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu sngon po ni yul yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: rtogs pa nges pa yin na zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu sngon po ni yul yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: If the ascertainment of the object is by means of the ascertainment of the cognition, then the cause of the cognition of blue is the object blue, by the principle of causality.

original: rtogs bzhin pa'i dbye ba ma yin du zin kyang rtogs pa'i dbye ba ni tha snyad kyi ched du yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs bzhin pa'i dbye ba ma yin du zin kyang rtogs pa'i dbye ba ni tha snyad kyi ched du yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even if the distinction of the object is not ascertained, the distinction of the cognition is for the sake of conventional usage.

original: de'i mtshan nyid la snang ba tsam zhes bya ba ni tha snyad la de ltar 'gyur zhing rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid la snang ba tsam zhes bya ba ni tha snyad la de ltar 'gyur zhing rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of the verse is that the definition of the object is mere appearance, because it is so in conventional usage and because it is the reason.

original: blang bya dang dor bya ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa med pa dang cig shos kyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: blang bya dang dor bya ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa med pa dang cig shos kyi dbye ba'o //
translated: The phrase not to be adopted or rejected refers to the distinction between error and its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.

original: so sor snang ba'i dgos pa la nye bar mkho ba dngos po bzhin du bshad bya yin par bstan pa ni //🔽de'i phyir tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽don 'di yang tshigs su bcad pa nyid du yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: so sor snang ba'i dgos pa la nye bar mkho ba dngos po bzhin du bshad bya yin par bstan pa ni // de'i phyir tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'o // don 'di yang tshigs su bcad pa nyid du yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.

original: tshogs pa'i nus pa tha dad phyir //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i nus pa tha dad phyir // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.

original: rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //🔽dngos rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi rol rnams so //🔽sna tshogs ngo bo nyid du ni 'jug pa dang cig shos kyi yul nyid do //🔽'khrul pa dang cig shos nyid kyis kyang tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir ro // dngos rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi rol rnams so // sna tshogs ngo bo nyid du ni 'jug pa dang cig shos kyi yul nyid do // 'khrul pa dang cig shos nyid kyis kyang tha dad pa'o //
translated: The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.🔽The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.

original: de med na snang ba tsam gnyis su med pa yin par bstan pa ni gal te de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de med na snang ba tsam gnyis su med pa yin par bstan pa ni gal te de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase the object of individual appearance refers to the distinction between the object of error and the object of its opposite.

original: bdag 'di'i 'bras bu'i dbye bas tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang yod pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la 'di tha dad byed tha dang byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag 'di'i 'bras bu'i dbye bas tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang yod pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la 'di tha dad byed tha dang byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: “It is not different, though it is different.”

original: tha dad pa'i ngo bo 'bras bu'i dbye ba byed kyang tha mi dad pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i phyir @299a * //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i ngo bo 'bras bu'i dbye ba byed kyang tha mi dad pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i phyir @299a * //
translated: Even though there is a difference of effects, there is no difference, because that which is not a creator is not a creator.

original: med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: med pa kho na'o //
translated: It is nonexistent.

original: yod na yang sna tshogs pa nyid gcig nyid gcig nyid dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: yod na yang sna tshogs pa nyid gcig nyid gcig nyid dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Even if it exists, the difference of the various is contradictory with oneness.🔽Like fire and non-fire.

original: me dang me ma yin pa lta bu'o zhes bstan pa ni gcig ni rang bzhin du man //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: me dang me ma yin pa lta bu'o zhes bstan pa ni gcig ni rang bzhin du man // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of this is: “One is not the nature of many.”

original: me ma yin pa'i grog mkhar la sogs me'i ngo bo nyid kyis du ba skyed pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: me ma yin pa'i grog mkhar la sogs me'i ngo bo nyid kyis du ba skyed pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: One thinks that an anthill, which is not fire, produces smoke by the nature of fire.

original: de lta nyid ma yin na du ba me ma yin pa las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel par te /
analyzed: de lta nyid ma yin na du ba me ma yin pa las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel par te /
translated: If it were not so, smoke would not arise from non-fire. This is the commentary.

original: du ba 'byung ba gzhan du mi 'thad pa kho nas me ma yin pa la me'i ngo bor rtogs pas tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: du ba 'byung ba gzhan du mi 'thad pa kho nas me ma yin pa la me'i ngo bor rtogs pas tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni /
