translated: Since it is not tenable that smoke arises from anything other than fire, it is shown that they are different because one realizes that what is not fire has the nature of fire.🔽The characteristic of different things

original: dngos po tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is that they are different from each other.

original: tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo gzhan yang de las tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad par byed pa'i ngo bo tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo gang gi yin pa de ni tha dad pa'i dngos po ni tha dad pa nyid kyi ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba'i
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo gzhan yang de las tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad par byed pa'i ngo bo tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo gang gi yin pa de ni tha dad pa'i dngos po ni tha dad pa nyid kyi ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba'i
translated: Since the nature of what is not different is also different from that, the nature that makes them different is the nature of what is not different. That is the meaning of “the nature of different things is difference itself.”

original: don rigs pas so //
analyzed: don rigs pas so //
translated: This is the meaning of the text.🔽At that time, it is shown that the other, the related, is also just different.

original: de'i tshe 'brel pa can gzhan yang tha dad pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni des na gzhan ni zhes bya bka'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'brel pa can gzhan yang tha dad pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni des na gzhan ni zhes bya bka'o //
translated: That is the meaning of “therefore, the other . . .”

original: de ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: de ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na'o //
translated: That is just the nature of difference.

original: de'i ngo bo med na de de'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo med na de de'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If it did not have that nature, it would not possess that effect. This is shown in the following:

original: de las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “From that . . .”

original: tha dad pa'i ngo bo'i 'brel pa can de'i ni tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i ngo bo'i 'brel pa can de'i ni tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin no //
translated: The relation of different natures is not the same as the relation of non-different natures.

original: rgyu'i de skyed pa'i ngo bo ste du ba de nyid ces bya ba ni tshogs pa la'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i de skyed pa'i ngo bo ste du ba de nyid ces bya ba ni tshogs pa la'o //
translated: The cause is the nature of producing that, the smoke, in the assemblage.

original: gal te gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa can yin na de'i tshe de nyid ni tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa can yin na de'i tshe de nyid ni tshogs pa'o //
translated: If it were different, then the assemblage itself would be the relation.

original: de med na gzhan las bskyed bya'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
analyzed: de med na gzhan las bskyed bya'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
translated: If it were not there, how could the effect produced from another arise? This is in the commentary.

original: de'i skyed byed kyi rang bzhin de nyid kyis khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i skyed byed kyi rang bzhin de nyid kyis khyab pa yin te /
translated: It is pervaded by that very nature of producing it.

original: gzhan du na 'gal ba khyab pa yin pa de'i phyir de'i skyed byed gzhan yang skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i go skabs med do //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'gal ba khyab pa yin pa de'i phyir de'i skyed byed gzhan yang skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i go skabs med do //
translated: Otherwise, there would be the pervasion of contradiction. Therefore, there is no opportunity for saying that another producer also produces it.

original: de'i bskyed bya'i 'bras bu'i yang gzhan gyi bskyed bya yin na de kho na gzhan du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya'i 'bras bu'i yang gzhan gyi bskyed bya yin na de kho na gzhan du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And if the effect produced by that is produced by another, then that itself would be another. This is shown by “therefore.”

original: de'i skyed byed de nyid du nges pa ni dngos su 'bras bu de kho na la yin pa de bzhin du 'bras bu yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i skyed byed de nyid du nges pa ni dngos su 'bras bu de kho na la yin pa de bzhin du 'bras bu yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is shown by the phrase “mutually.”🔽Even if the ascertainment is grasped, the effect generates the cognition of the probandum. This is the same for the nonascertainment.

original: nges pa can bzung yang bsgrub bya la rtogs pa nyid skyed par byed pa 'dis ni nges pa can ma yin pa la yang mtshungs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la de nyid kyi de la nges pa mthong ba yang de'i ngo bo'i khongs su gtogs par
analyzed: nges pa can bzung yang bsgrub bya la rtogs pa nyid skyed par byed pa 'dis ni nges pa can ma yin pa la yang mtshungs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la de nyid kyi de la nges pa mthong ba yang de'i ngo bo'i khongs su gtogs par
translated: The seeing of ascertainment in that is included in the category of its nature.

original: byed kyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: byed kyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This is shown by the phrase “not of another.”

original: des na de'i phyir rang nyid kyi ngo bo mthong ba bzhin du de ste bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: des na de'i phyir rang nyid kyi ngo bo mthong ba bzhin du de ste bsgrub bya'o //
translated: Therefore, just like seeing one’s own nature, that is, the probandum,

original: 'bras bu ni nges pa can no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni nges pa can no //
translated: the effect is ascertained.

original: 'bras bu nyid ni nges pa can nyid ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ni nges pa can nyid ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the effect itself ascertained?🔽Because it exists in another, it is said that “it is not.”

original: gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni gcig ces bya ba ste tha mi dad @299b pa'o ;
analyzed: gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni gcig ces bya ba ste tha mi dad @299b pa'o ;
translated: The word “one” means nondifferent.

original: ; du ma las zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa las so //
analyzed: ; du ma las zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa las so //
translated: From many means from non-different.

original: chus zhes bya ba ni 'bras la sogs pa tshos pa ni 'o ma las kyang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chus zhes bya ba ni 'bras la sogs pa tshos pa ni 'o ma las kyang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: From water means that cooking is also from milk, etc.

original: du ma ni ma yin te 'o ma dang chu dag gi 'jug pa'i nus pa tha mi dad par bstan pa ni gsher nus zhes bya ba'o //🔽tha dad pa las ni tshos pa ma yin te 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: du ma ni ma yin te 'o ma dang chu dag gi 'jug pa'i nus pa tha mi dad par bstan pa ni gsher nus zhes bya ba'o // tha dad pa las ni tshos pa ma yin te 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: It is not from many, because the capacity of milk and water to cook is taught as being non-different.

original: me ma yin pa las log pa las du ba bzhin du zhu ba ma yin pa las ldog pa las yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: me ma yin pa las log pa las du ba bzhin du zhu ba ma yin pa las ldog pa las yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not from different, but rather from the opposite of non-cooking, just as smoke is from the opposite of non-fire.

original: der gnyi ga la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: der gnyi ga la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by “there, both are also.

original: 'o ma dang chu de nyid kyis tha dad pa yang yin la zhu ba'i bdag nyid kyis tha mi dad par yang yin na /
analyzed: 'o ma dang chu de nyid kyis tha dad pa yang yin la zhu ba'i bdag nyid kyis tha mi dad par yang yin na /
translated: If milk and water are different, and also non-different in the nature of cooking,

original: de nyid tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa gcig yin par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: de nyid tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa gcig yin par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
translated: then it follows that they are the same, being both different and non-different.

original: tha dad gcig pa'i zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tha dad gcig pa'i zhes bya'o //
translated: This is taught by “the same as different.

original: tha dad pa gcig pa'i phyogs la der gnyi ga'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa gcig pa'i phyogs la der gnyi ga'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the position of the difference of the two, it is said, “both of them.”

original: gcig nyid bya bar mi rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gcig nyid bya bar mi rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The impossibility of the oneness of the two is demonstrated.

original: tha dad gsher nyid ji ltar yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad gsher nyid ji ltar yin // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How can there be the difference of the wet and the burning?

original: tha dad med phyir gcig ces brjod //
analyzed: tha dad med phyir gcig ces brjod //
translated: The nondifference of the two is demonstrated.🔽In the position of the nondifference of the two, it is said, “nondifference.”🔽In the position of the difference of the two, it is said, “nondifference” because the activity of the cognition that arises from the nondifferent is not different.

original: ces bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyogs la yang de ma yin pa las byung ba'i blo'i byed pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir tha mi dad par gnas pa ma nyams pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyogs la yang de ma yin pa las byung ba'i blo'i byed pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir tha mi dad par gnas pa ma nyams pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The nondifference of the two is demonstrated.

original: de yi rang bzhin can gyi blo //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin can gyi blo //
translated: The cognition that has the nature of the two

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is not different from the two.

original: chu dang 'o ma 'ba' zhig ni tha mi dad pas rgyu nyid ma yin gyi me yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma 'ba' zhig ni tha mi dad pas rgyu nyid ma yin gyi me yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is not only milk and water that are nondifferent and not a cause; fire also is.

original: 'o ma dang chu bzhin no //
analyzed: 'o ma dang chu bzhin no //
translated: It is like milk and water.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni sreg byed kyi shes pa la brten pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni sreg byed kyi shes pa la brten pa nyid kyis te /
translated: By what? By the very dependence on the cognition that burns.

original: sreg byed ma yin pa las log pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sreg byed ma yin pa las log pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the opposite of that which does not burn.

original: skyed pa ni byas pa'o //
analyzed: skyed pa ni byas pa'o //
translated: Production is the effect.

original: des ni zhes bya ba ni cha nges so //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba ni cha nges so //
translated: By that, he says, is the determination of the part.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni du bas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni du bas so //
translated: By that, he says, is the smoke.

original: de ltar ni 'brel pa can nyid du ste du ba ma yin pa las log pas de go byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'brel pa can nyid du ste du ba ma yin pa las log pas de go byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: In that way, it is the relatedness, because it is the exclusion of what is not smoke. The meaning is that it is not the indicator.

original: tha dad pa kho na bskyed bya dang skyed byed ma yin nam /
analyzed: tha dad pa kho na bskyed bya dang skyed byed ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not just the different that is the effect and the cause?

original: de bzhin du 'brel pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la bstan pa ni mer shes yan lag ces bya ba ste tha dad pa yang de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pas bskyed bya dang skyed byed du bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'brel pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la bstan pa ni mer shes yan lag ces bya ba ste tha dad pa yang de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pas bskyed bya dang skyed byed du bzung ba yin no //
translated: In that way, how is there relatedness? The answer is: The cognition of fire is the part. Even though it is different, it is taken as the effect and the cause because it excludes what is not that.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni zhu ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni zhu ba bzhin du'o //
translated: In that way, he says, is the question.

original: 'bras gzhan zhes bya ba ni du ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: 'bras gzhan zhes bya ba ni du ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The other effect, he says, is the nature of the smoke.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni me ma yin ba can las ldog par byed pas bskyed bya can bzhin du ba ma yin pa las ldog pa can yin no zhes bya'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni me ma yin ba can las ldog par byed pas bskyed bya can bzhin du ba ma yin pa las ldog pa can yin no zhes bya'i don to //
translated: In that way, he says, is the exclusion of what is not fire. The meaning is that it is the exclusion of what is not smoke, like the exclusion of what is not the effect.

original: de bzhin me ni tha dad kyi //
analyzed: de bzhin me ni tha dad kyi //
translated: Likewise, fire is different from fuel,

original: zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of “likewise” is “like the cognition of water and milk.”

original: de las gzhan dag las ldog pas na zhes bya ba ni zhu ba'i shes pa la brten pa bzhin du zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽tha dad kyang zhes @300a * //
analyzed: de las gzhan dag las ldog pas na zhes bya ba ni zhu ba'i shes pa la brten pa bzhin du zhes bya bar sbyar ro // tha dad kyang zhes @300a * //
translated: “ Because it is distinguished from others” is to be connected with “like the cognition of water and milk.”

original: bya ba ni chu dang 'o ma nyid kyis so //
analyzed: bya ba ni chu dang 'o ma nyid kyis so //
translated: “ Although different” is because of water and milk themselves.

original: tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni rtsva dang lo ma la sogs pa las byung ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni rtsva dang lo ma la sogs pa las byung ba nyid kyis so //
translated: “ Although different” is because of grass, leaves, and so on.🔽“ Fire is not” is because of the cognition of fire that is the producer, which is distinguished from what is not fire.

original: me ni ma yin pa las log pas skyed par byed pa'i me'i shes pa tha dad pa gang yin snyam du sems pa la du bas bud shing gi 'gyur ba dang / lus dro ba yang ste de rnams byed pa'o //
analyzed: me ni ma yin pa las log pas skyed par byed pa'i me'i shes pa tha dad pa gang yin snyam du sems pa la du bas bud shing gi 'gyur ba dang / lus dro ba yang ste de rnams byed pa'o //
translated: The transformation of fuel by smoke and the warmth of the body are their actions.

original: yang na de rnams kyi yan lag ste de byed pa ni khyad par rnams kyi ngo bo me'i shes pa'i yan lag nyid do //
analyzed: yang na de rnams kyi yan lag ste de byed pa ni khyad par rnams kyi ngo bo me'i shes pa'i yan lag nyid do //
translated: Or they are limbs of that, and their action is the nature of the limbs of the cognition of fire, which is distinguished.

original: de byed pa ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i yul nyid me ma yin pa'i du ba la rgyu 'gal ba'am 'gal ba khyab pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de byed pa ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i yul nyid me ma yin pa'i du ba la rgyu 'gal ba'am 'gal ba khyab pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The object of the exclusion of what is not that is taught to be the contradiction of the effect or the pervasion of the contradiction in smoke that is not fire.

original: gal te ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not,

original: du ba yang me ma yin pa la 'bras bu 'gal ba srid par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: du ba yang me ma yin pa la 'bras bu 'gal ba srid par bstan pa ni /
translated: Smoke is taught to be the possible effect of the contradiction in what is not fire.

original: gal te de du ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te de du ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is smoke,

original: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas srid pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas srid pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that it is possible to follow what is seen.🔽From another to another,🔽from another possibility, from blue to another, to yellow, it does not become.

original: gzhan dang gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gzhan du srid pa las te sngon po nyid gzhan du ste ser por mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ci las yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gzhan du srid pa las te sngon po nyid gzhan du ste ser por mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ci las yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: From what?

original: du ba nyid mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni du ba'i bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir dang me'i bskyed bya ma yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: du ba nyid mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni du ba'i bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir dang me'i bskyed bya ma yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: From smoke, it does not become, because it does not perform the function of smoke and is not the product of fire.🔽From what is this?

original: 'di gang las zhes bya ba ni bskal pa las tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di gang las zhes bya ba ni bskal pa las tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the impossibility of a valid cognition of the excluded.

original: rang bzhin tsam dngos po'i 'bras bu'i byed pa po ma yin zhes zer ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin tsam dngos po'i 'bras bu'i byed pa po ma yin zhes zer ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “mere nature is not the agent of the effect of a thing” is the same as “if there is no intrinsic identity.”

original: 'bras bu nyid la nges pa yin na rang bzhin nges pa can du mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la ji ltar rang rgyu zhes bya ba ste med na mi 'byung bar zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid la nges pa yin na rang bzhin nges pa can du mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la ji ltar rang rgyu zhes bya ba ste med na mi 'byung bar zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: If it is certain that something is an effect, it is not certain that it is a nature.

original: rang bzhin gyi rang bzhin nyid ni 'bras bu nyid bzhin du nges pa can yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi rang bzhin nyid ni 'bras bu nyid bzhin du nges pa can yin te /
translated: The nature of a nature is certain, just like an effect.

original: spyi mngon par brjod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs la ltos pa yin te tshad ma la ltos pas so //
analyzed: spyi mngon par brjod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs la ltos pa yin te tshad ma la ltos pas so //
translated: Because a universal is expressed, it depends on a reason, because it depends on a valid cognition.

original: yang na gtan tshigs te sgrub byed kyi chos la ltos nas rang bzhin te bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid de nges par bya ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs las so //
analyzed: yang na gtan tshigs te sgrub byed kyi chos la ltos nas rang bzhin te bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid de nges par bya ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs las so //
translated: Or, depending on a reason, that is, a proving property, a nature, that is, a probandum, is certain to be nonexistent without a reason.

original: ji ltar rang rgyu zhes bya ba ni thams cad thams cad kyi ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rang rgyu zhes bya ba ni thams cad thams cad kyi ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Just like a reason” means that not everything is a reason for everything.

original: rgyu ma yin pa nyid la rigs pa 'di kho bos srog la sogs pa'i yul du brjod pa'i phyir slob dpon gyis gsungs pa'i mnyen par bya ba nyid yang shes par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa nyid la rigs pa 'di kho bos srog la sogs pa'i yul du brjod pa'i phyir slob dpon gyis gsungs pa'i mnyen par bya ba nyid yang shes par bya ba yin te /
translated: This reason is stated by the master to be the flexibility of the object, such as life, etc.

original: ldog pa can thams cad kyi rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ldog pa can thams cad kyi rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because the reason is the same for all the alternatives, it is shown:

original: ldog can mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog can mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to show the equality of the alternatives.

original: ldog pa can dang ma nges pa dag 'gal ba can yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ldog pa can dang ma nges pa dag 'gal ba can yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: One may think that the alternatives and the indefinite are contradictory.

original: mthun phyogs @300b las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mthun phyogs @300b las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The master says:🔽The indefinite is the opposite of the similar.

original: ldog pa can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ldog pa can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “alternative” is the opposite.

original: 'di'i ldog pa pa na ma yin nyid 'thad pa dang bcas par bstan pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ldog pa pa na ma yin nyid 'thad pa dang bcas par bstan pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of the possibility of the nonexistence of the alternative is “permanent and impermanent,” etc.

original: ldog pa la ni rang nyid kyis med pa'i phyir the tshom za ba la gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa la ni rang nyid kyis med pa'i phyir the tshom za ba la gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Because the alternative is itself nonexistent, it is a reason for doubt.

original: the tshom za ba la sgrub par byed pa ma yin te ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: the tshom za ba la sgrub par byed pa ma yin te ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: One does not establish a proof for one who is in doubt, because it is uncertain.

original: sgra rtag mi rtag the tshom ni //
analyzed: sgra rtag mi rtag the tshom ni //
translated: Doubt about whether sound is permanent or impermanent

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is taught.

original: the tshom za ba yin na gtan tshigs ni ma nges pas gcig tu nye bar sbyor bar mi byed na the tshom ldog par byed pa ma yin la de'i gtan tshigs thams cad sngar mthong ba las ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: the tshom za ba yin na gtan tshigs ni ma nges pas gcig tu nye bar sbyor bar mi byed na the tshom ldog par byed pa ma yin la de'i gtan tshigs thams cad sngar mthong ba las ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If one is in doubt, the reason is uncertain, so one does not apply it unilaterally. If one does not eliminate doubt, then all the reasons are not from what was previously seen.🔽It is taught:

original: mthong ba bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: mthong ba bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of proving what is seen,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: one does not eliminate doubt.

original: rigs pa'i rnam pas rang gi phyogs yongs su 'dzin pa ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: rigs pa'i rnam pas rang gi phyogs yongs su 'dzin pa ni khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is that one holds one's own position by means of reasoning.

original: rtag pa'am mi rtag pa yang mthong ba ni gzhan la nges par mi byed kyang de la shes pa skyed pa dang mi 'jug pa dag mi rigs te /
analyzed: rtag pa'am mi rtag pa yang mthong ba ni gzhan la nges par mi byed kyang de la shes pa skyed pa dang mi 'jug pa dag mi rigs te /
translated: Even if one sees something as permanent or impermanent, one does not cause certainty in another. However, it is unreasonable to generate knowledge in that person and to not engage.

original: de las gcig log pa ni gzhan 'jug pa med na mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de las gcig log pa ni gzhan 'jug pa med na mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because if one reverses from that, the other does not occur without engaging. This is taught:

original: gcig ldog par gar yang shes byed min //
analyzed: gcig ldog par gar yang shes byed min //
translated: It is not known to be the case anywhere that one is reversed and the other is not.

original: the tshom za bar rtogs pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: the tshom za bar rtogs pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The thought that it is understood with doubt,

original: gal te mnyan bya nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te mnyan bya nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: is stated in the words, “If it is heard, it is heard.”

original: 'gal ba can gnyis po'i 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa dang mi rigs te /🔽de las gcig log pa ni gzhan 'jug pa med na mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba can gnyis po'i 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa dang mi rigs te / de las gcig log pa ni gzhan 'jug pa med na mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not reasonable for the two contradictory ones to engage and not engage.

original: gcig ldog par zhes bya ba'o //🔽the tshom yod na gtan tshigs ma nges pa las zlog par mi byed pas de'i rgyu brjod do zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gcig ldog par zhes bya ba'o // the tshom yod na gtan tshigs ma nges pa las zlog par mi byed pas de'i rgyu brjod do zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Because when one of them is reversed, the other does not occur without engaging. This is stated in the words, “If one is reversed.”

original: 'on te the tshom za bar 'gyur ba na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te the tshom za bar 'gyur ba na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is doubt, the reason is inconclusive. This is stated in the words, “If there is doubt.”

original: de 'di ni gzhal bya ba'o //
analyzed: de 'di ni gzhal bya ba'o //
translated: This is the object of evaluation.

original: de 'di ni gzhal bya ba yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /🔽gnyi ga la mthong gzhal bya nyid //
analyzed: de 'di ni gzhal bya ba yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni / gnyi ga la mthong gzhal bya nyid //
translated: This is also similar to the object of evaluation. This is stated in the words,

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Both are seen as objects of evaluation.”

original: nges par ldog pa kho na ci las shes zer ba la ;
analyzed: nges par ldog pa kho na ci las shes zer ba la ;
translated: From what is it known that it is definitely reversed?

original: gcig tu nges par ldog pas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gcig tu nges par ldog pas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is stated in the words, “By the definite reversal of one.”

original: gnyi ga las ldog par ma nges so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyi ga las ldog par ma nges so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not ascertained to be the opposite of both.

original: ldog pa yang the tshom za ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa yang the tshom za ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin te /
translated: And the opposite is not in accord with doubt.

original: 'on kyang shes pa yin par bstan pa ni gnyi ga las ldog pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa yin par bstan pa ni gnyi ga las ldog pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But the teaching of consciousness is the opposite of both.

original: de skad du yang zhes bya ba ni ldog pa bstan pa'o /
analyzed: de skad du yang zhes bya ba ni ldog pa bstan pa'o /
translated: Thus also is the teaching of the opposite.

original: so ; ; de la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
analyzed: so ; ; de la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
translated: There is in the different.

original: de'i rten ni zhes bya ba ni thun mong ba dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i rten ni zhes bya ba ni thun mong ba dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: Its basis is the commonality.

original: nges bsdus pa'i phyir dang gcig tu ste nges pas ldog na ldog pa nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nges bsdus pa'i phyir dang gcig tu ste nges pas ldog na ldog pa nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because of the inclusion and the certainty, that is, because of the certainty of the opposite when there is the opposite, the meaning is that it is certain.

original: the tshom za ba las ji lta yin zhes bya ba'i don yin zhes zer ba la de ji ltar 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: the tshom za ba las ji lta yin zhes bya ba'i don yin zhes zer ba la de ji ltar 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is it from doubt? The meaning is what is it? How is it this?

original: ldog pa nges @301a * //
analyzed: ldog pa nges @301a * //
translated: The certainty of the opposite.

original: na de dag ni ldog par byed pa nyid yin gyi the tshom za bar byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni 'di ni bshad zin to zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: na de dag ni ldog par byed pa nyid yin gyi the tshom za bar byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni 'di ni bshad zin to zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words “this has already been explained” indicate that these are causes of elimination, not causes of doubt.🔽The words “it is not a cause of doubt” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-knowledge.🔽The words “it eliminates both” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of doubt.

original: ldog par byed pa ni the tshom za bar byed pa ma yin gyi mi shes par byed pa yang ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽gnyi ga rnam par gcod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog par byed pa ni the tshom za bar byed pa ma yin gyi mi shes par byed pa yang ma yin par bstan pa ni / gnyi ga rnam par gcod ces bya ba'o //
translated: The words “it is a cause of ascertainment with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-ascertainment.🔽The words “it is a cause of doubt with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-doubt.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-elimination with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-elimination.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-ascertainment with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-ascertainment.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-doubt with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-doubt.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-elimination with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-elimination.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-ascertainment with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-ascertainment.

original: ldog pa'i sgo nas gzhan la nges par byed pa yin la /🔽ltos pa med pa ni the tshom gyi shes par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni gtan tshigs gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgo nas gzhan la nges par byed pa yin la / ltos pa med pa ni the tshom gyi shes par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni gtan tshigs gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words “it is a cause of non-doubt with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-doubt.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-elimination with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-elimination.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-ascertainment with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-ascertainment.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-doubt with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-doubt.🔽The words “it is a cause of non-elimination with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-elimination.

original: gzhan la log pa kho na gzhan la ltos pa yang rjes su dpag pa'i bya ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan la log pa kho na gzhan la ltos pa yang rjes su dpag pa'i bya ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The words “it is a cause of non-ascertainment with regard to another” indicate that they are causes of elimination, not causes of non-ascertainment.

original: rtag pa log pas zhes bya ba'o //🔽ma yin te de zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: rtag pa log pas zhes bya ba'o //🔽ma yin te de zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: The words

original: rjes su dpag pa las me ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa ni me ma yin zhing mngon sum ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa las me ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa ni me ma yin zhing mngon sum ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “The exclusion of non-fire by inference is not non-fire and not perception” is the “inferential reason of effect.”

original: de la yang nges pa can mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: de la yang nges pa can mthong ba yin te /
translated: And in that case, it is a definite perception.

original: de'i mthong ba la grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i mthong ba la grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because its perception is not different from what is established and what is happiness.

original: re zhig gzhag go zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: re zhig gzhag go zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “For the time being, let it be” is the explanation.

original: ma yin te mngon sum gyis grub pa zhes bya ba ni rtag pa rtag mi rtag pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin te mngon sum gyis grub pa zhes bya ba ni rtag pa rtag mi rtag pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is not so. The statement “established by perception” is free from permanence and impermanence.

original: 'gog par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos po tsam 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gog par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos po tsam 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a negation. Because it grasps mere entity.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: “Other” is impermanence.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “By another” is by being produced.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid kho na ni gnyi ga rnam par gcod par byed pa mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa la gnod par byed pa zer ba la ma yin te /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid kho na ni gnyi ga rnam par gcod par byed pa mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa la gnod par byed pa zer ba la ma yin te /
translated: It is only the probandum, impermanence, that is excluded by the proof, audibility, and not the other property, being a product.

original: mnyan bya nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The word “only” is used to exclude the other property.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni mnyan par bya ba nyid sgrub byed ma yin pas gzhan gyis gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni mnyan par bya ba nyid sgrub byed ma yin pas gzhan gyis gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, if audibility were not the probandum, then the other property would be the probandum, and the proof would be undermined by the other property.

original: 'dir rnam par dpyad par bya ste zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'am zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir rnam par dpyad par bya ste zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'am zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'o //
translated: Here, the analysis is as follows: The explanation of “not mixed with other” is as follows.

original: snang ba las khang pa nang mar zhugs pa'i dang po mthong ba thams cad mi 'dzin pa ni de las gzhan pas gnod pa yin la mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: snang ba las khang pa nang mar zhugs pa'i dang po mthong ba thams cad mi 'dzin pa ni de las gzhan pas gnod pa yin la mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: When one enters a house and first sees, not grasping everything, that is undermined by something else, but it is not direct perception.

original: thams cad tshad mar 'gyur ba yin pa'i bshad pa'o zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad tshad mar 'gyur ba yin pa'i bshad pa'o zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation that everything would be valid cognition is shown by the statement:

original: nyi tshan las ni khyim phugs su //
analyzed: nyi tshan las ni khyim phugs su //
translated: From the sun, in a house

original: zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Immediately after entering.

original: dang po mthong ba zhes bya ba dang po mthong ba tshad ma ma yin gyi thams cad du ma yin par bstan pa ni dang po'i mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang po mthong ba zhes bya ba dang po mthong ba tshad ma ma yin gyi thams cad du ma yin par bstan pa ni dang po'i mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The first is called “seeing,” but the first seeing is not valid cognition, as it is taught that it is not in all cases.

original: gnyis pa ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin pas rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin pas rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: The second is inference, because it holds a connection.

original: gzhan las zhes bya ba ni mnyan pa nyid las so //
analyzed: gzhan las zhes bya ba ni mnyan pa nyid las so //
translated: “From another” means from hearing.

original: de ltar ma yin par zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin par zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'o //
translated: “Not like that” means the ascertainment from being produced.

original: mnyan bya nyid kyis zhes bya bas gnyi ga las ldog pa @301b yin te /
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid kyis zhes bya bas gnyi ga las ldog pa @301b yin te /
translated: “By being heard” means the exclusion of both.

original: rtogs pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the meaning of understanding.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid the tshom gyi rgyu nyid ni ldog pa ma nges na yin te /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid the tshom gyi rgyu nyid ni ldog pa ma nges na yin te /
translated: The cause of doubt of being heard is the uncertainty of the exclusion.

original: des na gcig tu ste nges pa ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni des na ldog pa med pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: des na gcig tu ste nges pa ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni des na ldog pa med pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of “because of the exclusion of the ascertainment” is taught by “therefore, because of the non-exclusion.”

original: gzhan ni nges pa zhes bya ba phung po gzhan yin no zhes zer ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni nges pa zhes bya ba phung po gzhan yin no zhes zer ba'o //
translated: Others say that “ascertainment” is another collection.

original: mdo sde pa'i nam mkha' ni med kyang gzhal bya yin te /
analyzed: mdo sde pa'i nam mkha' ni med kyang gzhal bya yin te /
translated: Sautrantikas say that space is not a non-existent object of comprehension,

original: yod pa dang med pa'i rnam par dbye bas 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i rnam par dbye bas 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because it is an object engaged by the distinction of existence and non-existence.

original: de'i phyir ma yin te mi rtag par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma yin te mi rtag par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is not so, because there is no ascertainment of impermanence.🔽The explanation of that is:

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyogs la ni //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyogs la ni //
translated: In the position that space does not exist,

original: zhes bya ba'o //🔽de ni zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o // de ni zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'o //
translated: That is, space.

original: yon tan sgra gzhan du mi 'thad pa rtogs par bya ba'i yon tan can gyi nam mkha' rdzas nyid yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: yon tan sgra gzhan du mi 'thad pa rtogs par bya ba'i yon tan can gyi nam mkha' rdzas nyid yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think that space is a substance that has the quality of sound,

original: nam mkha' yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then space is also

original: reg pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas med kyang 'jig rten gyi nam mkha'i tha snyad yin te /
analyzed: reg pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas med kyang 'jig rten gyi nam mkha'i tha snyad yin te /
translated: a substance that has the quality of sound, because it is a worldly convention of space, even though it does not have the substance of contact.

original: gzhan la dogs pa med pas khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la dogs pa med pas khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since there is no doubt about the other, it is not accepted.

original: gling bu dang pi wang la sogs pa nyid ni sgra'i 'du ba can gyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: gling bu dang pi wang la sogs pa nyid ni sgra'i 'du ba can gyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: The flute, the veena, and so on are the reason for the collection of sound.

original: de'i khyad par gyis khyad par can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i khyad par gyis khyad par can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is distinguished by that distinction.

original: nam mkha' lus pa med pa la ni dgos pa gzhan gyi bsgrub bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' lus pa med pa la ni dgos pa gzhan gyi bsgrub bya ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: As for the remainder of space, it is taught that it is not the object to be established by another purpose.

original: de lta ma yin na gom gang yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gom gang yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, it would be a step.

original: tha snyad mi slu ba sgrub par byed pa ni 'di don byed pa la mi slu ba sgrub par byed pa yang yin la rkyen yang yin pa des rnam par gcod par bya ba yin /
analyzed: tha snyad mi slu ba sgrub par byed pa ni 'di don byed pa la mi slu ba sgrub par byed pa yang yin la rkyen yang yin pa des rnam par gcod par bya ba yin /
translated: The proof of non-deceptive convention is also the proof of non-deceptiveness in the functioning of this object, and it is the condition that is to be excluded by that.

original: shes bya gzhan rig pa kho na ste de dang shes pa gcig la 'dres par yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes bya gzhan rig pa kho na ste de dang shes pa gcig la 'dres par yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is only the cognition of other knowables, and it exists mixed with that cognition. This is the meaning.

original: yod pa nyid dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni med pa'i rtag pa la med pa bzhin du med pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni thob sla ba'i ldog pa can yin par bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni med pa'i rtag pa la med pa bzhin du med pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni thob sla ba'i ldog pa can yin par bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya'o //
translated: Existence, being produced, etc. are only non-existent, just as non-existence is in the permanent. This is taught to have an easy-to-obtain exclusion. As for if it were so,

original: mngon sum skyed pa yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mngon sum skyed pa yin pa'i phyir //
translated: it is because it produces direct perception.

original: zhes bya ba ni las yin zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las yin zhe na /
translated: This is the thesis.

original: dngos po las zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dngos po las zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word “entity” is supplied.

original: bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa ni med pa'i mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa bzhin du med pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa ni med pa'i mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa bzhin du med pa nyid du'o //
translated: The teaching is that life force, etc. are non-existent, just like non-existence in the similar class.

original: 'on te 'di dngos po'i yul can gyi zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin te /
analyzed: 'on te 'di dngos po'i yul can gyi zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin te /
translated: But if this is a subject that has an entity as its object, etc. is the philosophical position.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba dag nye bar dgod pa'i don du'am dogs par byed pa yang ngo //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba dag nye bar dgod pa'i don du'am dogs par byed pa yang ngo //
translated: But is supplied in the sense of a hypothetical presentation or a doubt.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the subject.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod dang med //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod dang med //
translated: Existence and non-existence in the similar class, etc.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is the thesis.

original: de lta yin na mi dmigs pa'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin na mi dmigs pa'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba yin te /
translated: If that is so, the connection of non-apprehension, etc. is the objection.

original: 'brel pa gnyis dngos po ma yin pa la mi srid pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa gnyis dngos po ma yin pa la mi srid pa'o //
translated: The two connections are not possible for a non-entity.

original: gnyis po 'di dag nyid ma dmigs pa la yang brgyud pas @302a * //
analyzed: gnyis po 'di dag nyid ma dmigs pa la yang brgyud pas @302a * //
translated: But these two are also indirect in the case of non-apprehension.

original: yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching is:

original: rgyu dang khyab byed med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab byed med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the absence of cause and the absence of the pervader.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the thesis.

original: rang rgyud du zhes bya ba'i dngos po bzhin du mngon sum nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rang rgyud du zhes bya ba'i dngos po bzhin du mngon sum nyid kyis so //
translated: like the entity called “autonomous.”

original: lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni de rung ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni de rung ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because of being hidden” means because of not being suitable.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin pa dang 'brel pa can med pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin pa dang 'brel pa can med pa'o //
translated: “That” means not having a connection with the unsuitable.

original: de lta na rang rgyud pa ma yin pa nyid kho nas 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de lta na rang rgyud pa ma yin pa nyid kho nas 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Thus, thinking that it is to be stated that it is not autonomous,

original: rgyu dang ngo bo ldog nyid kyis //
analyzed: rgyu dang ngo bo ldog nyid kyis //
translated: [Bhāviveka] says, “Because of the cessation of the cause and the nature,”

original: zhes bya ba ste rgyu dang khyab par byed pa ldog pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste rgyu dang khyab par byed pa ldog pa nyid kyis so //
translated: that is, because of the cessation of the cause and the pervader.

original: brjod pa las zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis te /
analyzed: brjod pa las zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis te /
translated: “From the statement” means from the statement of the master.

original: de la rigs mthun la yod dang // rnam gnyis med la med gang yin //
analyzed: de la rigs mthun la yod dang // rnam gnyis med la med gang yin //
translated: [Bhāviveka] says, “That which exists in what is of a similar type and does not exist in what is of a dissimilar type,”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: and so on.

original: tha dad par ni ma bshad do //
analyzed: tha dad par ni ma bshad do //
translated: “It is not explained as being different.”

original: zhes bya ba ni rang dbang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang dbang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not independent.

original: rgyu dang rang bzhin gyi ldog pa ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yin yang 'bras bu dang khyab bya la ltos nas de ltar brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu dang rang bzhin gyi ldog pa ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yin yang 'bras bu dang khyab bya la ltos nas de ltar brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Although the negation of cause and nature is the non-observation of nature, it is taught that it is expressed in that way in dependence on effect and the pervaded.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The master says, “The non-observation of nature is also . . .”

original: dmigs pa med na yod pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: dmigs pa med na yod pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: Someone says, “If there is no observation, how can it exist?”

original: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The master says, “In that case . . .”🔽Just as nonexistence is ascertained from the non-observation of cause and so on, it would also be the case from effect and so on.

original: rgyu la sogs pa ma dmigs pa las med pa bzhin du 'bras bu la sogs pa las kyang 'gyur ba yin no snyam du sems pa la ma dmigs pa tsam med pa sgrub pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /🔽rung ba'i zhes slob dpon gyis nye bar mtshon pas bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu la sogs pa ma dmigs pa las med pa bzhin du 'bras bu la sogs pa las kyang 'gyur ba yin no snyam du sems pa la ma dmigs pa tsam med pa sgrub pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na / rung ba'i zhes slob dpon gyis nye bar mtshon pas bstan pa ni /
translated: The master says, “Non-observation alone does not establish nonexistence. What does?🔽The suitable . . .”

original: de la'ang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la'ang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The master says, “In that case . . .”

original: mi dmigs pa la skyes bu med na bum pa la sogs pa las srog la sogs pa ldog pa yin gyi gson po'i lus la ma yin pa'i phyir skyes bu mthong ba med pa las ldog pa ma yin pa dang / de med pa las ldog pa yin pa la brten nas the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir khyad par dang bcas pa'i mi dmigs pa ni med pa sgrub pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa la skyes bu med na bum pa la sogs pa las srog la sogs pa ldog pa yin gyi gson po'i lus la ma yin pa'i phyir skyes bu mthong ba med pa las ldog pa ma yin pa dang / de med pa las ldog pa yin pa la brten nas the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir khyad par dang bcas pa'i mi dmigs pa ni med pa sgrub pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: Thus, the non-observation with a qualification is established as the cause of doubt, and therefore it is only the establishment of non-existence, not anything else.

original: mi dmigs pa bzhin du snang du rung ba'i me ma yin pa dang shing ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa kho na gtan tshigs dag gis sgrub par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa bzhin du snang du rung ba'i me ma yin pa dang shing ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa kho na gtan tshigs dag gis sgrub par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: Are the reasons not established by the exclusion of the non-perception of what is suitable to appear, such as the non-fire and the non-wood?

original: de'i phyir 'dir gnyis ni dngos po sgrub pa yin la zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi rigs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir gnyis ni dngos po sgrub pa yin la zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi rigs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Therefore, it is unreasonable to say that two are the establishment of entities and so on.

original: 'dis ni dngos po la'ang dngos po'i cha zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni dngos po la'ang dngos po'i cha zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, “entity” refers to the aspect of entity.

original: me ma yin pa'am shing ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i the tshom za ba ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: me ma yin pa'am shing ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i the tshom za ba ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: The doubt “it is not fire” or “it is not wood” is the result of contradiction.

original: 'gal bas khyab pa 'am dgag par bya'i ldog pa nyid du tha snyad byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab pa 'am dgag par bya'i ldog pa nyid du tha snyad byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Or, the pervasion by contradiction or the negation is expressed as the mere reverse of the object of negation.

original: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dag ni de dang bral ba la rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni @302b khyad par ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dag ni de dang bral ba la rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni @302b khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is that the cause and the pervader are in the absence of that result and that nature.

original: dngos la yang zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
analyzed: dngos la yang zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
translated: “ Also in the positive” means that it is understood by non-existence. “ By this” means “for this reason.” This is in the commentary.

original: ma yin par dgag par bshad pas khyad par brjod pa'i phyir 'di la yang skyon med do //
analyzed: ma yin par dgag par bshad pas khyad par brjod pa'i phyir 'di la yang skyon med do //
translated: Since it is explained as an implicative negation, there is no fault in stating the difference.

original: snang du rung bdag kho na'i 'bras bu dang khyab bya dag la rgyu dang rang bzhin med pa las med pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: snang du rung bdag kho na'i 'bras bu dang khyab bya dag la rgyu dang rang bzhin med pa las med pa ma yin nam //
translated: Isn’t the result and the pervaded of only that which is suitable to appear in the absence of cause and nature?

original: gnyi ga la yang yod pa dmigs pa nyid bsgrub bya yin pa de la rgyu'am rang bzhin zhes bya ba la khyad par ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang yod pa dmigs pa nyid bsgrub bya yin pa de la rgyu'am rang bzhin zhes bya ba la khyad par ci zhig yod /
translated: What difference is there between the cause and the intrinsic nature of that which is to be established, namely, the perception of both?

original: de ni de'i rgyu 'am rang bzhin yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /🔽de la dmigs rung rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: de ni de'i rgyu 'am rang bzhin yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa la / de la dmigs rung rnams kyis ni //
translated: It is not the cause or the intrinsic nature of that.🔽With regard to that, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Those that are suitable to appear

original: snang du rung ba'i ngo bo ni dmigs pa kho na yin gyi khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: snang du rung ba'i ngo bo ni dmigs pa kho na yin gyi khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The nature that is suitable to appear is only the object of perception, not the non-perception that is a distinguishing factor.

original: dbang po dang snang ba la sogs pa yod na yul dmigs pa ni snang ba'i gsal ba las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po dang snang ba la sogs pa yod na yul dmigs pa ni snang ba'i gsal ba las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: When there is a sense faculty, light, etc., the perception of an object is not different from the clarity of appearance.

original: tha mi dad pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-difference is taught:

original: med pa ni mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa ni mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: Non-existence is not different from non-perception.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang log pa dag gis dmigs pa ni dmigs bya las tha dad pa yin no zhes zer ba ni shes pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang log pa dag gis dmigs pa ni dmigs bya las tha dad pa yin no zhes zer ba ni shes pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: Those who say that perception is different from the object of perception by way of concomitance and reversal are the Proponents of Consciousness.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: Because of error. This is the inference.

original: de bzhin du ldog pa med pa ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no zhes zer ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ldog pa med pa ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no zhes zer ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Similarly, the absence of reversal is the absence of pervasion.🔽And is not the state of being the observed object itself due to the non-observation of the pervader?

original: dmigs par bya ba nyid kyang ma dmigs pa nyid las ma yin nam /🔽de yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la dbye ba bstan pa ni dmigs par bya ba med pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba nyid kyang ma dmigs pa nyid las ma yin nam / de yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la dbye ba bstan pa ni dmigs par bya ba med pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And that is not the non-observation of intrinsic nature.🔽The absence of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.

original: dmigs pa bzhin du de'i bdag nyid kyi med pa yang mngon sum pa yin gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa bzhin du de'i bdag nyid kyi med pa yang mngon sum pa yin gyi khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: The absence of the nature of the observed object is due to the non-observation of the pervader, not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.🔽The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to the non-observation of the observed object itself, but is due to the non-observation of the pervader.

original: rung ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽dmigs par bya ba yod pa dmigs pa ni rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs la de ma yin par bstan pa ni de dag gi yod pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rung ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽dmigs par bya ba yod pa dmigs pa ni rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs la de ma yin par bstan pa ni de dag gi yod pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The absence of the nature of the observed object is not due to

original: rkyen gzhan tshang ba rang bzhin gyi khyad par ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan tshang ba rang bzhin gyi khyad par ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The condition of being a special kind of object is the meaning of the phrase “that which becomes the objective support.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni dmigs pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni dmigs pas so //
translated: “ Therefore” means “because of the objective support.”

original: de las ldog pa med na zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa nyid ma dmigs na'o //
analyzed: de las ldog pa med na zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa nyid ma dmigs na'o //
translated: “ If it is not absent from that” means “if the objective support is not absent.”

original: des na mi 'khrul pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni byed pa po la gnas pa dmigs pa na'o //🔽de'i phyir gdon mi za bar dmigs bzhin pa ni /
analyzed: des na mi 'khrul pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni byed pa po la gnas pa dmigs pa na'o // de'i phyir gdon mi za bar dmigs bzhin pa ni /
translated: “ Because of non-delusion” means “if the objective support is present in the agent.”🔽Therefore, it is taught that “that which is certainly present in the objective support is only the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”

original: dmigs pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: “ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”

original: tha dad par ngus mtshungs pa zhes @303a * //🔽bya ba ste /🔽rjes su zhugs pa ma yin na bems po'i bdag nyid ni rnam grang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha dad par ngus mtshungs pa zhes @303a * // bya ba ste / rjes su zhugs pa ma yin na bems po'i bdag nyid ni rnam grang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support.”

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa dmigs bya nyid yin gyi dbang po la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gi dbye ba yin /🔽de dag med pa dag la yang dbye bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa dmigs bya nyid yin gyi dbang po la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gi dbye ba yin /🔽de dag med pa dag la yang dbye bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: “ If it is not the same as that” means “if it is not the same as the objective support.”🔽“ If it is not present in that” means “if it is not present in the objective support

original: dngos po med pa rnams ni zhes bya ba ste dngos po med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa rnams ni zhes bya ba ste dngos po med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Non-entities, i.e., because they are non-entities.

original: dgag par bya ba rnams dngos po nyid du gcig nyid yin na tha dad pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te med pa dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgag par bya ba rnams dngos po nyid du gcig nyid yin na tha dad pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te med pa dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: If the negatee were an entity, it would be one and the same, and not different.

original: dmigs pa bzhin du 'di'i yang med pa mngon sum kho na yin na rang bzhin mi dmigs pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba la /🔽de'i phyir mi shes shes bya'i phyir //
analyzed: dmigs pa bzhin du 'di'i yang med pa mngon sum kho na yin na rang bzhin mi dmigs pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba la / de'i phyir mi shes shes bya'i phyir //
translated: If the non-existence of the negatee were directly perceived, just like the object, what would be the use of non-apprehension of the nature?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said: “In order to know what is not known.”

original: snga mas de'i bdag nyid dang gzhan gyis mi dmigs pa bzhin du mngon sum nyid ma rtogs pa'i don gyis mi dmigs pa dgos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don ni 'grel par te gcig ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽kho bo mi shes shes bya'i phyir //
analyzed: snga mas de'i bdag nyid dang gzhan gyis mi dmigs pa bzhin du mngon sum nyid ma rtogs pa'i don gyis mi dmigs pa dgos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don ni 'grel par te gcig ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'o // kho bo mi shes shes bya'i phyir //
translated: The former [verse] is for the purpose of showing that non-apprehension is not direct perception, because it is not apprehended as having the nature of that [direct perception]. The meaning of the latter [verse] is that non-apprehension is necessary for the purpose of understanding what is not known. The commentary explains: “One is non-apprehension of the nature.”

original: zhes bya ba ni mi snang ba ma dmigs pa yin no zhes smras so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi snang ba ma dmigs pa yin no zhes smras so //
translated: “In order to know what is not known” means non-apprehension of the non-appearing.

original: yul med phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yul med phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because there is no object.

original: de'i 'bras bu yul la dmigs pa dang shes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu yul la dmigs pa dang shes pa ste /
translated: The result of that is the object-perception and the consciousness.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang sgra dang the tshom yang de dag gi dmigs pa na de bzhin du phan tshun dmigs bya rnams la snang ba mi dmigs pa yin te ;
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang sgra dang the tshom yang de dag gi dmigs pa na de bzhin du phan tshun dmigs bya rnams la snang ba mi dmigs pa yin te ;
translated: The conceptualization, the word, and the doubt, when they have that as their object, are also, in the same way, the non-perception of the appearance of the objects of mutual observation.

original: dmigs pa dang yod pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir de'i sgra dang shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang yod pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir de'i sgra dang shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The word and the consciousness of that are the result.

original: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid mngon sum nyid kyi rgyu mtshan bstan pa yin par mthong ngo //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid mngon sum nyid kyi rgyu mtshan bstan pa yin par mthong ngo //
translated: There, the word “object” is the teaching of the reason for the direct perception of the identity of that.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid sgrub pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid sgrub pa ni /
translated: The proof of the non-perception of the appearance is:

original: shes dang brjod pa dag gi yul //
analyzed: shes dang brjod pa dag gi yul //
translated: The object of consciousness and expression

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is not perceived.

original: der the tshom za ba zhes bya ba ni yod pa la the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: der the tshom za ba zhes bya ba ni yod pa la the tshom za ba'o //
translated: There, the doubt is the doubt about existence.

original: de dag tu zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang brjod pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag tu zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang brjod pa dag la'o //
translated: Those are the consciousness and the expression.

original: yul zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i'o //
analyzed: yul zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i'o //
translated: The object is the existent.

original: me yod na zhes bya ba ni sreg par nges pa med pa na'o //
analyzed: me yod na zhes bya ba ni sreg par nges pa med pa na'o //
translated: If there is fire, means if there is no certainty of burning.

original: phyogs gzhan zhes bya ba ni sreg pa yod pa yin pa la'o //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan zhes bya ba ni sreg pa yod pa yin pa la'o //
translated: Another place, means if there is burning.

original: de med na ni zhes bya ba ni sreg pa med pa na'o //
analyzed: de med na ni zhes bya ba ni sreg pa med pa na'o //
translated: If that is absent, means if there is no burning.

original: bzlog pa yod pa zhes bya ba ni sreg pa yod pa na'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa yod pa zhes bya ba ni sreg pa yod pa na'o //
translated: The presence of the opposite, means if there is burning.

original: de zhes bya ba ni sreg pa'i sgral sreg pa med pa dang / sreg pa ma yin pa la yang phyogs gzhan sreg pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sreg pa'i sgral sreg pa med pa dang / sreg pa ma yin pa la yang phyogs gzhan sreg pa'o //
translated: That, means in the word burning, if there is no burning, and also if there is no burning, there is another place where there is burning.

original: de yod na the tshom za ba ste /
analyzed: de yod na the tshom za ba ste /
translated: If that exists, there is doubt.

original: nges par gzung pa med pa yin gyi med pa la ni ma yin te nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni me yod na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung pa med pa yin gyi med pa la ni ma yin te nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni me yod na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not the case that there is no ascertainment if it does not exist, because there is ascertainment. This is indicated by if there is fire.

original: de bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That is indicated by just as.

original: @303b sreg byed ma yin pas me ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: @303b sreg byed ma yin pas me ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of the absence of fire, which is not a burner.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa nyid med pa'o //
translated: That also, means the absence of non-apprehension.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni mi dmigs pas gzhan med pa sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni mi dmigs pas gzhan med pa sgrub pa'o //
translated: That itself, means the establishment of the absence of another by non-apprehension.

original: ma grub pa yis zhes bya ba ni med pa las shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa yis zhes bya ba ni med pa las shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “By the nonestablished” means that consciousness does not exist due to the nonexistence of the object.🔽“The nonestablished and the established” means that the nonapprehension of the object and the existence of consciousness would be different.🔽“The nonestablished and the established” means that the nonapprehension of the object and the existence of consciousness would be different.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag ces bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa dang med pa dag tha dad par 'gyur bar bya ba yin te /🔽gang brjod pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag ces bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa dang med pa dag tha dad par 'gyur bar bya ba yin te / gang brjod pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “The nonestablished and the established” means that the nonapprehension of the object and the existence of consciousness would be different.

original: ma grub pas zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bos so //🔽yal ga la sogs pa dang ldan pa yod pa la brdas shing gi tha snyad ni mthong ba kho na las 'gyur ba ma yin nam /🔽med pa la ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pas zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bos so // yal ga la sogs pa dang ldan pa yod pa la brdas shing gi tha snyad ni mthong ba kho na las 'gyur ba ma yin nam / med pa la ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: “The nonestablished and the established” means that the nonapprehension of the object and the existence of consciousness would be different.

original: ma dmigs par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang / mi snang ba rnams kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //🔽snang du rung ba nyid kyis khyad par yin yang de kho na mi dmigs pa yin te /

original: khyad par bya ba nyid du brjod par bya'o snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: khyad par bya ba nyid du brjod par bya'o snyam du sems pa la /
translated: “The nonestablished and the established” means that the nonapprehension of the object and the existence of consciousness would be different.🔽“The nonestablished

original: snang ba ma mthong na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba ma mthong na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If the appearance is not seen” means that the appearance is not seen.

original: mi dmigs pa yang snang du rung ba zhes bya bas khyad par du byas pa yin gyi ma dmigs pa tsam du ni ma yin no //🔽de'i phyir snang ba mi dmigs pa bzhin du snang bzhin pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa yang snang du rung ba zhes bya bas khyad par du byas pa yin gyi ma dmigs pa tsam du ni ma yin no // de'i phyir snang ba mi dmigs pa bzhin du snang bzhin pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: “The non-observation of the possible” is qualified by “the possible appearance,” not by mere non-observation.🔽Therefore, “the non-observation of the possible appearance” is a qualification, just like the non-observation of the appearance.

original: gang yang de ltar ma nges pa can gyis khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag yod do zhes bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang yang de ltar ma nges pa can gyis khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag yod do zhes bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: “The non-observation of the pervader is not ascertained” means that the non-observation of the pervader is not ascertained.

original: de lta bur mi rung ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur mi rung ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not impossible.
